name: AzorSea Adventures
ranking: #3 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #3 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
reviews/0/text: Fantastic boat trip, with fun and very knowledge crew, we went on impulse after we saw the sign, and enjoyed every minute of it.
reviews/1/text:
A friend and I booked a halfday trip with Phillipe for tuna.  Boat was top notch as was the fishing gear.  Left right in time at 1300 and put the gear in the water quickly.    Deck hand Carlos and Philippe used every means imaginable to find fish, visual sighting of local birds that follow bait fish, fish finding electronic equipment, other people fishing via phone.... Alas we did not catch a tuna it was not for lack of trying... Philippe was much more interested in catching a fish than getting back to the harbor at the time out of our half day trip.  

I'd reccomend these people to anybody on Sau Migel looking for an enjoyable trip.  Would have been great to catch a big tuna.... however as always win some lose some.
reviews/1/title: Great trip with a great crew and first rate equipment.
reviews/2/text: We did the 1 hour boat tour of the island. Everything was great! The boat ride was good, tons of good information was provided about the island and the tour was fun. Highly reccomend this company to anyone.
reviews/3/text:
Filipe & Mariana provided an excellent experience.
I have been out on other trips and none were better.
Although we were unable to bring a fish to the boat, they worked very hard constantly to find fish. Filipe's is very passionate about the client having a great experience.
I will try again.....

Gerry Smith.....Ontario, Canada
reviews/4/text: We caught a huge tuna - was a catch of a lifetime! Saw tons of dolphins & even a sea turtle! He toured us around the island too. What a day! We❤️ ❤️Felipe! He knows exactly where to go and you can tell he loves sharing his knowledge with people. He has a wonderful, warm personality. He and Mariana were awesome. The experience was far beyond what we ever expected. We can’t wait to go back!
reviews/5/text:
English review further down.

Espetacular. Se voce e pescador e quer AQUELE peixao... va com o Felipe. Vale bem a pena. O Felipe trabalha o barco sem descanso a procura e nao desiste.  A Mariana tambem   sempew a procura do passaro a trabalhar a isca. Fomos ontem e demorou, mas como digo, o homem nao desiste e la apanhamos o Peixao que eu queria. 5 estrelas. Recomendo.

5 stars. This Captain works his boat tirelessly to get you that fish you are after. Top grade gear, shimano and okuma reels, outriggers, up to date navionics and lowrance systems. Boat is clean and well maintained. 
The mandir not give up until I had my Bigeye... I'm chuffed. Highly Recomended.  If you have fished big game before you won't be disappointed.  If its your first time out for big game fish, don't be put off by the amount it costs, the gear, fuel, maintenance etc. Warrants the value and when you have the 250 pound fish pulling drag you will be happy you went.
reviews/6/text:
My fiends and I went "Big Game fishing" with AzorSea. I can confidently say that this is an amazing and unique experience. Fillipe and Mariana know very well what they are doing and don't give up even if you are sailing for 3 hours without a single fish. Thanks to Fillipe's experience, we finally managed to catch a fish. We let this one back into the sea afterwards.
Definitely recommended!
reviews/7/text:
This trip with Filipe was amazing and great! Me and my boyfriend ordered big game fishing for one day and we really enjoyed this day. We caught nice tuna and we saw a lot of dolphins during all day. The services from captain were great, we had a lot of fun a Filipe did his the best.
When we will go back to Azores, we will order another day with Filip, that's for sure!
I can recommend this trip for 100%.
Greetings from Czech republic and thank you for everything Filipe.
Veronika
reviews/7/title: We were very satisfied with Filipe's services from A to Z.
reviews/8/text:
What an unforgettable experience! Filipe brought us along the coastline of Sao Miguel. During our fishing trip there was a fishing competition. We heard the news that no-one in this competition was able to catch a fish. Quickly, it became clear that catching a fish would not be an easy challenge on that day.

Firstly, we had to look for the presence of particular animals in order to seek the tuna. Things like this really showed the fishing experience and knowledge of Filipe. Even though the conditions were not optimal and the competitors of the fishing competition were not able to catch a fish, we were able to catch a lot of fish.
It was very nice to see that the fish we caught was left behind as unharmed as possible. Just as it should be.

We went on this trip with a group of 5 friends and we all agreed that this was by far the best experience we had during our vacation. That’s why I really, really recommend this activity.
For now it’s time to quit reading reviews about Azorsea adventures and to go book a trip with Felipe!😉
reviews/9/text:
They're not much more to say, except for it being absolut amazing. Philippe is an amazing person, that takes his time to make it to the best trip possible for you. From showing princess island, to diving for underwater volcanos. Even tho I wasn't fond of diving like the rest, he tried to adapt so I didn't miss a thing.
One of the absolut best places to use your time when visiting the Azores. Only praise from here!
reviews/9/title: Would do this again next time visiting the Azores
reviews/10/text: It was a very nice trip. But put on your swimsuit before you get on the boat... Don't change your clothes in the cabin, you get seasick...😅. The underwater volcanoes are very interesting. And go sit on the bow, it is very cool!
reviews/11/text: An excellent tour worth every euro. Philipe and Adrianna were so welcoming and fun to explore the island with. We learned about Sao Miguel's history, mythology, geology, flora & fauna...all while enjoying amazing scenery on a relaxing boat ride. Philipe is an extemely skilled captain and got us up close to many incredible views and photo op's.  Swimming down (just 3m) to scoop up hot sand from a submerged volcano was SUPER cool!  We covered a lot of Sao Miguel during our stay but this was, by far, the best tour we took. I highly recommend AzorSea Adventures.
reviews/12/text: What an incredible way to experience Sao Miguel! Filipe has in depth knowledge of the island, the sea, and a passion to match it. Highly recommend a trip with AzoreSea Adventures!!
reviews/13/text: Wonderful trip from Felipe who was excellent knowledge about the island and surrounding areas. Explained a lot about the island near São Miguel and Sao Miguel itself.
reviews/14/text: We went on 2 trips with Filipe and Marianne, both were brilliant. Filenes’ local knowledge and explanation of everything on the trips really added to the experience. Would highly recommend, really lovely people to spend your day with 😎👍👍👍
reviews/15/text: Fantastic experience, I recommend to everyone who value quality, knowlegde and the engagment. This was one of the best tour on San Miguel island. Keep going Filipe! You are great!
reviews/16/text:
What a lovely trip! A must-do for everyone who visits São Miguel or is in Vila Franca do Campo. 
Filipe and his assistant showed us the wonderful island of Vila Franca and told us a lot of interesting scientific facts and stories as well.  The perfect combination of adventure, fun and learning activity.
Thank you guys for your professionalism, but also for your friendly attitude and joyfulness!
reviews/16/title: If you like adventures, this is the right place!
reviews/17/text:
Filipe was a wonderful guide and told us lots of the island history and geological information.  We toured the volcanic island then anchored off a beach to swim in the sea with the hot volcano steam coming up from the sea floor. Reaching down and grabbing the sand was an experience. Then snorkeling around caves and island - amazing!
Great customer service, excellent knowledge would highly recommend for all!
reviews/18/text: Our guide Philipp has an amazing energy and made a very exciting, detailed and not boring at all excursion around the island
reviews/18/title: Your personal unique sail trip in Azores
reviews/19/text: Incredible experience: a very interesting story about the island and volcanoes, watching crabs and birds, enjoying amazing views and rocks
