address: Angra do Heroismo, Terceira 9700-471 Portugal
description: Azores Nature Tours is the name of the company that elevates the concept of human mobility to another level, presents itself in this exclusive way due to the fact that it is the first and only company, that realizes guided tours in Terceira Island using Segway and Electric Bicycles. This way Azores Nature Tours promotes physical exercise while exploring nature, making your ride comfortable, safe, fun and adventurous!
name: Azores Nature Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: E-Bike Tour West Side | Third Island
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Island Van Tour (Full Day)
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: E-bike Tour Monte Brasil
reviews/0/text:
The full day tour gave a nice overview of the island. Tour guide Amélia was friendly and knowledgeable. I learned a lot of new info about Terceira and the Azores. 

The company was each to reach beforehand and answered any questions I had. I’m already planning my trip back to Terceira and will surely use Azores Nature Tours again!
reviews/1/text:
I took part in the One day tour of Terceira Island. It was incredible! I had the possibility to visit all the best spots if the island: the various miradouros around the island, some small villages, the natural pools that can be found around the Island and lot more! The guide, Amèlia, is really competent, speaks a great English and, most importantly is always with a smile. It seemed to me that she knew everything about the island. It is a real pleasure listening to her. She can talk about the history of the island, the geography (and geology), and curiosities.
I really recommend this tour to everybody!
reviews/2/text:
we should just like to give you some feedback about our all-day tour with Mario on 12.03.23 on Terçeira. First of all, we all four of us had a marvellous day on your island. Mario was the best 
guide one could ever have expected. His English was excellent and his range of knowledge, on every single aspect of life on your incredible island, was never-ending. He patiently answered all 
our questions - and we really did have a lot of them - took us out to a wonderful Azorean restaurant and showed us all 4 corners of the island. It felt, at the end, that we had spent a day with
a friend, not with a stranger! We should like to highly recommend your company and hope to come back some day in the not-to-distant future. We shall also recommend you to any of our 
friends who intend visiting the Azores.
reviews/3/text: James took us on a wonderful and really interesting tour.  It was so good we extended it for another couple of hours. He definitely knows his stuff and it was a pleasure to meet him. Highly recommend.
reviews/4/text: Amaising. The guy was very nice and he knew many things about the island. Both bike and jeep tour wonderful
reviews/5/text: Misterios Negro's is a very beautiful place, it is like being in the jungle. Our guide was knowledgeable and told us about the animals and endemic plants. I definitely recommend this company which I discovered on the internet
reviews/6/text: We had the greatest time with the greatest guide! ❤️ she was super nice and helpful. The tour itself is perfect to visit the whole island if you don’t have too much time to spend.
reviews/7/text: James is operating a wonderful business on the Island of Terceira.  He provides excellent customer service by keeping his groups small and the equipment was new and in excellent condition.  The transportation service to and from the hotel was an added bonus. The 2 hour Ebike ride to Monte Brasil was excellent.
reviews/8/text: Today James took me on a hike to the Misterious Negros. It was a beautifull hike through the "jungle" of the acores. James is a good tour guide,  that tells you a lot about the island and its culture. I would recommend a trip! So no doutbt, just book!
reviews/8/title: I made an amazing hike with James
reviews/9/text: We are so glad we took this while your of Mt Brazil. The bikes were so fun and easy to learn!!! We are in our 60’a and relatively fit but would not have enjoyed the park as much on foot or by car. James was a great guide- he graciously answered all our questions and shared his love of this place. He could not have been nicer!  Highly recommend
reviews/9/title: What a perfect way to tour!!!
reviews/10/text: Jaime the company owner arranged a wonderful 4 hour tour for my wife and I. Jaime laid out a great route, was the tour guide and provided all transport and bikes. The bikes were in excellent condition and Jaime carries 2 extra batteries to ensure a successful day. We asked for an extended trip and we did 40 km from the centre of the island downhill to the pools in Biscoitos and around the western coast to Angra. Wonderful views, thrilling runs on bikes that make the steep climbs very doable by an average rider. If you’ve never tried an e-bike you’ll be smiling from moment one. I highly recommend Jaime, his company and his e-bike tour options. We had a great day!! You won’t be disappointed.
reviews/11/text:
Would highly recommend James & “Azore Nature Tours” to anyone looking to see some of Terceira. A very pleasant guy; punctual, friendly and knowledgeable. Just what you want. 

We did some biking activities and wherever you are on the island there’s always something to see. A good way to experience more than walking, but not rushing by too fast in a car & missing things - a sweet spot of touring!

Thanks & if we make it back to the Azores we will definitely be in touch. Andy (& Amy)
reviews/12/text:
You must use James and Azores Nature Tours to really get to see and know Terceira.  I spent and entire day with James during my stay.  First of all he is incredibly knowledgeable about the island, the history and the best things to do.  He monitored the weather and made sure our tour was aligned to the sun.  The weather on the island is quite changeable.  It was great that we avoided the fog and rain 
The service was prompt, super friendly and above all FUN! 

James also has a great network on the Islands and was able to connect me with another great experience on another Island.   On a scale of 1-10 James and Azores Nature Tours scores an 11 in my book!
reviews/13/text:
Knowledgeable, fun guide, punctual on the way in an way back. The sites are pretty cool when the weather is good.
Recommend.
reviews/14/text: Excellent tour guide.  We are a party of four people. Everyone enjoyed the hiking along the beautiful ocean shoreline, volcano caves and island tour.  James is a great and plesant guy provided the best service.👍👍Strongly recommend his tour company.
reviews/15/text: Was a fantastic hike with a breathtaking views. James Vargas was very professional, good prepared and shared a lot of interesting facts about the island. Highly recommended!
reviews/15/title: Spectacular views of Baias da Agualva.
reviews/16/text: We had a wonderful few hours with our guide Pedro showing us the highlights of the island. He was very knowledgeable and professional. We can highly recommended his services.
reviews/16/title: Van tour of Terceira with Pedro Silva
reviews/17/text:
Touring on the E bike
On the island of Terceira we did a tour on the E bikes. We were guided by Jaime Vargas from Azores Nature Tours. Jaime started his company this year. He is a very enthousiastic guide who wants to show and tell all nice places on the part of the island you can visit during the tour. 
We wanted to see a lot of the island, So we asked him to spend not to much time in Praia Vittoria. After the bike tour it is possible to make a walk through the city when you want. 
Jaime is very flexibel, So talk with him what you prefer to see. 
His bikes were great. They make it easy to climb the hills.  We did a tour of 2 hours and saw a nice part of the island and the coast. So: this is a good way to explore a part of the island in a short time.
reviews/17/title: On the e-bike with our guide Jaime
reviews/18/text: We had a great day biking on Mont Brasil. We went to the top of each of the 4 peaks and learned lots about the island’s history and Mont Brasil itself. The e-bikes were easy to learn to use since we’d never used them before and it made it easy to get to the top but while still getting some excercise. Also, the views were spectacular!
reviews/19/text: My daughter and I had a fantastic time! Jaime was knowledge and friendly. The e-bikes are easy to maneuver and fun. It's such a different and enjoyable way to take in Terciera's beautiful scenery. I definitely recommend and hope to return. Thanks, Jaime! Your business is going to take off because of your attention to detail.

address: Estrada Regional, Achada, Sao Miguel 9630-024 Portugal
description: After a decade of experience in adventure tourism, Azorean Active Blueberry was created to bring another level of service for outdoor sports travellers. Our mission is to share with quality the Azores background and provide the perfect balance between fun and safety. Join us and feel the elements...with Canyoning, Coasteering and Climbing!
name: Azorean Active Blueberry
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Canyoning in the Ribeira dos Caldeirōes Natural Park
reviews/0/text: Our family of 4 (parents plus a 12 and 14 year old) joined Paolo, Carla and crew for both coasteering and canyoning. This was by far the highlight of our trip. You get to see a completely different perspective on the island. The guides are wonderful - professional, enthusiastic, well informed. 100% recommend both trips for all visitors to the island.
reviews/1/text: Bruno and Felipe were hilarious and were fantastic guides. I did the 3 hour canyoning trip and it was super fun. Included abseiling, jumps, hiking, and was an overall fantastic experience and intro to canyoneering.
reviews/2/text:
Bruno an Philip were great guides.
a lot of patients, they know the job. I felt very safe.
It was important for them that I wont feel cold and they have the best equipment.
Thank you and I hope we meet again
reviews/3/text: It was great fun. the guides are super nice and speak very good english. Felt very safe all the time
reviews/4/text: Paulo and Filipe were both very knowledgeable and made the experience not only adventurous but also fun!! Definitely recommend and most likely will give them a call when I return :)
reviews/5/text: Such a fun, energizing day! The guides are excellent - funny, incredibly professional, kept you laughing the whole time. The canyon is stunning and the rappels down the waterfalls are actually quite a legitimate thrill! 11/10 - would absolutely recommend
reviews/5/title: Thrilling adventure with the loveliest guides
reviews/6/text: We had such a fun time with this tour! I wish I could remember our guides names as they were phenomenal and are what made this experience worth it! For starters the wetsuits and gear you have to wear is very clean and all relatively new and in really good shape! The tour itself was amazing having a quick hike through the jungle to get to the starting point of where you get in the water. The smell of the rainforest was to die for. The canyoning experience was lots of fun, rappelling down waterfalls and jumping down into the falls! I wish there were some bigger falls to jump/rappel down but it’s perfect for beginners. Our tour guides were extremely entertaining and kept us laughing the whole way. Not to mention our tour guides stopped at a beautiful look out point on the way back to our drop off location. This is unnecessary but greatly appreciated as I would have not gotten the chance to go otherwise. We would 100% recommend this tour!
reviews/7/text: It was AMAZING coastering with Paulo, Bruno, Filipe and Ester, the rose among the thorns =P. We were so lucky to get a last minute booking the day before (probably someone cancelled, well too bad for them) and boy are we glad we did. It was my first time doing something like this and felt it was an  incredibly safe and comfortable experience. They were always there to give clear instructions and constantly watching over everyone for the slightest bit of discomfort  or sign of uneasiness. There was so much enthusiasm and bubbly energy and you can tell they absolutely love what they're doing which makes it even better for all of us there. A great day getting safely tumbled aroudn by the waves and jumping off cliffs. Wish we were staying longer so we could do their canyoning trip!
reviews/8/text: We did two canyoning tours with a family last summer. It was amazing! We felt safe, the guides are super profesional, they took photos on a tour and sent them the same evening. We tried two other canyoning tours in Madeira (Portugal) and Oregon (USA), but this is one is THE BEST without a doubt!!!!!!!! We are planning to come back to Azores and Blueberry team is one of the main reasons to do that :)
reviews/9/text:
Thanks you very much for the exciting family activity 😃
Great adventure!
The monitors are very kind and motivating 👍
reviews/10/text: We did the coasteering and I definitely recommend this activity if you never did it. The crew is amazing, very kind and fun peoples. You're always confident with them and they let you push your limit. Really appreciate that. So go coasteering with this amazing crew. You won't regret.
reviews/11/text: Legendary guides! Amazing experience! Really good mix of ages in the group so can definitely recommended for everyone. We felt lucky to get a spot in one of our last days on São Miguel so book as soon as you know you are visiting. Very exciting too feel a little of the chaos of the ocean, but don't gulp down as much of it as I did 🧂🥴🤩👌
reviews/12/text: Highly recommend coasteering with Azorean Active Blueberry! Our family of four (with two teens) had a phenomenal experience. Paulo and the other guides were so helpful, welcoming, and inclusive. They made the experience super fun, and were supportive of those who were up for the high cliff jumps (my teens!) and those who were not (me!). This is an experience you will not forget, it was a highlight of our trip for sure!!
reviews/13/text: We loved our experience Coasteering! The guides are genuinely kind, fun and happy people. They make for you have fun and are very safe. My husband is a confident swimmer so they gave him extra attention and help. The equipment was clean and in good shape. Would recommend !
reviews/14/text: Paulo and his team are doing absolutely everything right when it comes to offering fun adventure activities in the Azores - from my initial contact with the team online to booking to making changes to my reservation all the way through to the end of canyoning, they far exceeded my expectations, and I had a blast doing their canyoning experience! Props to Bruno, Esther, Filip, and Carla for creating the utmost fun, energetic, and exciting day while also keeping us safe. You can tell they love what they do and it totally shows! They're real, genuine, laidback, and just good people. When I get back to the Azores, you can bet I'm calling up Azorean Active Blueberry for another adventure.
reviews/14/title: Nothing short of amazing for my first canyoning experience!
reviews/15/text: We did Canyoning and Coasteering. Both activities were amazing with the guides making it all the more special. I would highly recommend both trips to anyone looking for a fun and active day in the Azores!
reviews/16/text: Had such an awesome time with Bruno, Arthur and the team! Super professional and tons of fun! 10/10!
reviews/17/text: We did this activity with our 2 kids aged 11 and 8 . It was so much fun. Paulo and Arthur were great with the kids and location was stunning!
reviews/18/text: Paulo and the team were great. We had a lot of fun and very friendly, and we would recommend to anyone who wants try coasteering. Thanks guys!
reviews/19/text: Coasteering ist like canyoning, only by the coast. We had a wonderful tour with two fantastic guides, both in love with their work, their island and nature. I felt safe the whole time, still had so much fun doing something I have never done before. The perfect weather and a lovely group with some of the sweetest Portuguese kids helped! I highly recommend this tour!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Azorean Active Blueberry tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Agostinho Cymbron 9, Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9500-445 Portugal
description: Look no further, as we offer simply the best, most authentic tours in São Miguel island! We run our tours is 9-seater vans and small groups, to allow for lots of interaction. Come explore São Miguel's famous natural wonders in comfort in the company of expert and attentive guides that will make the whole experience so much richer!
name: Pure Azores Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: São Miguel West Full Day Tour with Setes Cidades Including Lunch
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: São Miguel East Full Day Tour with Furnas Including Lunch
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Best of Ponta Delgada Walking Tour with Botanical Garden
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Hidden Gems of Sao Miguel Island Full Day Tour with Lunch
photo/caption: Pure Azores in Sete Cidades during São Miguel West tour
reviews/0/text: Easy going , very smart , kind , thoughtful, respectful, courteous tour guide , Fernando. I have acquired significant amount of knowledge in Botany , Geography, Archaeology,and so much more . Touring Sao Miguel Island with Fernando gave me a lot of awestrucked hidden gems Island moments . Sao Miguel Island is a Paradise here on Earth ! Pure Azores tours you rock ! Fernando, you keep rocking ! Thank you for a lot of wonderful experiences. Indeed , an Island to explore.
reviews/1/text: My friend and I from Connecticut are touring Sao Miguel and took the Pure Azores tour of the western part of the island. Our guide, Joao, is enthusiastic and gracious.  His information about the history, geology, culture and sweet little tales of the island kept us entertained. He went beyond expectations by suggesting other interesting places to visit, made reservations  for us at a restaurant we are excited to try. On top of all this, Joao intervened on our behalf with our car rental agency when the battery died and we were stuck. We are both delighted and grateful with Pure Azores and Joao.
reviews/1/title: Joao is the best tour guide ever!
reviews/2/text: As a group of 4 travellers we experienced 3 tours with Pure Azores; the East, West and Hidden Gems on Sao Miguel island. They did not disappoint with their knowledge and professionalism. Highly recommend.
reviews/2/title: Pure Azores tours put the H in Hospitality
reviews/3/text: We had a party of 8 do the west island tour with Filipo and Miguel and they were great hosts.  Very knowledgeable and kept it entertaining.  Saw some beautiful sights, even though the fog rolled in at the end.
reviews/4/text: Loved our Hidden Gems tour so much we ended up scrapping our other plans last minute in order to add the East Tour including Furnas w/ lunch tour. As always, the tour guides (we had Filipe on one tour and Miguel on the other) are very knowledgeable, speak fluent English, are super friendly, and really go above and beyond (like they'll carry your babies for you. Seriously). The vans are spacious and comfortable, the prices are more than reasonable, and the sights you will see are priceless. I cannot say enough good things about these tours- a great way to see the island, learn something about its history and culture, take in breathtaking scenery and to just RELAX!
reviews/4/title: Loved it so much, we booked another tour!
reviews/5/text: We did both the East and West Full Day tours and they were fabulous.  Beautiful scenery, breathtaking view, good food and our tour guide for both, Jaoa, was a fountain of knowledge and very enthusiastic about his country.  The small groups tours (8 people) are definitely preferable to larger ones.  We met some great people from Canada, United States and Oman.  We would highly recommend either or both tours.
reviews/5/title: Azores Full Day East & Full Day West Tours
reviews/6/text:
Just back from a 4-day stay,DEC 7-10,in Ponta Delgada and booked both tours thru VIATOR before leaving the USA, to see the island of Sao Miguel. WOW! We definitely made the right choice, PURE AZORES! Filipe,our tour guide, was awesome! So knowledgeable, interesting and made sure we saw it all, which we did! We were fortunate 😊 to have him both times. West Tour had 8 pax, East 7 pax. The max is 8, which is why we chose PURE AZORES. Having a small group is the way to go.. Comfy van, H20, authentic lunches w/wine & beer!

We thoroughly enjoyed both tours very much and most definitely recommend them to others.The tour prices were great for both! What a deal!

PURE AZORES & Sr. Filipe......you got our vote hands down!!!😊😊 

BRAVO!!!  Muito Obrigado uma vez mais!

FELICES FESTAS!

- J & T
MASSACHUSETTS,USA
Dec 8 & 9
reviews/6/title: BOTH WEST & EAST ISLAND TOURS WITH FILIPE...INCREDIBLE!😃
reviews/7/text: We loved these tours. Our guides were Miguel on one day, and Fernando on another. Both were great, knowledgeable and fun! Having a small group enabled us to bond as a group and we never felt like cattle - they way a large tour can do. We guides not only provided great depth on the tour, the conversations over lunch an en route gave us insight to what it means to live in the Azores today.  Don’t think twice, book the trips!
reviews/8/text: This tour was one of the best tours I have ever been on.  Our guide Jack was knowledgeable, friendly and had a great personality. His love for his country and concern for his customers needs was outstanding. The restaurant that we stopped for lunch was outstanding with local specialties. The pictures speak volumes.
reviews/8/title: Pure Azores Sai Miguel -a day of food fun and frolick
reviews/9/text: Our tour guide João is very nice, knowledgeable and friendly. He shared with a lot great stories, information about the island. He introduced delicious food to us as well. He took care of everyone and happy to take photos for us. He tried to make us happy and enjoy the stay. We love his company a lot. Thanks João!
reviews/10/text: We took three tours with this company  Sao Miguel West, Sao Miguel East and Hidden Gems of Sao Miguel.  All three trips were simply amazing!  Great tour guides, Great food. I will highly recommend this company. Tours exceeded our expectations.
reviews/11/text: We took the West tour of Sao Miguel with Pure Azores.  The previous day we took the East tour and it was great.  The weather on this day was not cop-operating but John our tour guide was very flexible and made the most of it.  The tour again was fantastic.  Alot of great sites to see, great lunch and alot of history supplied by John along the way.  The day went by very fast even though the weather did not accommodate.  Because of some rain we replaced one stop with another and it worked out great.  Overall I would highly recommend this tour as well as the East tour as a way to see the island and learn all about it's history.  Thanks to John our tour guide for another great adventure!!  He was the best!!
reviews/12/text: My wife and I signed up for both the east and west van day tours and we were certainly not disappointed! Miguel Abad was a fantastic guide who really seems to enjoy his job and has a great sense of humor. He made us feel welcomed and also gave great insight into life in the Azores! We also thought the value of these tours cannot be beat, especially because they include great lunches! Thank you Miguel for giving us such a memorable time!
reviews/13/text: What a fantastic way to spend the day! Miguel, our guide was an excellent driver and made sure we had time to see this breathtaking island. His ongoing commentary provided historical and geographical information. He was patient, humorous, and very passionate about the beautiful scenery. Pure Azores is must!
reviews/14/text: This was a fantastic tour with Fernando as our guide.  Fernando was very knowledgeable and informative and had a great sense of humor.  The lunch on this tour was very delicious and surpassed our expectations.  We saw so many wonderful sights on the tour.  I would highly recommend this tour.
reviews/15/text:
Today we had a tour on the west side and parts of north side of the island and it was just amazing. Fernando was knowledgeable, funny and really good all around on showing us all the best locations and giving us all the information he knew, as well as some stories. The places were amazing, the food was phenomenal, it was a very pleasant experience. Thanks to Fernando we also booked and extra tour and we hope he will be our tour guide again. If all your guides are like him I can only strongly recommend doing any if not all of their tours. 
Thank you for our first and great experience on our trip.
reviews/16/text: We had an amazing day with our guide, J Costa. What a beautiful island, what a kind knowledgeable, friendly guide who had a wealth of information on the environmental and social history of the island. We were so pleased that we have scheduled a tour of the East of San Miguel with this company.
reviews/17/text: Joao Costa our tour guide made the tour even better! He had super knowledge and very friendly! He ensured everyone was comfortable on the tour! Sete Cidades was on my bucket list forever...I was so overwhelmed with the beauty of this place!
reviews/18/text: We did the east van tour on our honeymoon and enjoyed every bit of it! Miguel was an excellent and informative tour guide! We loved all the sites we got to see, really enjoyed the thermal bath and the lunch experiences! We would not have been able to see so many great places on our own! Highly recommend this tour company from the small tour group size to the informative guide to the great stops everything was perfect about it!
reviews/19/text: I went on the East and West tours with Joao. Even though the weather is unpredictable, Joao made the best of the tour regardless. He was constantly on watch for changes and made sure we had the most enjoyable experience. Muito obrigado Joao!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Pure Azores Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Lajes do Pico, Pico Portugal
description: Climb Pico Mountain, the highest point of Portugal, in two different ways: during the day and during the night to see the sunrise. Activities with certified guide who will make you know about geological diversity, fauna and flora of this natural reserve, as well as other specificities about the island and the Azores... feel free to ask :)
name: atiPICO
reviews/0/text: The experience was fantastic! Monica has been very kind with all of us, giving us the  best recomendation to arrive to Piquinho.
reviews/1/text: What a phenomenal experience! The group I joined consisted of three individuals, all of whom were experienced hikers who had considered making the ascent without a group, but all of whom had individually encountered the rave reviews of making the journey guided by the incredible crew at atiPICO. We were not disappointed. In addition to the spectacular nature of the hike itself, the experienced professional staff of atiPICO set us all for success, with detailed prepatory information regarding equipment, conditions, and setting expectations for the group. Our guide Mónica provided great context and conversation along the hike, that although I could have made the ascent solo, I would not have gotten the full richness of the experience and the memories that I treasure from having done it with atiPICO. Highly recommend.
reviews/1/title: Professional and personable guide that made the ascent to the top of Pico unforgettable
reviews/2/text: The night climb up Pico was a truly magical experience. We were so happy we decided to do a guided hike, which we don’t normally do. But Mt. Pico is different than any climb we have ever done. Our guide Daniel’s familiarity with the mountain, preparation, encouragement and wit turned it into one of the best climbs we have ever done. It was the highlight of our trip to the Azores!
reviews/3/text:
I did a lot of research before booking the Pico climb with atiPICO and we were all extremely happy with the decision. The atiPICO website has tons of information about the climb so that you can prepare beforehand and know exactly what you are getting yourself into. Everything is clearly stated and all our questions were answered (even ones that we did not think of). As a result, there were no unpleasant surprises on the day of our climb. Additionally, atiPICO tries to keep their group size to 8 per guide. Sometimes this is not possible due to weather or rescheduling. This makes the experience much more enjoyable because you can develop more of a camaraderie with your fellow climbers. We saw other guides with huge groups and were glad that we weren't being led by them. 

Nuno was our guide for the day and he was very professional and affable. While you could tell that he loved the Azores, Pico Island and what he does for a living, he was just a regular guy that you might meet and have a conversation with. You could tell he is very experienced at guiding the less experienced by the tips and tricks he gave to help us conserve energy and minimize strain on our knees. He helped us maintain a steady pace without putting undue pressure on the slower members of the group (me!). He was extremely observant and attentive without being overbearing. Nuno is also a wonderful storyteller and conversationalist and kept us entertained with stories about his life, family, travels, and past climbs. All this while maintaining strict safety standards for all of our group! He also speaks multiple languages so communication was easy.

I was particularly nervous about this climb as it is the most challenging activity that I've ever attempted but Nuno quickly put our group at ease. I highly recommend booking with atiPico if you care at all about having a great time and being safe!
reviews/4/text: It was an amazing experience with a great guide that tells you all ins and outs of climbing the mountain. Atipico prepares you in front of the hike what you should need on the trip, that was very useful. On the mountain they always give you tips where to step and where to watch out. I dearly recommend Atipico with all there experience and they make a heavy trip fun!
reviews/5/text:
We (me and my girlfriend) did the morning climb together with Nuno and one might say we were accidentally privileged since it was just us and Nuno in the group. Nuno is a great guy, making the trip to the top a very enjoyable experience. With more than 450 climbs so far, and 11 years of hiking and climbing experience, he knows his way around the mountain and led us all the way to the top in around 3.5 hours and similar on the way down. He helped us to keep a good rhythm, maintained nice conversation and told us many stories from his climbs as well as facts related to the mountain’s and island’s flora and fauna!

All in all, we’ve had a fantastic time climbing up and down mount Pico and felt safe every step of the way! Thanks Atipico!
reviews/6/text: I did a night climbing with this guy's and it was great! The organisation of a trip was very good, the guide was professional and well-prepared, he was careful and patient to all team members, everything was on time and we got to the top before sunrise ans met it there! It was amazing experience! And the team was really great! Thank you for this memories! I wish everyone to feel the same on the top of Pico! 🥰
reviews/7/text: Amazing experience with the great guide Daniel Pena. Always in a good mood, accompanied by a lot of information about the mountain.
reviews/8/text:
I went in a group with Nuno. He is an expirienced guide and very nice person.
You can do the hike yourself, but Nuno showed us ex. a blooming flower which I otherwise just have passed. So take him so you get more out of your trip.
reviews/9/text: atiPICO is really a professional group. We booked our climb in advance and before the climbing day we had to deal with some challenges (personal ones, nothing with Atipico). They were absolutely flexible and supportive and thanks to this we managed to join them for a climb. The climb itself was cancelled first due to weather conditions (which is completely understandable in the middle of the Atlantic ocean) and we liked very much how this company dealt with it. In one hand we really had the impression that they keep the “safety first” in mind. In the other hand they made every effort to find another slot for us before the end of our holiday and finally we had an amazing experience. Our guide was Daniel and he is a professional and experienced guide knowing the mountain very well. He was familiar with every piece of rock in the mountain :)
reviews/10/text: We had an absolutely fantastic hike with Monica. Everything was perfectly organised, communication was smooth and detailed, and she lent us some equipment before we left to be as best prepared as possible. With the regular breaks and her encouragement the hike was really amazing. But besides the great planning, the best is how lovely Monica is! Very recommend, best hike in the Açores
reviews/10/title: Best hike Pico in the Azores and Monica is the loveliest
reviews/11/text: We had an amazing experience hiking Pico with Nuno. He was super friendly, very helpful, and extremely informative. We felt safe the entire time. We learned a ton about the mountain and Pico Island. Overall was an excellent, unforgettable experience.
reviews/12/text:
The night climb of Pico Mountain with our super guide Daniel was just amazing. Daniel is really an expert, very entertaining and attentive to everyone's needs. He also had a surprise for us at the top ;) 
The climb is challenging, but definitevely worth it. The sunrise at the top was breathtaking! I highly recommend to undertake this adventure with Atipico!
reviews/12/title: Pico night climb, a memorable experience!
reviews/13/text: The day climb on Pico mountain was amazing. Really great team and Monica, the guide, is super friendly and expert about the Volcano. It was a pleasure to climb with Atipico.
reviews/14/text: I was slightly nervous about the climb but our guide Monica slowed to my pace and gave me lots of encouragement and  plenty of water breaks  when I needed them. A wonderful experience with lots of facts and information  along the way and plenty of time for photos, would recommend to everyone
reviews/14/title: A rewarding hike with an amazing guide
reviews/15/text: An amazing experience to climb Pico Mountain by night. We just need to follow Daniel, our very nice guide and to keep the rhythm in this paintful path. Thanks for all explanations, regular breaks, very useful poles and coffee at the top. Daniel also made beautiful pictures of the group. Admire the stars during the ascent, waiting for the sunrise, heated by fumaroles and discover the caldeira coming back by day, with a nice and small group of young people, except us 😉!
reviews/15/title: Climb Pico by night with coffee and fumeroles at the top, amazing !
reviews/16/text: We had an excellent trip with our guide Nuno, all the way to the top of Pico mountain and back. My wife was a bit scared on the way down, but Nuno took special care to guide her steps down the steep slopes. In addition to this, he had an in depth knowledge of the volcano and the island, which he enthustiastically shared with us.
reviews/16/title: Wonderful trip with a wonderful guide
reviews/17/text:
If you decide to climb Pico, I highly recommend doing it with a guide due to the rugged terrain, strenuous climb (i.e., knowing when to turn back) and high chance of bad weather/getting lost in the fog. Everyone visiting is required to wear GPS, have the proper footwear and carry at least 1.5L of water.  

I had the time of my life crossing off this bucket list item thanks to my guide Nuno and his wife Mónica at Atipico Azores who guided me and also taught me how to move cows out of the road with my car. :) As a solo traveler I felt so much more comfortable going with them! 

Not only are they great guides but also knew a ton about local endemic species of birds + plants! There are other touring companies but Atipico is a small local family business you want to support!
reviews/17/title: Best company to do Mount Pico with! 🏔
reviews/18/text: We had an amazing hiking experience with super guide Monica. She gave a lot of information about (Mount) Pico and knew to entertain us from beginning till the end so all participants became one happy group. This was without any doubt a highlight of our stay in Pico/Azores.
reviews/19/text: Incredible experience!! We went on a private tour with Nuno and it was stellar.  Nuno was able to quickly adapt to the pace we wanted to go up which was perfect. We felt safe on the mountain, had fun, and summited in 2.5 hours! I doubt we would have been able to do it without Nuno's guidance. Nuno is a great conversationalist and very knowledgeable about the local flora and fauna (especially birds), geology, and the Azores in general.  We learned a lot!  Lastly, our rental car fell through and they helped us arrange a taxi so we wouldn't miss the hike, then helped us get to Lajes after the hike. Thank you Nuno and Monica for a day we will never forget!!!!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from atiPICO tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel, Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9500 Portugal
description:
We organize your Epic Adventure! From Canyoning to Rock Climbing, adventure is always guaranteed!
Canyoning is our biggest passion and we want to share it with you in the best way possible! For us, the main secret is, SMALL GROUPS AND PERSONAL EXPERIENCES!
Adventures in Azores - São Miguel! Canyoning in Azores is a must do!
name: Azores Epic Adventures
reviews/0/text: Very professional guides, breathtaking landscapes and a great experience with the right balance between accessibility and adventure
reviews/1/text:
It was amazing! We had a great time and Bea & Francisco were just lovley! 
They also helped us with some tips for the island after the trip.
reviews/2/text:
This was the highlight of our trip! Beatriz and Francisco were, professional, knowledgeable, friendly and very customer-experience centric. All safety procedures were conducted and we felt really safe and all their equipment looked brand new. The location is amazing as well, so beautiful!
Bia also even gave us some great tips for some beautiful walking routes to enjoy for the rest of our stay which we definitely wouldn't have found. Thank you so much for everything!
reviews/3/text: Francisco and Bea are the kindest and most personable guides you can find. We were able to rappel, slide down a waterfall, jump off a cliff, and zipline. My partner and I are not good swimmers, yet they made us feel 100% safe and comfortable at all times. Words cannot fully express what an amazing experience this was. Truly an epic adventure! This was by far my favourite activity while on São Miguel.
reviews/4/text: We went canyoning here and it was amazing! The guides were very kind and we had a fun time! Jumping of cliffs and sliding from waterfalls all was very thrilling, but everything was as safe as could be here. Definitely should do this!
reviews/5/text: We had so much fun! Francisco and Bea are a great team. They carefully explained every activity and offered options for all levels of comfort and skill. A great way to experience the beauty of São Miguel. And we really appreciated Francisco’s recommendations for restaurants and other activities on the island.
reviews/6/text: we just did this this activity Daniela was an amazing guide. for those afraid of heights, they are very professional and keep safety always a priority. a great family activity.
reviews/7/text:
We had a great canyoning experience with a nice small group of 8. Francisco and Bea are both super professional and also fun and super nice people.
Would definitely recommend, thanks so much guys!
reviews/8/text: We joined Epic for canyoning with their Epic adventure. We got to the meet-up early, and saw several other companies going out with 15 or more people. (Foreshadowing, the other outfits held us all up at various points because they took on too many people of too many varying capabilities). Epic Adventures was quick to reply to my initial request and worked with me to find the right time/date/adventure that worked for our desired fun-goals. Having canyoned before in other countries, I was shocked at the safety of everything and the extremely high quality and newness of all the gear. It was fabulous! The gear was just unheard of with other groups we've done this with in other places. They were super informative, super friendly, and just so much fun to work with in a SMALL GROUP. The size of their groups sets them apart -- they don't run 15+ people at once. They make sure the attendees are matched and a small group so everyone has the best experience. It was clear - after seeing the other outfits on site -- that Epic Adventures was above and beyond the others. And, we did some things differently than the generic other outfits. I can't say enough good things, and I've learned to research what gear they offer, and the group size. Epic has it all, and I can't wait to do it again when I come back. (Also, it was raining when we canyoned... it made it so much better... don't back out if it's raining. Extra waterfalls. Loved it!!!)
reviews/9/text: I am leaving a nice review for this company because even though we weren't able to use it during our visit to the Azores, they provided excellent information and helped me locate a canyoning company that would fit my needs. We needed transportation from the cruise terminal and Azores Epic Adventures answered several of my emails to help me locate a company that could pick us up. They also were so kind and encouraging in their emails with me, wishing me many happy years of canyoning. A great company!!! Thank you, Azores Epic Adventures!
reviews/10/text: We booked an Family Canyoning Adventure and had a excellent experience! Francisco and Bea are great guides - perfectly organized, funny, super friendly and great with the kids! We felt always safe and the gear was in excellent condition. Highly recommend!
reviews/11/text: We did the family canyoning and had a great!! time. The challenges werent too bad and our 6 year old had a blast. Bea and Francesco did a perfect job. We would definitely book a tour with them again! Thabks for this amazing time.
reviews/11/title: So much fun, definitely a must do
reviews/12/text: All in the name....Epic! Amazing first time experience, instructions and safety tips were very professionaland clear. Took my son (14) and neice (15) and they have been talking about it since. Over and beyond what Iwe expected. This is definately an adventure you do not wany to miss. Many thanks to our great guides we will definately do this again no questions asked. 1❤
reviews/13/text: Bea and Francisco are super! Absolutelly funny and safe activity. Worth it to try, you won’t regret it!
reviews/14/text:
I went Kayaking and rode an e-bike through Furnas with a stopover for lunch to try the Cozido das Furnas local speciality.  The kayaking wasn't challenging because it on a lake but it was really picturesque, and my guide was super informative.  I also loved e-biking around the lake and town to get a different perspective.  

I also did SUP paddle boarding for the first time on the Green and Blue lakes!  I loved it though as a first-time, any bit of wind, made it super-challenging.  I had an awesome time though.  

I forgot to mention that the guys were really sweet- I mentioned something about particular Portuguese sweets, and they brought some for me to try.  Super thoughtful!
reviews/14/title: Kayaking, E-Bike and even SUP paddle boarding!
reviews/15/text:
I’m so happy we booked this experience. Our family loves epic adventures when traveling and this definitely nailed it. My daughter (9yr old) loved the adventure and the closeness to nature and jumping off waterfalls, priceless! My teen son (13yr old) had an amazing experience as well! 

Francisco and Bea were so professional, their equipment was taken cared off, and the safety instructions were cleared and followed at all times. Been in Portugal for a few years we can tell how safety rules are not always followed. 

Great experience! Recommending it to all my friends visiting the Azores!
reviews/16/text: We had a marvelous afternoon with our two guides. They gave us enough confidence to do all the jumping and climbing.
reviews/17/text: Great family experience with 2 friendly coaches. We really enjoyed our first canyoning in this beautiful environmemt. We will recommend you :-)
reviews/18/text: Lots of fun. Bea and Francisco were great and made us feel safe. They provide all the gear, including special shoes for walking in water. Highly recommended.
reviews/19/text: My husband and I are visiting Sao Miguel from the US and we found this excursion prior to coming and had to do it. We reached out to Azores Epic Adventure on instagram with our questions and got responses immediately. Then when the day came we could not have asked for a better time. Francisco and Bea were awesome, they taught you and coached you through all the obstacles in a fun and safe way. I felt comfortable enough to jump off a 5 meter cliff which I never in my life thought I'd be able to do! We highly recommend using this company. Thank you Azores Epic Adventures for an amazing first time canyoning, hopefully we see you in the future if we come back!
reviews/19/title: A must do! Awesome time with awesome guides!

address: Rua Nossa Senhora das Candeias n.1D, Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9545-242 Portugal
description: Have you ever thought about riding a 4 Wheeler / Atv to the highest points that surround the most paradisiacal craters of the planet? Ride on jeeps specially designed for adventure tours? Have you Ever thought of swimming in the middle of the volcanoes? Check out our plans and make your stay even more unforgettable with our expert guides, all with the maximum safety and comfort for you and your family.
name: Azores Outdoor Activities
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Quad Biking - Sete Cidades from North Coast (Half Day)
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Quad Bike Tour - Lagoa de Fogo (Half Day)
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Quad Bike Tour - Sete Cidades from North Coast (Full Day) with lunch
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Side by Side Tour - Sete Cidades from North Coast (Half Day)
reviews/0/text:
We had a great trip around Sete Cidades, with a very nice guide 

Very safe and family friendly tour

Remember an extra jacket for the tour in the mountains
reviews/1/text:
Phillipe and Tony are the coolest people on this island and great local guides.

English is impeccable.
We were slightly concerned beforehand about travelling on a quad but straight away once you sit on the bike you know you are in the hands of professionals and you are safe.

Very accomodating due to last minute car puncture so they have got the customer service to back up this fantastic venture.

Trust me this is bucket list material!
reviews/1/title: The Best Way To See The Azores
reviews/2/text:
It was a great tour! 3.30 hours we saw the island again from another side. The guide made short breaks again and again and told us what about the island and answered questions. Also the technical briefing was super explained. For two there was enough space on a quad. The route sections wait easy to tricky but the guide explained everything very well and adapts the speed of the group. Between driver and passenger could also be exchanged.  
The tour was super fun and can only be recommended.
reviews/3/text: We had an amazing time in a small-group quad tour! Really fun way to see the countryside and Sete Cidades.
reviews/4/text:
The guide spoke english very welll and was professional. The guide took us to different locations around Sete Cidades that ANC did not take us too. I enjoyed seeing additional look out points on this tour. The tour starts from the guides home but is easy to once you have the address. There is also a friendly dog to pet upon arrival and we also received a sample of pineapple jam upon departure. 
There is cafe at the mid point where you can grab a coffee or ice cream or drink as you please. I would recommend bringing warm clothes as it gets cold in the mountains.
Overall great experience.
reviews/5/text:
This excursion is amazing for those who want to sense the real vibe of the island from a very close distance.

It takes you all the way from the base of the crater to the top of the highest peak of the mountain giving you amazing sceneries to enjoy.

The guide who was leading the way in showing us around was very polite helpful and fun throughout the journey. A little surprise was awaiting for us at the end. Couldn’t recommend it more!
reviews/5/title: The Best way to see and feel the Island!
reviews/6/text: 4 of us spent the afternoon driving ATV's through the countryside of Sao Miguel to Sete Cidades. The tour takes you around the edge of the caldera along a small dirt track, winding up at the small town at the lake before heading back. In addition to being fun to drive on, this dirt tack affords views of the caldera you would not be able to see if you drove your car to the lake. The ride to and from the caldera was also fantastic. Views out over the island to the ocean were visible as we drove through the small towns up and down the mountain. Our guide was fantastic and the ATVs were in great shape. Overall the tour does take 3-4 hours. Our favorite tour of the trip!
reviews/6/title: Our favorite tour in the Azores
reviews/7/text:
We had a great afternoon guided tour around sete cidades, riding buggy. It was the first time riding a buggy, but we had no problem.
We highly recommend.
Thank you Filipe and see you soon for another tour in São Miguel.
A+F
reviews/8/text: The experience was great. The staff is very kind and professional. They were very supportive during the whole activity and we had lot of fun. We would repeat without doubt.
reviews/9/text: A must when visiting the Azores! We only did the half day but would have loved to do the full day with Filipe, he was a great tour guide and was so much fun
reviews/10/text:
Me and my girlfriend did a Sete Cidades half day quad bike tour through off-roads around the Azore's lakes. It was splendid! We weren't as experienced with the quad bikes as Filipe, so he started with a lower pace and increased as we got more comfortable. We originally scheduled it to a Thursday morning, but due to the better weather conditions on Wednesday, he suggested us to reschedule it and I'm glad we did! The views were astonishing due to the good weather and Filipe told some really interesting tales and curious facts at the trip pauses. We really liked the experience and encourage others to give it a try! The gist of it: if you're planning to get into all the Sete Cidades viewpoints by car, this is definitely a better call!

Jose
reviews/10/title: Awesome experience! Forget the viewpoints, best way to enjoy the views on Sete Cidades
reviews/11/text:
We both really enjoyed the whole time of the atv tour. Our guide was really nice and well educated about the island and nature. 
There tours are made for everybody and the nature surroundings are incredible !!!!
reviews/12/text: If you visit São Miguel Island this company is a must do! Their team is amazing and the tour is fantastic. Just say YES! 🤩
reviews/13/text: We had a fantastic day with Azores Outdoors private tour. We were so happy to have had such and amazing tour guide. Very kind and knowledgable.
reviews/14/text:
Very professional and friendly staff.
My family and I had such an amazing experience riding the ATV Quads in São Miguel.Filipe was awesome with my kids and took time in stopping so we could capture the beautiful sceneries of the island.
Would definently recommend to anyone who is looking for a good time and experience great memories 👍👍
reviews/15/text: We had an amazing time with Feliep he took me and my group of 6 around to such beautiful spots where we were able to take photos and learn a little about each spot. we all had such A great experience with him and can't wait to rent the ATVs again
reviews/16/text: This was a wonderful trip over stunning and scenic views of Cete Sidades. We’ve been riding over a few mountains and lakes, that was inspirational. Filipe, our guide, was professional and gave us interesting facts about visited places. Absolutely recommend to book this tour.
reviews/17/text: My husband and I took two tours, the half day logoa do Fogo Jeep tour and the full day cete Cidades ATV tour. The first day it was really foggy and we weren’t able to see any views but we still had a great time. Our tour guide Ricardo did a lot of fun stuff with us that we wouldn’t of been able to do otherwise! The next day we had amazing weather for the ATV tour and the views and our tour guide Filipe were amazing! We had a great time in the azores, I would highly recommend these guys!
reviews/17/title: We had a great two days!!
reviews/18/text:
We rented one ATV for half a day for the Sete Cidades tour. Felipe was our guide and the organisation used whatsapp to confirm the location/timing etc which was real easy for us.

Bring clothes that can get dirty as the off road means dust. 

We did this for the first time ever and had a lot of fun. The guide was very friendly, great in general (good English) and took us to several must-see secret spots, like the one in the pic.
reviews/18/title: Great half day of fun in Sete Cidades!
reviews/19/text: Took the ATV’s (quads) up to Sete Cidades! Loved every minute of it! Phillipe, our guide was wonderful. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Kept an eye on the weather as it can change pretty quick in the mountains. Will definitely book this excursion again. Some suggestions for those interested; wear clothing that can get dirty, splash/rain pants, rain jacket and I brought a kerchief to wear across my nose and mouth to help with dust. It can be cool and foggy one minute and gorgeous and sunny the next.
reviews/19/title: Awesome way to see the island!!!

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9560-079 Portugal
description: Greenzone offers tours to all parts of the island of S.Miguel. Sete Cidades, Lagoa do Fogo, Furnas, and Nordeste. We take many secondary roads to see views that others miss out on. We travel in LandRover Defender Jeeps. Groups are welcome. We also do shore excursions for cruise ships. Please contact us for more information.
name: Greenzone Azores Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Off the Beaten Track Half Day Sete Cidades Jeep Tour
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Jeep Tour Full Day Sete Cidades & Lagoa do Fogo with lunch and drinks included.
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Full Day Jeep Tour Furnas with lunch (Cozido) and drinks included
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Private Tour 1-4 people Full Day Sete Cidades & Lagoa do Fogo
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Private Mini Van Sete Cidades and Lagoa do Fogo (1-8 people)
reviews/0/text: This afternoon we took a half day jeep tour to see the iconic Sete Cidades. But Mother Nature had other plans in store for us. The weather was overcast, a bit rainy and foggy. Our wonderful, very knowledgeable and a proud Azorean tour guide Eduardo explained honestly that as we climbed elevation towards Sete Cidades the fog would become thicker. So he recommended another way to turn this unfavorable situation into a positive experience- and it brilliantly did. Being a jeep tour, he took us off-road where we got to see villages along the coast, the countryside and island gems that we would never have dreamt doing ourselves. Having such a tour guide who wants to show you the best the island offers is a sure winner. It was definitely worthwhile and we enjoyed every minute of it.
reviews/1/text: Our family of 3 had an amazing tour with our guide Rodrigo. We visited Furnas and toured Terra Nostra which is beautiful. We’ve never seen so many camillias in one place. We got to see the boiling calderas and ate the traditional cozido, wow that was a lot of food. It was delicious but we barely put a dent in it. We then toured the north part of the island. Rodrigo took us to some neat off the beaten path spots to see the ocean and some incredible drop offs. Overall it was a great experience! We learned a lot about the island and made us excited to see more!
reviews/2/text: Our tour guide was Mariano, and he was great! We saw a lot of cool sites, and he was very friendly and informative! If you're a solo traveller without access to a car, this is for sure worth doing as you get to see a lot of the islands hi-lights, very glad I chose this jeep tour rather than chancing it on the infamous island busses! Great activity, takes all the hard work out of it for you!
reviews/3/text: Our tour was Fantastic we took the tour to Nordeste. Mariano knows so much about the island and told us little interesting facts a long the way that I fee other tour guides don’t do. Like he stopped to have us a fee a bush and explained the softer leaves are the flowers. I liked that added detail and I felt like I learned a lot on the tour and we saw amazing sites. It was just me and my friend since we were his first tour of the season and I told him we like walking and saw one of the sites on the tour already so he changed the tour a bit and we hiked to a lake we haven’t a seen and also hiked to one of the waterfalls. It was a great experience. Lunch was excellent, choice of fish or beef and if you do a tour on a Friday I think they have a buffet. When we were going through the woods in nordeste the tree cutters had this big truck blocking the way and it looked impossible to cross and Mariano worked it out with them and it was a fragile situation since we were on a cliff. It all worked out and we passed and then on the way back a tree fell and blocked our way! He called and a forester came and chopped down the tree. What an adventure. It was nice though, we took the opportunity to walk around the road which was flanked by trees and beautiful foliage. Highly recommend greenzone and Mariano
reviews/4/text: I had the opportunity to take two tours with Greenzone Azores Tours during my stayu in San Miguel. Both tours guides were very professional and quite informative. This is a good way to see the beauty of the island bu those who know the island well and are very well informed of the island's history and culture.
reviews/4/title: Great way to see the beauty of San Miguel.
reviews/5/text:
I was traveling alone and was difficult to find a tour, as everyone needed at least 2 people for a tour.

But I got lucky with Greenzone and they were very quick with replying to my mails and trying to help me to see the most during my short stay

The guide Ricardo is amazing - he is very knowledgeable about the Azores and was always happy to accommodate our needs - a couple wanted to watch a football game, while another girl and myself, we wanted to see the Lake. He was also helpful with restaurant recommendations for our dinner later in the evening and was very flexible with the itinerary. Thank you so much for an amazing day
reviews/6/text: We really enjoyed the 2 days trips we did with Greezone. The first day we visited sete cidades and lagoa de fogo with Vasco and the second day nordeste trip with Ricardo. Both guides were extremely friendly, explained a lot during the trip and,although the weather wasn't helping, tried their best and modified the route to make the best of the day. We highly recommend Greenzone for anyone visiting Sao Miquel!
reviews/6/title: Full day trip in Sao Mogiel
reviews/7/text: it's was amazing experience I really enjoyed. Sergio was an amazing guide. He knows everything about the place and always he helped with the pics. All was great!!!
reviews/8/text:
We had a fantastic tour with Henrique today. Greenzone accommodated us with only 24 hours notice and arranged a tour to meet our time constraints, picking us up at the airport on a layover from Santa Maria and dropping us off ten minutes early for our desired time to make our next flight. 
The tour was perfect. Henrique was extremely helpful and knowledgeable about the island. He catered the trip to our needs and never rushed us, making small changes as he learned what we liked best. 
The lunch at furnas was amazing and more than we could eat. 
Everything about this tour was great. We'll definitely book with greenzone again!
reviews/8/title: Fantastic last minute tour with Henrique was perfect
reviews/9/text: My husband and I have just returned from a vacation in the Azores, including time on Sao Miguel Island.  While on Sao Miguel we spent several days on tour with Daniel Cabral, guide extraordinarre from GreenZone Tours.  We did not do a "tour" listed on trip advisor.  Instead, we had booked guided tours for 2.5 days with the details left to the tour company in discussion with us.  We met Daniel on our first afternoon and he was our guide for the entire time on Sao Miguel.  We discussed with Daniel the types of activities we wanted. He tailored our days to include exactly what we wanted and even more.  Each day was longer than the amount of time we had booked because he wanted us to see and experience everything Sao Miguel had to offer--and that is quite a lot. Daniel made the trip truly extraodinary.  We were picked up and dropped off right at the hotel and Daniel planned our days.  We loved the nature, the history, the culture and all of our activities--from hiking, bathing in thermal baths in Furnas, and "water tasting" at caldeira do vulcao dos furnas.  I had mentioned how much I liked the bread known as bolos levedos, and Daniel even went to the bakery that is famous for this type of bread and bought us some.  If you are fortunate enough to vacation in the Azores, do yourself a favor and book this Company and then ask for Daniel.
reviews/10/text: We spent 5 days touring the island with Green Tours, specifically Daniel. He was awesome; receptive to change, versatile, funny and very knowledgeable. Our vacation was made so much more special by this tour. I can’t recommend it enough
reviews/11/text: What a stunning landscape, one f the most beautiful islands I have visited.  We had the pleasure of having Eduardo (Eddy) as our driver/guide for the tour.  This really is an ‘off the beaten track’ tour in a Landrover.  Eddy was informative and a pleasure to spend half a day with taking 4 of us around the rim of the volcanic crater with views over the entire crater and the two lakes below, before heading down to the bottom of the crater through the lush green landscape.  We also drove through some of the villages before finally getting Eddy to recommend a local sea front restaurant for lunch.  We asked him to join us (not part of the tour) and he ensured we experienced an amazing meal of many of the local seafood delicacies as well as local steak.  The whole experience was fantastic and well worth every cent.  I would recommend this tour to everyone and if you are fortunate enough to get Eddy as a guide take advantage of his local knowledge and enjoy the trip.  Many thanks Eddy.
reviews/12/text:
My friend and I had two different tours with Ricardo and we absolutely loved it! First tour was to Sete Cidades and even though the weather wasn’t perfect, we still saw some great places and were really happy with this half day experience. 
Two days after we went on a full day tour to the opposite side of the island and it was also great! Amazing views one after the other!
It was especially nice to see how Ricardo adapted the tour to our interests.
We absolutely loved the experience and will totally come back for more another year!
reviews/13/text: Full day Lagoa Fogo and hiking in the soroundings. Our guide, Daniel, was amazing. Great knowledge, flexible, many great ideers. We had a fantastic tour.
reviews/14/text: I normally wouldn’t leave a bad review but I’m incredibly frustrated. I’m only on a three day trip to the Azores. I booked a trip in advance with Greenzone Azores. I had a reminder email at 8am this morning reminding me of the booking and then two emails tonight cancelling the tour with less than 24 hours notice. Blamed on cancellations from other people. I’m now trying to book a tour with another company and hoping that I’ll be able to still see Sete Cidades. Very unhappy.
reviews/15/text: My daughter and I took a trip to the Azores July 2019 with her school and were lucky enough to have Eduardo as our guide! It takes a special skill to engage, not only a group aged from 9 to 75. Eduardo was absolutely amazing. He was so entertaining and knowledgeable . He really tried to accommodate everyone, like when he stopped unexpectedly to let the kids say hi to some cows, or his general cheerfulness and happiness, which was a great way to start the day. He was able to adjust our schedule as needed so we could go to the top or the ridge on a sunny day.  This was our first trip to Europe and Eduardo made it unforgettable in every way! If we tour again, we know who we will request!! I cannot say enough wonderful things about Eduardo. He is just a great guide, a wonderful person. He truly is making the world a better place.
reviews/16/text:
3 days with Riccardo & Mario to visit all Sao Miguel. These younger guys are very professional. Thanks for your job. 
Great experience for us.
reviews/17/text: I did the half day tour to Lagoa do Fogo and not only saw the lake but several other beautiful viewpoints along the way.  The guide was also very accommodating and made an effort to personalize the tour with extra stops in the towns and other points of interest.
reviews/18/text:
Our very knowledgeable tour guide provided us with a wonderful day of panoramic views along the north coast, a visit to the historical Porto Formoso Tea Planation, the Lagoa das Furnas, the Furnas village & gardens within the caldera.  We enjoyed our steamy dip in the natural hot spring pool, along with our yummy Cozido lunch cooked in the volcanic heat.  We had a visit to view the unique waterfall at the Natural park Ribeira dos Caldeiroes and carried on to Villa Franca do Campo on the south coast which included a stunning sunset view from the Sanctuary of Senhor DaPaz.  We finished off our tour by visiting a local pub to toast our successful tour.
Many thanks to Daniel.   A Must-do tour for first time visitors!
reviews/18/title: Sao Miguel - EAST- Fantastic Tour with Daniel - GreenZone Azores Tours
reviews/19/text:
We took the Sete Cidades Jeep tour with Daniel and it was incredible. We were a group of 7 which including 3 children (ages 11, 6 and 2). Daniel was extremely patient with our family and showed us a great time. As an Azorean native he is extremely knowledgeable about the island and showed us things that are not on a map or in a guidebook. He also took us to a great restaurant for lunch. 

Luckily, the weather cooperated and we were able to have a great view of Sete Cidades and Lagoa do Fogo. We were so impressed with our tour we wanted to rebook our tour later in the week with a different company but were ultimately unable. However, we will definitely use Greentours and request Daniel on our next trip to Sao Miguel! Thanks again Daniel for a great tour!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Greenzone Azores Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9500-706 Portugal
description: Canyoning, E-Biking,, MTB, ccean and lake Kayaking, Hiking, Rock Climbing, Jeep Tours and all outdoor adventure travel activities in the beautiful atlantic Islands of the Azores - Portugal!
name: Azores Adventure Islands
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Canyoning Experience - half day
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: E-bike Sete Cidades- "All Mountain" bike program
ranking: #2 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #2 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
reviews/0/text: Wonderfull kayak tour with wonderful guide. Nice rocks.  Nice riffs. Waves. Wetter ass, but it is no problem.
reviews/1/text: What a great adventure! Recommend highly. Felt safe with Zé and João, who were calm and encouraging and careful, and who also took and shared great GoPro videos and photos that were included free of charge. Thank you for a great day!
reviews/2/text: We went on the e-mountainbike tour round Sete Cidades. It was a fun and very beautiful tour. André was the perfect guide, who told us a lot of stories and facts during the tour, meanwhile making sure that everyone was having a good time.
reviews/3/text: The guide catered to our needs and gave us lots of freedom but was not as interpretive as we had hoped. We paddled the coast of the Caloura area for 3 hours as experienced paddlers which was very enjoyable. Note that the weather changes constantly and the PFDs provided did not quite fit us properly (too big). Would go again.
reviews/3/title: Very cool experience in a beautiful area.
reviews/4/text: The tour was awesome!  Andre (guide) was very friendly and adapted the tour based on our biking experience!  Andre is a local person and is just the type of person you'd want to hang around with all day long!  Great summary of the city attractions, historic and hints of places to visit more in depth! -Charles&Colette
reviews/5/text:
I was lucky to join a tour with just a small group of people so we had an intense exchange within the team. The guide where incredible - I felt save the whole time, we had soo much fun during the whole event. Nothing to complain about.
I did the half-day FUN activity which had several jumps and some repelling - in the end I should have done the full day since it was awesome. Not only the canyoning itself but also the nature on the Azores was breathtaking.

Thanks to the whole team for this experience!!
reviews/5/title: Canyoning? Then THIS is your perfect host!!
reviews/6/text: Lovely half day kayaking tour on Lake Furnas. Booking was very easy and our guide was helpful, knowledgeable and flexible. Just our family of four paddling happily about a peaceful Lake Furnas. Good reliable company - would recommend.
reviews/6/title: Wonderful guided kayaking on Lake Furnas
reviews/7/text:
What a great day hiking through nature with guides loving their jobs ending with a local lunch experience and exploration of the hot pools in Furnas
Highly recommended
reviews/8/text: We had such an amazing time kayaking with Andre in Sete Cidades! The experience was so much fun, and Andre was the best guy - definitely recommend it!!
reviews/9/text:
Excellent canyoning experience at Ribeira de Salga with guides Rodrigo and Inês. The price is very fair, 85€ for a half-day tour, all equipment included. Totally recommended! 
The company is specialized in canyoning so there are a lot of canyons to choose from, so we are spoiled for choice. 

Very easy, helpful and quick booking via email before we arrived in São Miguel. Even when we needed to postpone the tour due to very rough whale watching trip with another company, they were very understanding and flexible to rebook, so that we can have the best experience. Really appreciate it! 

Even when there were just the two of us, they still ran the tour, so we felt very luxurious like a private tour. The guides are professional, friendly, helpful and assuring. They took good care of us, offering help on challenging steps. The photos and videos they provided are great, too! 
Great contact with the whole team, Nicole and Dionísio!
reviews/9/title: Book with them for the best canyoning experience!
reviews/10/text:
My son and I were in the Azores for only one day and decided to do a van tour of Sete Cidades at the last minute. Our hotel said all of the usual tours were booked up, but Azores Adventures could do it. This company usually does more adventurous outing but since it wad rainy and foggy they were available. We were told we may not see much due to the weather but we wanted to go anyway.

Rodrigo and Ines picked us up at our hotel right on time. On the drive, they discussed a lot of fact about the Azores, the history and just some friendly conversation. The spoke great Engish, which made it a better experiance for us two Americans.

Although the weather was bad, Rodrigo and Ines made a great effort to show us all they could on the island and the Sete Cidades area. They almost seemed apologetic about the weather, but we knew we would not see much due to the weather. You could tell they really cared about us enjoying the tour and went out of their way to make it the best experience possible. They are both wonderful people.

You will probably looking to use this company for a hike, kayak or bike tour and not a van tour like we did, but you should know that Rodrigo and Ines are great guides who will make sure you have a good time-----Thanks
reviews/11/text: The instructors were really good. They made us feel safe the whole time. It was really fun and they adapted to us.
reviews/12/text: Thanks to the great guides Inês and João for the amazing experiences. Thanks for being patient. They show many things of the island during the way
reviews/12/title: Amazing canyoning in São Miguel Island
reviews/13/text:
What a lucky day for me! A ‘private’ Faial da Terra and Sanguinho hiking trail tour by Andrei and Inês! They are considerate, friendly and generous guides and photographers! Will definitely come back for the canoeing adventures tour and maybe other tours from them. Would absolutely recommend this company! 
Ps: I owe them a drink (sorry I forgot) didn’t want to hold you guys longer! Take care and thank you again for today!
reviews/13/title: Faial da Terra and Sanguinho tour
reviews/14/text: Really good experience with Rodrigo and Andrei (or Ander, bot sure). They were really professionals and funny people, we enjoyed a lot and we felt really safe with them. We will repeat with the company for sure if possible in another island!
reviews/14/title: Really good company for canyoning experience in Sao Miguel
reviews/15/text: Extremely nice and knowledgeable guide. We were just a group of 3, so he could take care of our needs very well. Landscape was beautiful while biking, bikes were great and the tour just fun. We also learned a lot about the island and region.
reviews/15/title: Great MTB half day tour with beautiful scenery.
reviews/16/text: We did a half day canyoning as a family of 5 with 3 children (10,8 and 6). It was the highlight of our trip. The guides were so kind and patient with our kids- helping them down the waterfalls. This meant that any nerves were swiftly overcome and the kids were asking if we could go again. We had the best morning! Thank you.
reviews/17/text: The canyoning tour (approx. 3 hours) was so amazing. The guides are making this to a special experience for the whole group. Definitely a must do when you are at Sao Miguele!!
reviews/18/text:
We were looking for a good sportive mountainbike tour during our stay in Furnas, but didn't find  XL mountainbikes/
with azores adventure islands we found a flexible organisation that brought us all and more than we needed : they brought us excellent bikes, picked us up at the hotel and brought us to the rim of the Caldeira, from where we climbed further to the nature reserve of Pico Da Vara up to  1000 meter, where we drove around with  excellent guides and than descended to a wonderful Mirador viewpoint in the north east of the island. It was great fun both for me and my  suns. beautiful descents on gravel roads through the woods. 
From there we drove further around the island to the southeast where we took picknick close to the sea. THe van picked us up and brought us another time higher up in the hills to the reserve, from where we made a second wonderful tour. 
Great biking tour with excellent guiding and material!
Have no doubts.
for those who are less fit : You can also do this tour with e- bikes, 

We were so enthusiastic about their professional organisation, that we booked a kayak and scuba diving tour some days later to the small island of Villa Franco Di campo.
reviews/18/title: Excellent guided mountainbike tour around Pico Da Vara, San MIguel  with good material,  good support and great fun !
reviews/19/text: We went on an E-biking trip around Sete Cidades and we had the time of our lives :) great tour, great guys! Would recommend it to anyone!
subcategory_ranking: #2 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
