address: Horta, Faial Island Portugal
description: Our island provides unique moments to visitors of the Azorean Triangle islands of Faial, Pico and Sao Jorge, immersing them in the nature, culture and history of the islands. Accompanied by local guides, Our island provides a variety of tours with the goal of sharing unforgettable experiences.
name: Our island
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Banana Trip - Full day private tour to Pico with Round Trip from Faial
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: 10 Volcanos hiking private tour in Faial
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Caldeira do Faial Descent - private hiking tour
offer_group/offer_list/3/title: Pico Mountain Climbing private tour - with round trip from Faial
offer_group/offer_list/4/title: Trail Running private tour in Faial
photo/caption: Caldeira descent with our Guide Pedro
reviews/0/text: Excellent bike tour of Faial with Luis. Trip was well organized, equipment worked well, and Luis was very accommodating.  My son and I enjoyed the ride.
reviews/1/text: I made an incredible canyoning experience on Sao Jorge with my two boys (16-18). The team is very professionnal. We felt safe and secure, with the explanations and the material. The boss is so nice, encouraging the boys, taking pictures and videos. It had rained so much that we had to give up before the sea. I had my money back. Really to recommend ! I would love to do it again with less water !
reviews/2/text: Beautiful and exciting descent with Pedro and Suzana to the bottom of the Caldeira on Faial with a group of students from Germany - perfect day, perfect hike and two perfect guides! We experienced both: the special biodiversity of the Caldeira and a challenging hike!
reviews/3/text:
Our trip to the Azores was a dream come true! Even tho' the ancestral search was limited the rest of trip was terrific. The best part of OURISLANDS group is that your tour is customized for you .Seeing both Pico and Faial and experiencing everything from beaches to the terrific food was wonderful! Our guide was an extremely knowledgeable native and this made it extra special. Thank you to OurIsland!
Ellen W.
Sandra F.
reviews/4/text: We visited the Azores in March, visiting Faial, Pico, and Terceira. When we arrived at Pico, we had a tour booked to hike down into the volcano caldera. When the day came, the weather was very bad, windy and raining. When our tour guide, Louis, arrived at our hotel for the hike, he informed us that we would not be able to do the caldera hike today due to the weather and the other days when we would be at Pico were already booked up. He was probably wondering if we would just give up for the day due to the weather, but he did suggest an alternative hike, the Praia do Norte coastal hike in Faja. This was an amazing half day hike with beautiful scenery at almost every turn. It had everything: rain forest, cliffs, waterfalls, lava fields, ruins, and beautiful coastal vistas. Louis made this a great day despite the weather. He even found some fortified refreshment along the way. Thank you Louis and Our Island for the great day.
reviews/5/text: We had a one day trip to pico. Everything was excellent organized. Pablo was our guide. He shared his knowledge about plant and fruits we tasted on our hike. We wouldn't have had that experience if we did this trip on our own. Overall it was a great day.
reviews/6/text: We had 2 tours with Luis and we really enjoyed them so much! The first one was the Lagoon trail and the second one the Pico Climb. Our guide, Luis, explained a lot of things about the island (nature, volcanic formations, culture ...) and during the hiking he gave us some practical tips! Totally recommended experiences, if we return to Faial and Pico we will surely contact them again!
reviews/7/text:
We loved our day hiking with Our Island’s guide, Luis! We stayed in Pico for 3 full days and were totally in love with the island in general. After spending a day hiking Mt. Pico, we love it even more. 

From the moment I contacted Our Island via email (several months in advance), I knew we were in good hands. I found Our Island through an online magazine article singing their praises and immediately sent Rita at Our Island an email with our details.

A little bit about us: We are a family of 3 (mom, dad, 14-yo-son) who loves hiking. We’ve spent many vacations hiking +/- 3,000 foot ascents/descents through shale, scree & our fair share of bouldering so we felt prepared to do the Pico Mountain Hike. Before I did any research on the topic, I assumed we could do the hike without a guide, as we spend most of our summers trekking and hiking using online guides and maps, alltrails.com, etc. But after some consideration (and reading other reviews of the hike), we decided we definitely needed a guide. And I AM SO GLAD THAT WE DID. I completely recommend Our Island.

Luis was excellent at getting us to the mountain, through the registration process, starting our trek before the crowds, and at finding the most appropriate and environmentally respectful path up to the absolute peak. As we made our way up the mountain, we saw many places where the natural vegetation has been trampled and turned into mud because of trekkers getting off course. Luis showed us ways to hike that preserved and protected the natural fauna.

In order for amazing places like Pico Mountain to remain natural, beautiful and protected, it is essential for travelers to mindfully hike. Without a guide, tourists can truly damage the mountain without even realizing it. It is Our Island’s mission to protect these beautiful destinations.

Luis was also a pleasure to spend the day with. He was a great conversationalist, had so much to tell us about the history of Pico, his personal connection to the island, his work as a filmmaker and his goal to preserve the gorgeous environment of the Azores. 

By the end of the day we were truly exhausted (the hike down is much harder than the climb up!) but we were buzzing with energy. We reached the awe-inspiring vista and were able to see marshmallow clouds, neighboring islands and so much green. It’s one of the best family excursions we’ve had.
reviews/7/title: Amazing Hiking Guide to top of Mount Pico
reviews/8/text: We had a private full-day tour of Faial with Pedro from Our Island and had a fantastic experience!  Deeply knowledgable about the island and eager to share his personal experiences growing up on Pico, Pedro was an easy going guide and engaging conversationalist. He was also very patient and kind as one of us has mobility issues and he even checked for jelly fish and sea urchins before we snorkled! Highly recommended.
reviews/9/text: Fantastic ride across the island covering multiple terrains and ecosystems - challenging and fun (those switchbacks!). Luis had an encyclopedic knowledge of the natural history and geology of Faial. I learned so much in such a short time - and I saw so much more than you would see from a car.  I would recommend My Island to any endurance athlete who wants to get in some miles (and elevation!) and learn about their surroundings.
reviews/9/title: For the mountain biker/trail runner/ecotourist in you
reviews/10/text: My husband, Russ and I had a fabulous half day tour of Faial with Pedro at the end of July. We were able to book on short notice and Pedro was kind enough to accommodate our time frame with our return ferry schedule to Pico later that day. His knowledge of his island was so appreciated—his passion for Faial was infectious easy for us to catch on with as we visited several amazing and breathtaking locations. I would highly recommend this tour company to anyone visiting Faial.  It was a perfect way for us to see the island during our day trip from Pico. And we definitely loved the company and friendship that Pedro provided to us during the tour. His kindness and hospitality made the day a highlight!
reviews/11/text: Our Island Tour group was an awesome choice. They were extremely flexible when we needed to change our climbing dates and very attentive to all of our needs. Can’t wait for our next adventure with Our Island!
reviews/12/text: We had a wonderful full day tour of Faial with our guide Luís and Our Island. We were so glad to have such a personalized and unique experience on Faial. It is a beautiful little island with a lot of sights to see and Luís was incredibly nice and knowledgeable about the ecology, geology, and history of the island. We were picked up right from our hotel and saw so many sights, starting with the Caldeira (unfortunately, it was too foggy in the crater to see the bottom but my husband and I were able to make it back another day and hike around the ridge), then stopping at multiple lookouts and notable locations up along to the east and north coasts, had lunch on the north coast at an excellent restaurant Aldina (their octopus salad, baked octopus, and triggerfish were delicious!), hiked up one of the smaller volcanoes for an amazing view near the west side of the island, and finished snorkeling/swimming at Capelinhos. Our guide tailored the day specifically to us because he knew we were staying on the south side a little outside of downtown Horta and would be able to explore some of the southern sites on our own. Such a perfect day!
reviews/12/title: Amazing Private Full Day Tour of Faial
reviews/13/text:
We did an half day tour in Faial with Pedro Escobar! It was a wonderful trip with so much information about nature and the island features! Faial is a lovely island with diversity and unique spots. I would highly recommend this trip and Our Island team.
Pedro is a great guide and we can see he puts his heart and passion in what he does.
reviews/14/text: We did a two days tour of Faial and Pico islands with Our Island. Our guides, Luis and Pedro were fantastic. We had so much fun and learned so much! Both tours were amazing and we got to know both islands so well! highly recommended to anyone wanting to visit Faial and Pico! These guys are the best!
reviews/14/title: Faial and Pico tours with Our island travel company!
reviews/15/text: Best overall for tours in Faial and Pico. Personalized to meet all of our requests. Very knowledgeable and professional, Pedro was an awesome guide. Our Island is the way to go! Thanks again for making our time spent with you most memorable.
reviews/16/text: Pedro was very knowledgeable and accommodating. We had a fabulous tour of the island and learned so much. I would highly recommend them.
reviews/17/text:
Pedro is an amazing guide. One of the best we met. He did a taylor made trip for us.
He took us to local places of the beaten track and was very knowledgable and friendly. Shared information and stories about the island and its history, And took us to eat and drink in super nice places.
Moreover - Padro as a person was super nice, funny and human. He helped to take me to the doctor when I didn't feel well, supported the whole experience and took care of us. This was very helpful at that time. He also found me a pharmacy, a cab driver for the airport for the day we left the island.
This was the best experience we had in the Azores and I highly recommand it and him.
reviews/17/title: Amazing private tour - best of Faial
reviews/18/text:
I can't say enough about this company,  Pedro, our guide is so knowledgeable about the evolution of the island, from the people to the plants and animals and the best spots to see.
He was born and raised on Faial and is utterly passionate about his work and home, this guy is even picking up pieces of trash as he is walking a trail and explaining which plants are not native and how they are impacting the local environment.
reviews/19/text: Fernando Pinheiro picked us up the airport and took us to Hotel Canal.  The following morning Marta (sp) who works for Fernando arrived and took us on a informative, upbeat tour of Faial.  She was a really safe driver, observant about our love for wildlife so was quick to point out interesting fact along the way. A terrific tour!

address: Rua das Canadinhas 53 Pedregulho, Horta, Faial Island 9900-362 Portugal
description: Toboga Azores is located in Faial Island. We have a range of Nature Experiences made for who wants to discover the magic of Azores in a fun and personalized way, always with the interpretation of our guides. Excellence it's our everyday principle! Fun it's the only way to live our job!
name: Toboga Azores
photo/caption: KTM e-bike tour! 2 to 3 hours of fun!
reviews/0/text:
Amazing canyoning day 
a wonderful experience with a well-organised, friendly and nice team
to do again as soon as possible
reviews/1/text: We had canyoning with Bruno, he is very skilled and a great expert, he knows how todo thigs safely and how to provide a fun adventure. Absolutely recommended eveb for who is doing it for the first time!
reviews/2/text:
We ventured the 10 vulcanos trail with Bruno and we are very happy we did!

The trail is an incredibly beautiful journey, taken at a soft pace, with time to appreciate the immense natural beauty, all nature sounds and scents and learn from Bruno details from not only the places we pass, but also about the animals, the plants, the relation of the islanders with the natural context, the history, culture and traditions.

This was one of our favorite activities in the amazing Azores and we cannot wait to return!
reviews/3/text: Amazing Canyoning day in Faial Island! Beautiful landscape, waterfalls and great fun. Excellent team !
reviews/4/text: Bruno of Toboga Azores showed me Faial in one day by participating in a jeep tour. What a wonderful journey, that day! Bruno knows loads about the nature, the history of the island, the arising of volcanos, the views, the people. During the jeep tour he takes you through the whole island and talks about everything you are curious about. I felt like I've spent a great day with a friend instead of "being in a tour". Wonderful way to see and feel the island!
reviews/4/title: Get to know Faial together with Toboga Azores!
reviews/5/text: This was a really nice day with Bruno and Gonzales. We were with a small group which was nice because you didn't have to wait long for the obstacles. It was cool that you could decide your own challenges at your own paste. And i liked the fact they told us so much about the beautiful nature we came across.
reviews/6/text:
First of all I want to say I don't like heights a lot. So this was a very hard experience for me to overcome.
But Bruno helped me go all the way, his skills and confidence in every obstacle, made you feel really secure and sure of what he was doing. If i ever go to Faial again, I would do it again!
reviews/7/text: Bruno gave us a customized 4+ hour jeep tour of Faial.  He was friendly, and knowledgeable and packed in a very comprehensive island tour in a short time, although it never felt rushed.  Communication beforehand was excellent, and he picked us up promptly at the ferry terminal.  I don't usually do tours, but with limited time, this was an excellent way to see the island.  He knew all the great spots for good photographs, several of which would only have been possible in a 4 wheel drive.
reviews/7/title: Great half day jeep tour of Faial
reviews/8/text: Bruno was great at communicating with us before the trip and picked us up promptly from our hotel as planned. At every stage we felt safe and comfortable in his 4x4 - even tackling some routes that did not look possible. Bruno is very well informed about everything from volcanoes and nature, to history and current affairs - we learnt far more than if we had simply hired a car. He is really passionate about Faial is keen to make you realise why. We loved our half day tour - thank you Bruno!
reviews/9/text:
We were on Faial for five days with two kids in early April. By the end, the kids had enough hikes. So we thought we will try canyoning. We have never done it before. Bruno and João made it so much fun! I felt they were passionate about what they do, and they took their time explaining what to expect. They were fully equipped (those wet suits really worked!), and I felt safe at all times. Loved it!

Bruno was super responsive before the tour. And he gave us a nice tip for a short hike after the canyoning. I I could, I would give them more than 5 stars!
reviews/10/text: Well tailored half day jeep and hike tour. We were able to go into a former crater that was surreal and so peaceful. We also got to hike Capelinhos volcano and saw the fault like and felt the steam coming up from within the volcano.  That was very cool. Bruno was also very attentive and very knowledgeable. We very much enjoyed our tour.
reviews/11/text: I did the ten volcanoes trail with Bruno a few days ago, for my last full day in Azores. What a finale to this wonderful trip! I strongly recommend Toboga and Bruno to anyone going to Faial. This guy knows everything about this island and deeply loves it, you will feel it. Very generous of his knowledge, funny and curious, Bruno made this day pass so fast, too fast! Do this hike with him and you will not only walk and see breathtaking scenery, but also taste, smell and feel this island in a very special way. And you will meet a unique human being. I can't wait to go back and do other adventure tours with Toboga!
reviews/12/text: I went to the Azores last week with a group of girlfriends and we did a full-day Jeep tour with Bruno in Faial.  It was fabulous and the highlight of our trip!  We got to see some really gorgeous sites that we never would have found on our own or with tour books.  Bruno was also great about answering all of our questions and taking photos of us.  Plus the lunch spot was awesome.  We also did a volcano climb which was awesome, the views at the top are worth it!  I will recommend Toboga to all my friends and family who go to the Azores!
reviews/12/title: Gorgeous Day in Faial with Bruno!
reviews/13/text: I am so thankful we found this tour. Bruno made sure we saw all of the very best things that Faial has to offer. We would have missed out on so much if we tried to tour the island on our own. Bruno is very professional and knowledgable. We enjoyed seeing the beautiful coastline and visiting the volcanoes. I will definitely recommend to friends and hope to do another tour with Bruno if we are lucky enough to get to visit again. Thanks for the unforgettable day!
reviews/14/text: My husband and I had a great day touring around the island with Bruno. Despite having some tight scheduling and traveling needs (i'm pregnant), Bruno made a customized tour that allowed us to see some of the most beautiful sights and learn about the history and topography of the Faial. Bruno is energetic, smart, extremely friendly and authentic. he loves the island and loves his job. We highly recommend working with this company
reviews/14/title: Great half day trip around the island
reviews/15/text: It was a pleasure to be taken around by Bruno who seems to know everything about the region. If we hadn't done the island tour with him we'd have definitely missed out on some valuable and useful information! Canyoning was great fun. As first-timers, we were a bit nervous but Bruno and his expertise made us feel incredibly safe! Thanks :))
reviews/16/text:
Went with my dad for a day trip canyoning on Faial Island - what a great experience! about three hours of moving down through a beautiful  canyon with plenty of fun obstacles and scrambling/abseiling. Highly recommended. Bruno and his staff were very hospitable, flexible, and entertaining. 

Best thing we did on the islands!
reviews/16/title: Great Canyoning Trip on Faial Island
reviews/17/text:
We booked with late notice and Bruno and team were able to accommodate the three of us on a fantastic tour of Faial.  They picked us up from the ferry coming from Pico and returned us to our hotel in Horta which was an excellent service.   It was not just a canned tour but built around things you wanted to see. 

Would definitely contact Tobaga tours if we visit Faial again.
reviews/17/title: Top notch jeep tour of Faial!
reviews/18/text: I have traveled quite a bit and have been on numerous tours and I have to say my jeep tour of Faial with Bruno was the best! I can tell he is passionate about showing people this beautiful island. He knew the best spots to truly experience the island's beauty,  culture, history and delicious food. Bruno was professional and I felt very safe with his excellent driving and guidance to our destinations. He was so friendly and made sure the tour was always fun! He also had good suggestions for places to eat and trails to hike during my stay on the island.  Thanks so much!
reviews/19/text:
We've done canyoning on Faial with Bruno and Juan. We did canyoning for the first time. It was a really great experience. It's wonderful to see the untouched nature. You will see waterfalls that you can only see at canyoning, no other access is possible.
Thanks again to Bruno and Juan.
The importants thing was, that we always felt safe in this team!
reviews/19/title: Really really great experience with a fantastic team

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9500-157 Portugal
description: having Sao Miguel island in the Azores as a background, flexibility and versatility will always be present in the programs of T4W, having as a link the off-road ride. In a Jeep Tour may be inserted small hiking trails, themed routes, such as the tea route, teambuilding activities and other activities and experiences. The Jeep belonging to T4W is a comfortable Toyota Land Cruiser 8 seat.

reviews/0/text: You can’t ask for a more knowledgeable tour guide. We had a wonderful time and enjoyed being taken off the beaten path. The views, sights, and local experiences were just amazing!
reviews/0/title: Enjoy the hidden gems and special places the island offers
reviews/1/text:
Was best tour we’ve had.  Delfim was an amazing guide and has so much information about the island.  Will definitely use again.  Highly recommend.  Was the most enjoyable day we had the 2 weeks we were there.  
Thank you Delfim.
reviews/1/title: Wonderful, educational, fun, best experience we had at Sao Miguel.
reviews/2/text: We hired t4w for 2 days of private tours while on the island and it was the most amazing experience! Delfim was fantastic! He was SO knowledgeable about the island and answered all our questions. He even paid special attention to my 5 year old who was very interested in the volcanos! I cannot recommend this experience enough.
reviews/3/text: We had one day to explore the island of Sao Miguel and Felipe was the guy to show us...what a fantastic tour guide! I wish we had more time but I'm glad we pushed to fit everything in. What a beautiful island!  See map below for our destination points. Loved it all!
reviews/4/text:
Our family of eight spent multiple days touring with Telmo and Filipe.  Our visit to the Azores greatly exceeded our expectations and the guys at T4W were a significant reason why.  

They picked up us on time each morning and were flexible when we changed plans,  Telmo and Filipe know the island inside out and answered all our questions.  We asked a ton of questions!
reviews/5/text:
It was our first time in the Azores Island of São Miguel and its beauty speaks for itself. Nonetheless, the T4W team was able to surprise us and show the most beautiful hidden corners of this island… It was a safe and very comfortable road trip, we did not even felt the bumps of the mountain road! 😊 But the best part was the amazing history lessons complemented by the beautiful landscapes… A day full of entertainment, laughs and surprises! We felt like we were amongst old friends! We loved it! 

Even though it’s something that you can only truly experience in person, hopefully our pictures will transport you to this amazing road trip!

Thank you T4W team for this amazing day! Hopefully we will see you again soon! #Gowiththeflow 😉
reviews/5/title: Even in a rainy day the T4W team made magic happen!
reviews/6/text: My friend and I had the best time with Delfin. He took us to the best spots and was very knowledgeable. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Hope to do it again!
reviews/7/text: Great time chatting with the very knowledgeable Telmo our excellent driver, great views too of this amazing place.
reviews/8/text: Dilfem took us on a spectacular drive all around Sao Miguel. It was rainy and foggy but he still somehow ensured that we had the best experience possible. It felt like we saw the entire island in one day and got to experience amazing things! Couldn't be happier that we pulled the trigger on this tour :)
reviews/9/text: Incredible tour! Our guide was phenomenal! This guy knows his way around the unbeaten paths. He took us to all the VIP (lol) spots! He was very easy to engage, truly down to earth. Lunch was amazing! Thank you again!
reviews/10/text: one of the best tours we have done.Guide was great, friendly and knowledgeable. Adaptable for weather conditions. Beautiful country. Lots to see. Need to go back and tour other part of island.
reviews/11/text: Excellent tour and fantastic guide.  We thoroughly enjoyed the entire experience.   Our guide was so informative.   We could not have imagined a better experience.
reviews/12/text: I strongly recommend this experience.  Wonderful guide, visits to great place, many reachable only in this type of vehicle, were  beautiful and off the beaten track.  Great explanation of everything we were seeing and of so many things about the Azores.  Easy to connect with this group when leaving the ship.  You will not be disappointed!
reviews/13/text: Our driver and guide spoke perfect English. He was safe, informative and helpful. Taught us a lot about the Azores. Just really a great time. By the way, the owner of T4W even met us as we exited the Princess Regal at the port. Escorted us to our 4 wheeled drive and guide Pepe. A delightful person. We could not imagine a better personalized tour than we had. We used Expedia to find a 4 wheeled tour as the more expensive tours offered by the cruise line were full. Glad we waited and got our own tour.
reviews/13/title: The absolute best in Ponta Delgada
reviews/14/text: Excellent tour. The 4x4 adventure took us to untraveled places. Delfim was very knowledgeable and knew the island well. He was waiting for us when we got off the ship. Highly recommend.
reviews/15/text: Telmo did an amazing job showing us around Ponta delgada, Azores...very friendly and accommodating to our needs and wants...it was an absolute blast!
reviews/16/text:
Tw4 offers a very unique experience in São Miguel.
Our tour guide was very well informed about the history, geography and people of the island. Every place we stopped there's a story to tell.
Always adapting to the common change in weather conditions, Delfim took us to the most beautiful spots on the island and to the best places to eat.

Totally recommend!
reviews/17/text: We had a Fogo Lake tour with Vera, and it turned out to be a private tour. The guide was local and knowledgeable. She spoke great English and was very personable. We really enjoyed this tour and highly recommend it!
reviews/17/title: Great tour in Ponta Delgata, Azores
reviews/18/text: After being stood up by another tour group T4W came to our rescue and I can not give them enough praise.  We enjoyed our time with them so much we booked again for the following day.  They were highly knowledgeable, professional yet personal, courteous, and just plain fun to be around.  We were able to go beyond our expectations with this tour.  Thank you T4W.
reviews/18/title: A Great Time in the Azores
reviews/19/text: We had so much fun on the T4W Jeep Tour. We had great views and learned a lot from our guide! Would do it again!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from T4W tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Angra do Heroismo Biscoitos, Praia da Vitoria, Terceira 9700-013 Portugal
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: Pro Island Tour is a touristic entertainment company that offers its guests fantastic adventures in jeep tours. It was born of the desire to show in a different way, what the Azores have best, nature ...! Come and see the dirt roads that lead to the most beautiful scenery that Terceira Island has to offer. Experience firsthand the culture and tradition of a people, and an ancestral way of life. Join us and get ready for an unforgettable experience
name: ProIslandTour
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Wines and Moonshines of Terceira
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: In and Around Terceira Island in a 4X4
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Half Day Terceira Island Tour by 4x4
ranking: #13 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #13 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
reviews/0/text: Antonio and Carolina were fantastic tour guides. We had to cancel part of the tour and they went beyond to make our visit spectacular. Other than the beauty of the island, the best part was the genuine and friendly personality of these two! We will be back...
reviews/1/text: What an amazing experience. The staff were extremely knowledgeable and helpful. They made every effort to ensure we saw a variety of marine life while out on our tour. Would highly recommend.
reviews/2/text:
We booked two full day jeep tours with ProislandTour. Antonio Jr. showed us all the places we wanted to see and the places we didn't know that existe at all - all the hidden gems of the island. Antonio was so kind, patient and always ready to answer all our questions. 
Special part of the both tours was lunch, homemade BBQ and Azorean specialty Alcatra - it was so delicious...
We really enjoyed both days, specialy the second one, when we were only clients and had personalized tour.
I would highly recommend this company because they do great job with so much passion and it was an honor to meet them.
reviews/3/text: From the moment we were picked up, it was an adventure waiting to happen. We drove through scenic routes to learn more about Terceira, visited a special hidden cave, watched the weather shift through various seasons, and enjoyed the Natal cave, finishing off with the best - Algar do Carvao (lava tube). You'll learn and explore things with Antonio that won't be noticeable or experienced on your own. We'll definitely come back someday and book more tours with the company.
reviews/3/title: Surreal cave and volcano/lava tube experience
reviews/4/text: Antonio was awesome.  From pickup to drop off, we had a very nice time.  We prepared a traditional Azorean dish and bread.  While things were cooking, we played an old Azorean game.  The whole experience was lovely!
reviews/4/title: A Nice Way to Spend an afternoon in Terceira
reviews/5/text: The entire experience exceeded my expectations. I loved having the opportunity to make alcatra and bread in a wood oven. My hosts, Antonio and Roy, were knowledgeable and patient in answering my questions. And playing marralinha, along with wine and cheese, while the food cooked was a great way to spend the afternoon.
reviews/6/text:
Four of us did a half day 4x4 and it was amazing.....Antonio is personable, knowledgeable, prompt, and accommodating(picked us up at the airport).  He took us on those back country roads through the beautiful terrain....ran into a couple of "cow jams" but to be expected as they certainly move slow to get out of the way.
Highly recommended.
reviews/6/title: Great time and even better host
reviews/7/text:
Superb!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
i would have written in all caps, but this site won't let me this is a pain in the butt to complete
reviews/8/text: This was the best Tour! Antonio made the tour 5 stars. He took us to a local volcanoe and cave before the tourist one. His knowledge and explanations made it worth it. It was the little things like taking a different route to see parts of the island we wouldn't normally see. Thank you again so much. Obrigado
reviews/9/text:
We did the Terceira Wines & Moonshines 4×4 Tour. What a great tour!
Very nice to discover the island by 4x4 and Antonio was a great guide, showing alle the nice places on the island. During the tour he made pictures of us that he sent us after the tour. The outdoor BBQ with local food was also great, with some good moonshines afterwards lol. 
We had a great day. Thanks Antonio!
reviews/10/text: Such an enjoyable experience with Antonio from the moment he picked us up.  Arriving at the local style picnic area we snacked on local cheeses, Portuguese bread and sipped some delicy wine. We were then guided through how to make local bread and the island's favorite dish Alcatra.  Lots of laughs especially while we played marralhinha waiting for the food to cook in a wood burning stove. Antonio and his staff were so kind, informative and helpful even days later running into them in the city.  Highly recommended any tours from this company.
reviews/11/text:
Antonio was a great guide and brought us to areas we wouldn’t have known to see or couldn’t have reached in a rental car.  

He’s a great ambassador for the island, and the tour reflected that.  Highly recommended!
reviews/12/text: Tailored private tour.  Hiked the Misterios Negros trail followed by a 1/2 day jeep tour.  It was great because as a solo traveler I had a guide along the trail.  Lunch was provided, followed by a scenic jeep tour.  I saw some beautiful caves and was pleasantly surprised by the locations Antonio took me to.  Places I wouldn't have known to ask about.
reviews/13/text: Antonio is the owner of pro island Tours and is also your guide. He has so much knowledge of the island and knows all the secret spots to take his guests! He has a great sense of humor and is kind and compassionate Terceira is a stunning island that offers so much !
reviews/13/title: The best tour guide on the Island!
reviews/14/text: We booked the trip on GetYourGuide and got an exceptional guide and a wanderful trip around the island. We looked at many natural sights and had a great local picnic lunch. We heard a lot about the people and the island. Thank you for great experience.
reviews/15/text: An afternoon well spent exploring Terceira. Although the weather was not great, Antonio made the tour very enjoyable with his friendly attitude and interesting information about the island. The high quality service given was much appreciated.
reviews/16/text: Host were very amicable, we had a nice time and learned a few things as well, plus a full belly. I would highly recommend.
reviews/17/text: Team was very nice and friendly throughout the whole day. We really enjoyed the overall experience.  Highly recommended
reviews/18/text: Our guide was excellent and engaging, telling us about the geography of the island as well as taking us to see various sites, from dramatic overlooks, to natural swimming pools, a beautiful church and nature reserves.
reviews/18/title: A great way to see Terceira
reviews/19/text:
The tour was amazing. It is tailored to your vision, historical points, nature, adventure and food. The tour picks you up and drops you off. 
The traditional food was a wonderful experience. The tour provides wine tasting and pairings as well. The tour guide also captures the experiences digitally and sends you a copy.  I highly recommend the tour.
subcategory_ranking: #13 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
