address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9560-051 Portugal
description: Sightseeing tours and walking tours in Sao Miguel-Azores
name: Amazing Tours
reviews/0/text: We could not have been happier with our tour of the island! Ricardo was waiting for us as we got off our cruise ship and immediately made us feel welcome. His knowledge of all types of things about the island was impressive. And he had a great sense of humor too. He was the best guide we have encountered in all of our travels! True to their word, we managed to avoid all of the tour buses by getting an early start. And we saw much more than we ever could otherwise.  The views, the Calderas, the history! It was perhaps the best day of our cruise. We had a little help from the weather gods, providing a beautiful day to enjoy a beautiful place. Thank you for taking such good care of us.
reviews/0/title: An excellent tour provided by a wonderful guide!
reviews/1/text: Once again, Amazing Tours made our trip wonderful.  The pickup at the airport and the dropoff at the airport went so smoothly.  Our tour around the island was wonderful.  We used Amazing Tours in 2014 and again in May 2022.  Both times the service was so dependable and enjoyable.  I would definitely recommend this company to anyone traveling to Sao Miguel.
reviews/2/text: Ricardo was the best tour guide I've ever had, anywhere! He loves his work, the island, and sharing that love with the visitors he hosts on his tours. His enthusiasm was infectious; we all left with a good bit of his joy for his beautiful island. Thanks, Ricardo!
reviews/2/title: Exceeding My Expectations, from Ms. Fussy
reviews/3/text: My wife and I just recently returned from a group trip to Sao Miguel.  Riccardo was our tour guide for the trip starting with picking us up from the airport.  He was a great guide, always cheerful and accommodating, and being a native of the island he was very knowledgeable.  His tours included beautiful vista views of the island, lakes, and the ocean along with historical stops and family owned businesses from many generations.  We strongly recommend Amazing Tours!
reviews/4/text:
For over a week, from the pick up and drop off at the airport, Ricardo and the Amazing Tours staff ensured that we were safe, worry-free and exposed us to beautiful views and sights.  Ricardo was very flexible and often adjusted his schedule to "juggle" our destinations taking the weather into account.  He was always helpful and had a big smile-even when he had to deliver 16 of us to get our Covid tests! 
   On many occasions, he helped with the language barrier-again, guaranteeing our smooth experience in Sao Miguel!  Can't wait to go back!
reviews/4/title: A tour filled with laughter, views and good information!
reviews/5/text:
Jose gave us a great four hour tour of the western side of the island and the city of Ponta Delgada.  He was very informative and helped us understand the history and special features of the island. We were out about 3.5 hours which was perfect for us.
Thank you Jose and best regards, John and Linda
reviews/5/title: Great guide and exactly as promised
reviews/6/text: I brought my nephew & niece for their first trip to Sao Miguel, Azores and I am so glad we found Amazing Tours. Our very knowledgeable and funny tour guide Ricardo is top notch!  He has a great knowledge of the island and use of technology with checking various web cams to check for optimal weather conditions. With his expertise we were able to experience more in 2 days than we could ever imagine. He answered all of our questions and made a perfect recommendation on a hotel in Ponta Delgada. It’s been a month since our trip and my nephew, niece and can’t stop talking about much fun we had looking back at the hundreds of amazing photos we took. We can't wait to go back and see more of Sao Miguel and the rest of the Azores. Thanks again Ricardo & Amazing Tours for the fantastic experience!
reviews/7/text: I brought a group of 10 people to the Azores on June 6-14, 2021.  We had a fantastic time, thanks to Ricardo of Amazing Tours.  He is really fun--and funny!  We laughed a lot with him and he taught us a lot about Sao Miguel.  With the Covid requirements (tests mid-way through our trip AND at the end), Ricardo helped us out immensely with getting to the lab and printing up our results.  REALLY exceptional service, which we greatly appreciated.  He also called the airlines for us, as we had concerns about our return flight.  That was also "above and beyond" which shows how much he cares about his clients and providing topnotch service.  Bravo, Ricardo!!  Beijos!!!
reviews/8/text: My mom and I visited Sao Miguel in Sept and had a full day tour and 2 half day tours with Jose.  He was amazing.  From the moment he picked us up at the airport he was personable and so full of information about his beautiful island.  He made our trip great and we were so happy we booked with Amazing tours.  Thanks for a great tour Jose you were fabulous.
reviews/9/text: We visited Sao Miguel in July for a family vacation. We used Amazing Tours on the recommendation of a family member. Our tour guide Ricardo exemplified the name of the company. His knowledge of the island was second to none! His friendly demeanor and professionalism made for an outstanding visit.  After our first day with Ricardo I felt like we had been friends for years. We highly recommend Amazing Tours. They provided airport transfers and tours for a very reasonable price.
reviews/10/text:
This was a wonderful experience from the beginning to the end. Manuel replied to my e-mails in a prompt and professional manner. He was also instrumental in arranging for Ricardo to be our tour guide for seven days.
Having previously been a client of Amazing Tours, we specifically requested Ricardo to be our tour guide due to his professionalism and historical knowledge of the island, not only we were able to see the more popular attractions but he was also able to show us by special booking equally wonderful places off the beaten track.
Sao Miguel-Azores is a beautiful island and we were able to see many breathtaking views.
Thank you Amazing Tours, Manuel and Ricardo for an exceptional time on the island.
reviews/11/text:
Prior to our visit, I emailed a few questions and requests.  Amazing Tours responded very promptly. 

Our guide,Jose, was AMAZING.  He welcomed us like family.  Since we had eight family members, we had a private tour with Jose.  

Our tour of Sao Miguel, which included tours #5 and #6, was something to treasure because Jose provided many historical facts, background stories and interesting tidbits of information on almost every landmark, site and village we passed along. Sao Miguel is a beautiful island.

Jose became part of our family over the two days we spent with him.  He went above and beyond to make our trip memorable.  He was able to fit in a stop to the village where my grandparents were born.  He helped to find a local landmark that was very special for my father.  This was the highlight the trip for my parents (and the rest of my family to witness how happy my parents were).  

Getting around for my parents can be challenging sometimes. Jose was so kind to help them in and out of the van.  He made sure that every stop was as accessible as possible for my parents.

Jose - Thank you!

If you are going to the Azores make sure to book a tour with Amazing Tours.
reviews/12/text:
My family and I traveled to the beautiful island of São Miguel for 10 days. We began our experience with Amazing Tours by having our wonderful Tour Guide Joe pick us up at the airport. Even with the many delayed  flight times with our travel Joe made us feel very welcomed to be on this beautiful island right from the start. Our days of touring the island began the next morning and continued for additional 5 more days. Joe left us speechless each and everyday when showing us the different beauties of the island. Joe is a very educated, kind-hearted and wonderful man who even helped with the stress of finding the best restaurants for my family and I to enjoy in the city of Ponta Delgada. Joe even brought us to great lunch places as well as coffee/pastry shops each day. Joe even stayed with our 14 month old daughter in the van to not interrupt her nap schedule, what tour guide would do that? Joe really has been adopted into our family because that is how he made us feel and that is what makes AMAZING TOURS so great to use for your trip to the island. Joe we will miss you very much but won’t make our time away too long so goodbye for now! 

Here are some pictures of my daughter with Joe who she loved so much that she even cried when saying goodbye to him at the airport. Joe even shared his lunch with our daughter as well! 

I mean it when I say that my family and I would not have had the trip we did if it was not for working with Joe from AMAZING TOURS! Thank you again!!!!
reviews/13/text:
It was so nice I will be next year .it is a good idea to do this tour. Take your time 
Do be in a rush to do anything 
You will be sorry later.
reviews/14/text:
I booked 2 excursions with this company and both were great as far as organization,punctuality,van and above all our guide Paula.
She told us so many things concerning the island..history,nature,geology and traditions.
I highly recommend to join their tours!
reviews/15/text: We recently took an all-day tour to Furnas and a half-day tour to Sete Cidades with Paula, who made both tours long-to-be-remembered experiences.  Her narration and knowledge of what we were seeing on Sao Miguel was second to none.  Paula's concern for her clients' needs was paramount with her.  Any number of times, when she couldn't park close to what we were going to see, she let us out, parked the van, and finally returned with it to get us when we were ready to leave.  This was extremely helpful since my wife was still recovering from a broken foot.  She never hurried us, making us feel that we had to adhere to a particular schedule.  Her friendly, professional manner made our last couple of days on Sao Miguel pleasantly memorable.
reviews/16/text: Arriving in Ponta Delgada early in the morning and not flying out until the late afternoon could have been a long do-nothing day of waiting at the airport had it not been for the enjoyable tour to Lagoa do Fogo that Ricardo gave us.  This half-day tour was a good introduction to Sao Miguel.  Ricardo's friendly manner and good sense of humor made us feel refreshed to enjoy the island, although initially arriving tired from the overnight flight from the US.  His attentiveness to his clients' needs, such as to my wife, who was still recovering from a broken foot, was greatly appreciated.  Ricardo made our introduction to the Azores a memorable experience.
reviews/17/text:
I’m satisfiel wit Amazing Tours Lde. in San Miguel Services.
We soend 5 beautifull days in Azories and our guide Ricardo Amorim, from Amazing Tours bewich more fun and happy that days. Ineffable the feeling we geting at the trips. So many thank to Ricardo and Amazing Tour!🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻Don’t hesitate... if you would like a perfect services in Azories, chose this company!👍🏻
Thanks to God to found them!
reviews/17/title: Rua Antonio Moniz Baretto, Lagoa Azores
reviews/18/text: After my trip last year I booked again for this year. Two tours this time. I asked for private tours and was accomodated straight away. Our guide was amazing and adapted the tour on the fly based on our preferences and weather conditions. He even arranged an extra step for getting in and out of the bus on the second day when he realized my mom was struggling a bit. Would definitely reccomd.
reviews/19/text: Absolutely loved Amazing Tours!!! Our tour guide, Jo, brought us around Saõ Miguel island for a period of 2 days (we did tours #5 & #6). We always felt safe with Jo and he was incredibly knowledgeable about the island’s history, sites, even down to the vegetation! He really helped us acclimate to the culture and was so patient with us. Besides the tours themselves, Amazing Tours brought us from the airport to the hotel free of charge and I was able to set up an Amazing Tours taxi to get us back to the airport at the end of our stay. I would absolutely recommend Amazing Tours!!!
reviews/19/title: I know why their name is AMAZING Tours!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Amazing Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Fajã Grande, Flores 9970-318 Portugal
name: Poco da Ribeira do Ferreiro
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Full Day Tour of the Green Wonders of Flores Island
ranking: #1 of 483 things to do in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #1 of 483 things to do in Azores
reviews/0/text: In my opinion the most beautiful site in Flores! The way up from the parking lot through the forest is also very nice. You will enjoy the view for sure!!!
reviews/1/text: I have no words to describe how beautiful this site is. It's worth every inch of the 600 meter trail towards it. Stunning view.
reviews/2/text:
Just absolutely stunning! It just rained a bit when I arrived at the parkinglot. I had read that the path to the waterfalls can be slippery then. That was actually also the case, be careful then! Btw, the path is 600 meters. 
When you arrive at the waterfalls it’s just amazing! One of the most beautiful places I have been.
reviews/3/text:
This place is absolutely phenomenal. The small hike from the parking to the waterfalls is very nice and well built. The nature around you is very nice with different elements, e.g. nice flowers, trees or waterfalls. The hike is very well doable with children - we did it with our 4-year old daughter and she walked everything by herself.
The waterfalls at the Ende of the trail are absolutely fabolous. You will enjoy being there - plan some time there e.g. to take a rest or to have a Picknick.
reviews/4/text: Just go. Dont read any further cause this is going to be jibberish. Just go, juuust go, just goooooo. go.
reviews/5/text: No words. Only a poet or one of the few great writers could describe it. I can only say that was an experience for my soul
reviews/6/text: What a gorgeous hike and my goodness, what a payoff — one of the best views on Flores. The only thing missing from this primordial scene was dinosaurs!! This visit was a memory to TREASURE!
reviews/7/text: There's quite a bit of walking, but each step is worth it - more than 20 waterfalls in one place is absolutely unique! It's hard to describe the serene beauty you will find here.
reviews/8/text: A hike up a well-marked trail ends in the breathtaking view of a mountain wall of waterfalls. The path from the road is clearly marked. The trail is a bit uneven and sturdy shoes are recommended. Once you reach the falls, you can take take a seat on the grass/tree stumps and soak in the beauty. Have a small picnic or take a little cat nap. I was lucky to only encounter a few other visitors while there. I suggest using the restroom before venturing up and down the path because I never saw any restroom facilities.
reviews/9/text:
The walk up is not easy, the trail is steep in certain parts and is “paved” with stones of all shapes and sizes. However even while walking up you start to get the feeling of paradise with amazing plants and trees, and the sounds of water flowing and birds singing.
When i got  to the top I stopped breathing first because of the effort but on top the amazing scenery. Waterfalls dropping from the cliffs around a beautiful natural lake and all surrounded by amazing vegetation. The frogs can be heard from a distance and then you see they are somewhat small to make such a loud sound..
I just stood there for an hour trying to absorb the serenity and beauty of this place (until lots of people arrived and the sounds were different... => start early in the morning...
The walk down is less challenging but still requires some caution, however since it’s easier on the aerobic part one could admire nature at its best
reviews/10/text: Do a short hike and be rewarded with a gorgeous series of waterfalls emerging from the green mossy rock wall - it’s stunning
reviews/11/text:
This is a not to be missed spot on Flores!

There is a large enough parking area, the trail starts across the road. It’s a short hike uphill (about 15 minutes) on a path made of stones/boulders. I would wear decent shoes during/after rain as it might get slippery. 

The lagoon, with numerous falls as a backdrop, is a stunning and fairy-tale like setting. Even when there are more people, there is a peace and stillness to the place that make it a beautiful spot for a picknick or just to relax.
reviews/12/text: If you only do one thing on Flores, do this. Wear sneakers and enjoy the short hike up a rock path to the most beautiful view of a lush wonderland. The path is slippery after a rain.
reviews/13/text: It's a spectacle of majestic proportions on Flores Island, Azores, and well worth the effort of climbing the 600 m pathway (made mostly from  stones and boulders) to the top. The climb itself is a bit tiring, but fascinating. A herculean effort has gone into making this attraction accessible – thousands of boulders and rocks were carried and carefully placed to create the pathway, levadas were constructed to control water flow, brush was removed, stone walls were built to reinforce embankments, etc. Bravo to these skilled craftsmen! Once at the top be prepared for a full serving of ‘awesome’ when you see the multiple waterfalls and the lagoon
reviews/14/text: See a wonderful display of mountain waterfalls!  It’s a climb up a well rocked path but only 650 m. Walking sticks were welcomed on both the climb up and down
reviews/15/text: Do not miss this place if you are on Flores! It is a short walk from the car park (not sure how others are saying 30 minutes). Although it would be worth it if you had to hike for two hours. It's that beautiful. So peaceful and relaxing of a place to just sit and take in the incredible lush greenery of the cliffs and reflections on the still water below. I'm sure it is even more amazing during the rainy seasons with more waterfalls. This was my favorite spot in all of the Azores. It reminded me of the NaPali cliffs of Kauai.
reviews/16/text: Multiple waterfalls drop down the side of a high cliff.  The cliff is covered with yellow ginger flowers before finally dropping into a large green pool at the bottom of the cliff.  You can’t help but to sit and soak in the beauty of this spot.  There is no swimming in the pool at the bottom of the cliff.  The walk to the falls is 600 meters and is a steep, rocky trail and uphill all the way.  You will want to linger and enjoy the natural beauty of this spot.
reviews/17/text: This one is a must... The hike to the falls is short and quite easy — only ~600 meters, although it’s a climb most of the way (so you go down most of the way back). It only took us ~15 min with 3 small kids. When you get to the end, you’ll see that it was definitely worthwhile: you reach a picturesque green lake, with a huge wall with multiple waterfalls at the other end. We sat there for half an hour just relaxing and taking in the sight. Definitely a “must” for any visit to Flores!
reviews/17/title: Amazing wall of waterfalls after a short hike through the forest
reviews/18/text:
It is a lovely place to visit when visiting Flores. Waterfalls weren't flowing very heavily at the time we were visiting, perhaps due to the dryer season but still, they are magnificent! So much lush greenery, it's stunning. Do not swim in the lake/ pond by the waterfalls- we heard its dangerous- best to stay out.
We actually hiked from Faja Grande and back- worked out nicely.
reviews/19/text:
This amazing spot is amazing... magic!
Was totally amazed when I saw this breathtaking view!
So peaceful... my favorite place in Flores Island!
A MUST GO!!
You need to walk a little to access this beautiful spot, but it's totally worthy.
There is a small park near the bridge.
subcategory_ranking: #1 of 483 things to do in Azores

address: Rua Teofilo Braga 66 Ilha de Santa Maria, Açores, Vila do Porto, Santa Maria 9580-310 Portugal
description: We welcome you to Santa Maria, an yet untouched small island in the Atlantic, on of 9 beautiful islands - the Azores!Our job is to show you much more than the "must-see", we want you to experience nature, we want you to feel adventure, we want you to know what makes this island unique. Visit our website and know all about us!
location_string: Vila do Porto, Santa Maria, Azores
name: Bootla
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Santa Maria Island Jeep Safari Full Day Tour
reviews/0/text:
What a fantastic experience we had.   

Our host is wonderful and gave us so much knowledge of the island.  His restaurant selection for lunch was great as was his dinner recommendations.  We got to meet his son at school, which as really special.

The history presented along with the scenery plus discovering a bit of the culture of the island as just a darn fantastic experience.   We had so much fun.

If we visit Santa Maria again, we would book with Bootla again, for I am sure we would learn and enjoy even more!

All the best!
reviews/1/text: We took a day trip around the island. It was an incredible tour with such a nice and knowledgeable guide. Henrique is so friendly that we felt like we know him for years. He showed us beautiful nature and also architecture of Santa Maria. We have learned a lot and at the same time had great fun.
reviews/2/text:
The day tour round Santa Maria with Henrique was simply the greatest tour we’ve ever had. Bootla’s philosophy is simple: they work very, very hard to ensure that they provide the most knowledgeable and best experience possible, and their hard work creates a truly unforgettable tour.

Henrique is both naturally friendly and an incredibly knowledgeable and passionate guide. It’s remarkable just how much was packed into the day: we were taken all over the island’s uniquely varied landscapes and stunning viewpoints (down some tracks you’d never be able to follow without a local expert’s knowledge and a 4x4!), and throughout it all Henrique’s knowledge was boundless: he was as comfortable talking about the island’s volcanic origins and first human settlers as he was about the modern-day culture, economy, religion, food, flora, fauna, and so on.

We were only there for one day but after our tour we really wish we’d stayed for longer, and we already can’t wait to return to explore more of what Santa Maria has to offer. Thanks for an unforgettable experience!
reviews/3/text: We had only one day to visit the island, but Henrique made it possible, despite the weather. We were able to visit most of the places and local tips. The explanations were very interesting!!!
reviews/3/title: The best day in Sta. Maria
reviews/4/text: Had a very little understanding of what we were getting into in the beginning, and it worked out awesomely. The physical challenges were real! Coasteering and canyoning are far from being as easy as walks in the park, and they were both unforgettable and rewarding challenges!
reviews/4/title: Coach Henrique is fantastic! Coasteering and Canyoning Adventures
reviews/5/text:
Henrique is a font of information, fun, and very welcoming. My friend and I had a twelve hour layover (which became sixteen with flight delays), and decided to book a tour. If we had just went to Santa Maria’s downtown, we would have assumed that there was nothing to do at all. Henrique showed us differently. He is well versed in the island’s history, topography, geology, flora and fauna. This is not some guy being paid by a company to regurgitate a script, you feel his love for the island, and his Land Rover’s ability off road takes you places you would not be able to access. Even if I were staying in the island with my own car, I would first spend the day with Henrique to have your eyes opened about what you are seeing and what is available to do on the island. 

Booking a Bootla excursion is a win win. Don’t miss out.
reviews/5/title: Book Bootla for your tour of Santa Maria Island
reviews/6/text: We had a wonderful experience with Henrique going on a Rock Rappelling trip in Santa Maria. We were picked up from our hotel and drove thru the island which some nice history provided to us on the ride, was great to learn more about the island and Azores in general. There was plenty of instruction on proper technique and fun. He bought water and snacks for all of us and the views were beautiful walking to the rocks.  He added a but of zip lining at the end which was very fun. Highly recommend a 1/2 day tour when on the island. We went with 2 teenagers (18 and 15). Bring a sweatshirt as it might get a bit windy on top.
reviews/7/text: Our family of 4 (including 2 kids) did an half-day tour with Bootlá in Santa Maria. We started  the tour as soon as we arrived in the island, and the tour allowed us to understand the history of Santa Maria and some of its most interesting spots. Henrique was a great guide, always eager to answer our questions, and in adapting the tour to our needs and interests. We were even spoiled with some traditional cookies from Santa Maria, which are delicious! After this tour we were much better prepared to spend some days visiting this beautiful island. Thank you so much Henrique and we hope to see you soon!
reviews/8/text: We visited "Calçada do Gigante" at Santa Maria island and me and my 13-year old did rapel on the actual millions-year old basaltic wall! Unforgetable experience!
reviews/9/text: Great tour. Henrique is VERY NICE and very knowledgeable with off road to discover better the island. Go ahead, you will have great time!
reviews/9/title: Great tour. The best way to discover the nicest places of Santa Maria in one day
reviews/10/text: Henrique was an amazing tour guide!  If you want to know about this island he is the person to call.  He is very knowledgeable about the history of Santa Maria. We spent the entire day touring on road and off road - taking in some incredible views. Our tour included lunch at a local restaurant on the beach that was excellent. We had a private tour and it was well worth it!  This tour is a great way to see all the highlights of Santa Maria in a day.  Thank you Henrique!!
reviews/11/text: Best ever! Great guide terrific scenery. Highly recommend. We loved the off road. It was the highlight of our trip,
reviews/12/text: Perfect guide with a good sense of humor and a greet knowledge of Santa Marias historie. He knows his stuff
reviews/12/title: Amazing way to see the best of Santa Maria
reviews/13/text: We spent a great day with Bootla on the jeep tour of the island. Henrique is an excellent guide with loads of knowledge about the island and took us to some great spots we wouldn't have been able to reach if we'd gone around the island ourselves. Really enjoyed the experience and wouldn't hesitate to recommend Bootla!
reviews/13/title: Amazing way to see the best of Santa Maria
reviews/14/text: Where to begin! It was our first time to Santa Maria in Azores and we were there for 5 nights and so decided to book a Jeep Safari with Bootlá to get to know the island. Correspondence via email & phone was great. Got picked up at the hotel by Henrique (guide & Owner) and the day was just amazing! He took us all around the island, explained everything, stopped at several places and just knew exactly what he was doing & saying and you could feel that he enjoyed what he did and knew what he was talking about. We stopped for a coffee and got given typical biscuits and then we also stopped for lunch which was included in the tour. Pico Alto is the highest point of the island where you can basically see all around the island (highlight). Well done Henrique & Bootlá. Keep up the good work. We hope to be back in the future!
reviews/14/title: Best jeep safari & day out in Santa Maria, Azores
reviews/15/text:
Before I get into the particulars of the tour, I have to say how wonderful Henrique is, as a guide and as a person.  First off, he knows his stuff!  Henrique is not originally from Santa Maria, but he has been guiding tours there for many years, and it shows.  He explained the origins of the island, how it was discovered, and how the various towns came to be.  His real passion, however is the natural beauty and biology of the island.  During the tour, he named every single flower, tree, and animal by its scientific name and told us how it arrived on Santa Maria.

Beyond his vast knowledge, Henrique is simply a cool guy.  He spent all day with just the two of us, so we got to know him pretty well.  At the end of the tour, he drove us to the port to catch our ferry back to Sao Miguel.  I gave him a tip for being an awesome tour guide.  He immediately decided to use that tip to buy beers for us, since we had time to kill before our ferry departed!  He hung out with us for a while longer, sipping beers and talking about life… what a guy!

We spent the day driving all over the island.  The tour started in the main town of Vila do Porto, passed by the former US Air Force Base, and proceeded through each town.  We traveled along fence-lined gravel roads, muddy jungle paths, and cut through the side of a mountain.  This tour is absolutely perfect for people with a short visit to the island.  We got to see the entire island, including parts WAY off the beaten path.  Santa Maria has a lot of biodiversity, due to its formation from multiple volcanic eruptions.  We learned all about the history of the island, its various ecosystems, and its culture from our incredible guide, Henrique.
reviews/15/title: Awesome Day on the Jeep Safari with Henrique!!
reviews/16/text: We arranged for a full-day Jeep tour of Santa Maria Island and had an excellent experience. Henrique was the perfect guide - personable, knowledgeable and accommodating. For folks on a tight timeline, we would highly recommend the full-day Jeep tour. We got a great overview of the island and had a terrific time. Thanks very much, Henrique!
reviews/17/text: After reading the online Jeep Safari information I emailed Bootla and received a prompt and clear response from Raquel. My pickup and return was as promised and the day’s activities were priceless! The full day will give you insights into the entire island, the city, the country side, the food, and shopping. (As an aside, I suggest shopping out of the city to assist the economy of the locals as I feel the quality is better.) Although a full day, I guarantee you will not be bored or get tired! A full course lunch (you will be asked if you want fish of the day, seafood stew, octopus stew or steak in addition to beverages and dessert; I used “stew” because that’s what where I’m from would say) is included served at an open air ocean side restaurant. Raquel’s husband (I’m blanking on his name) is a native and the guide. He is personalable, knowledgeable and will ensure your day is safe and wonderful. Thank you for a informative and exciting day!!
reviews/18/text: My family and I (adults ranging from 26 to 63) did the Jeep tour of the island and had an awesome time! It’s a great way to see the island of Santa Maria. Our guide, Henrique, was great and had lots of knowledge about the island’s history. Even though he is not originally from Santa Maria, he has lived there a long time and is very passionate about the island. My father’s family is from Santa Maria and even he had never seen some of the places we went to. Lunch in São Lourenço was also very good and included wine and coffee. Everyone agreed it was a really great day! Highly recommended!
reviews/18/title: Great way to see Santa Maria!
reviews/19/text:
We had a beautiful tour of Santa Maria Island on August 12th, with Henrique. Henrique is a very expert and passionate guide, who will make you discover the best corners of the island, telling you a lot of interesting facts that will make you fall in love with Santa Maria.
He is very gentle and flexible and he is available to personalize your tour a bit according to your needs. We were so lucky to take part to a sort of Local and traditional event called "Sopa do imperio", where we tasted local boiled meat for free in a very peculiar event.  It doesn't take place very often, but we were lucky and Henrique explained us everything also about this interesting tradition.
If you really want to discover this beautiful Island, do it with Bootla! You won't forget the experience!

Antea - Andrea
reviews/19/title: Wonderful and personalized tour at Santa Maria Island
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Bootla tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel Portugal
description: We love to help our costumers discover the amazing São Miguel island! We love to share experiences and explore our Nature! We will take you on a journey to discover the Azores’ best-kept secrets. In a very relaxed and familiar environment, guiding you through visits and walking tours that will activate your entire senses. Through a communion of nature and unrivaled landscapes, inside dormant volcanoes, or a hidden beach... Come and create unforgettable memories with us!
name: Into The Wild Azores Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Furnas Night-Time Experience with Thermal baths and Dinner
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Sete Cidades & Lagoa do Fogo - Private Group Tour
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Half Day Guided Tour of Sete Cidades from Ponta Delgada
reviews/0/text:
This was the one of the best tours I have ever had. Bruno is super knowledgeable about the island and he takes you to the best spots on the island for pictures, lunch, hiking and hotsprings. A 10/10 experience.
I took the full day trip to Sete Cidades and  a half day tour to Furnas the next day. I had a great time.

Julia Palko
reviews/1/text: I did a couple of tours around São Miguel island with Into the Wild Azores Tours and it was excellent. Bruno picked me up in an incredibly clean van at my accommodation which made it easier for me. In the tour around Sete Cidades we visited the best lookouts and stopped at several lakes and locations with a great view. Since it was just me in the tour we stayed as long as I wanted in each place which I really enjoyed. I also went on the tour around Lagoa do Fogo we also and had fantastic views from the different lookouts. Since it was a Sunday and some locations were closed we went to other places instead, such as the Gorreana tea factory, which was a great experience. Bruno also gave me good advice on places to visit in Ponta Delgada and was great to have as a tour guide. I would really recommend it!
reviews/2/text:
Just a perfect trip - Bruno was so helpful. patient and considerate. He is a wonderful and informative tour leader. I felt we had plenty of time at the different stops we made - it didn't feel rushed at all although it was the half day trip. I chose to visit the Terra Nostra Gardens - absolutely beautiful and I was mesmerised by the thermal activity we saw. 
I have reduced mobility so was worried about how I would manage but I needn't have been. Bruno made sure everything worked out well for me. Would book again without hesitation - had a brilliant time.
reviews/3/text:
I went for Nordeste full day tour with Bruno’s company at Sao Miguel island. It was totally an unforgettable experience. As the name of company suggests, the tour included several stops that really make you enter ‘Intothewildazores’! Bruno is an exceptional guide, he not only has the vast knowledge about Azores and its history, but he also makes you feel comfortable within first few minutes of the tour and at the end of the day, he will be remembered as a good old friend:)

There are couple things that make his tour stand out amongst others:
1) As mentioned before, Bruno is a very kind and friendly guide with in-depth knowledge about Azores.
2) The tour included very nice lunch buffet at a restaurant that had a lot of vegetarian options. I have to mention this as it can be difficult to find restaurants with vegetarian options. 
3) Bruno gives a lot of time at each spot so you don’t feel rushed and can soak in the beauty of nature around you as much as you want. 
4) Bruno also trained me on how to take panoramic pictures. I have been traveling past few years and taking lots of pictures everywhere but I never thought about using panoramic option until Bruno pointed out that some of the spots will be better with panoramic views. And he didn’t give up on me until I got it okay on 4th or 5th attempt!

If you are in Sao Miguel island, don’t miss out a tour with Bruno as he will truly make it a special unforgettable day for you! 

Wish you all the best, Bruno! Obrigada!
reviews/3/title: Amazing Nordeste Experience with an Amazing Guide
reviews/4/text:
So we came back! Nordeste was the only part on the island we didn't have a chance to see last year and we decided to visit it with Bruno- who knows the island better? It was great! Felt like reunion with the old friend so the conversation was smooth all trip long. We saw the best spots ever and you can tell Bruno was amazed by the views too. Throughout our trip we had Portuguese course (I think it should be extra charged :P), we can now name few animals, ask for help, tell people that we're here to find a husband plus few other ridiculous things. It was awesome! For lunch we went to some small restaurant serving buffet and food was phenomenal! Go for octopus and chocolate mousse- we can't stop talking about them! We were offered a local drink- passion-fruit lemonade and my friend loved it so much that she was drinking it til our last day. 

It was also great to see how his trips got so popular during the past year. Good luck and see you soon! ;) 
-Kate and Natalia
reviews/5/text:
I can't praise this boy enough.We had full Nordeste tour and true say it was the most memorable experience that we had on the Sao Miguel. Our guide was highly knowledgeable about culture, geography history of the Island. We never felt rush and had plenty of time at every stop. Traveling with Bruno was like travelling with an old friend and his passion that he brought to the tour made a great day even better! The tour  followed along the coastline and discovered  treasures of Nordeste. From sharp-carved clilff Miradouro de St. Iria, to picturesque park Ribeira dos Caldeiroes and futher towards Miradouro da Vigia das  Baleias overlooking the blue of the Atlanitc Ocean and Ponta do Sossego where fog covered top of the hill. And a lot more.
 Just book it, go and immerse yourself into the wild Azores!
reviews/6/text: Bruno was an amazing tour guide. We were lucky that it was just 2 of us but still it would have been excellent. His knowledge of the island(s) is top notch and there wasn't anything we asked he couldn't answer. The dinner was fantastic as well as the springs themselves. Would definitely recommend it to anyone
reviews/6/title: A must while visiting Sao Miguel
reviews/7/text: It was a wonderful morning! Bruno showed me the west of the island, all the volcanos, craters with lakes inside and a small nice village on the coast. We were walking around the most attractive viewpoints, made some hiking and went down to the village to visit a local church of St Nicolas and to try local cakes with coconut and cheese. Thank you for this experience, Bruno!
reviews/8/text:
Had a fantastic tour with Into the Wild this past week.  Bruno is amazing.  He was very patient with us, let us take our time at each stop to enjoy the views, and take probably a few too many pictures.  He is also a great photographer himself, definitely recommend giving him your camera to get some shots.  The pictures he took of us are some of our favorites of the trip!  He is also a great source of information on all things about the island, it was great to chat with him about the culture and things to do.  

This tour was a great way to start our trip, we will definitely be going with them again when we go back!
reviews/8/title: Lagoa do Fogo Half Day tour - Amazing!
reviews/9/text: Where to begin my praise of this tour? I had a wonderful time with Into the Wild Azores. Bruno went out of his way to accommodate; he was so personable and knowledgable, and day was well planned. The tour ranged from stunning viewpoints, samples local teas and liquor, feeling the intensity of volcanic caldieras, and even the opportunity to soak in natural hot springs. I would highly recommend this tour!
reviews/10/text: Booked the evening tour to Furnas and the thermal pools.  Bruno was a wonderful guide.  Very knowledgeable and passionate about his home country. He was very courteous, professional and willing to put in the extra effort!  I would highly recommend
reviews/11/text: If you are looking to experience all the places you saw on Google, Bruno is your guy! He is very accommodating and flexible, and his ability to roll with the punches was so refreshing. He’s super knowledgeable of the islands and the history of them all. Our first tour with him was so good, we booked another for the following day. He also knows all the best photo spots, angles, and will give you an experience you won’t forget. You will not regret the money spent on this experience!
reviews/11/title: Best tour and guide in the Azores!
reviews/12/text:
I'm big fan of couchsurfing, and tours with Bruno made me feel bit similar to that spirit when good friend who you came to visit shows you around.
He naturally explained us everything we wanted to know, shows us highlights of the island and tought how to be patient about the weather. So Bruno was flexible with our needs and took us in right places at right time. 
And pictures!!! Bruno is master of making great pics! On this island it's just necessary to bring back fabulous pics, so Bruno can make it for you very good!
Also, he gave us a lot of important advises for the next exploring Azores, what I really wish to do after sooo inspiring time. Bruno knows how to make people love this island as he does!
Thanks a lot again, Bruno!
Good luck in everything!
Alina
reviews/13/text: Sete Cidades and Lagos do Fogo full day - this tour takes you all over the Island. So much beauty to see and Bruno was incredible. As a solo traveller, I felt very safe and fortunate. I couldn't be happier with my experience. If you you travel to Ponta Delgada and you don't book with Into the Wild, you're missing out. Thank you Bruno for a great that I will never forget.
reviews/13/title: Couldn't have asked for a better day
reviews/14/text: Can't go wrong. Bruno was fantastic and very kind. I had a slight  cold from the buggy tour in the morning  and needed this. I felt rejuvenated and better after. Can't recommend Bruno and his tours enough.
reviews/15/text:
Where do I even start.. Bruno the man, humble,good sense of humour, gentleman and very knowledgeable. I first booked a full day tour with him and I enjoyed it a lot That I booked another tour with him until the day I left. He showed me places that are breathtakingly beautiful, very flexible. Having a tour with him is like being with a good friend. He makes you feel very comfortable while showing you the best places in this spectacular island. He always make sure that you are having a great time. A good listener as well when u need to talk a lot about anything. A pro photographer,  I had the best pictures taken by him no extra charged. Food... He knows the best local places just ask him. 
I highly highly recommend this tour you would never regret.
reviews/16/text:
Bruno Pacheco from Into The Wild Azores Tours took the eight of us on three separate tours around Sao Miguel, allowing us to explore the entire island. 

The tours were very reasonably priced and included lunch. 

We traveled in a van which accommodated all eight of us comfortably and felt extremely safe while driving around with him. 

Bruno was very pleasant and knowledgeable, tailoring our tours to ensure we saw everything we had researched and requested to see during our trip, going over the advertised time period at no extra cost. 

We would highly recommend Into The Wild Azores Tours while visiting the beautiful island of Sao Miguel and thank Bruno for our incredibly enjoyable adventures.
reviews/17/text: I went to Sete Cidades first and decided to do Furnas the next day. I had really good time and Bruno was a great guide and very flexible! I can recommend this company. :)
reviews/18/text: Awesome tours with Bruno! We enjoyed every single minute of each full day tour!Everything went well and according to our rythm 😎.Thanks for flexibility and for listening our karaoke)))
reviews/18/title: Very nice trips:Furnas,Sete Cidades,Lago de Fogo
reviews/19/text: We had booked prior to our cruise a half day tour of san migual, azores, with into the wild azores tours.  Our itinerary changed and we contacted via email Bruno, the owner to let him know.  He promptly replied and arranged to pick us up as soon as our ship docked on the new date for our tour.  He took us around this beautiful island and described all we saw and answered our many questions.  I wanted to try the furnas baths and he incorporated that in our schedule; we wanted to try the famous stew cooked in the geysers, and we did that.  It ended up being closer to a full day tour by the time he brought us back to the ship.  Bruno was very considerate of our departure time.  I cannot say enough about this young man and his love of the island.  We were very satisfied and highly recommend him .  Just let him know what you want to see and he'll make sure you have a super experience on his beautiful island.
reviews/19/title: fantastic tour with Into the Wild Azores tours

address: Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel Portugal
description: My name is Rui and I am a Sao Miguel Island native. I love meeting people from other countries and making their visit to the Azores one they will never forget. My customers are not just clients to me – they are new friends, and as such they receive personalised service. I have many years of experience as a professional private driver, and you will find me an enthusiastic host with an excellent sense of humour. I can provide VIP services, Private Tours by Car and/or Minivan, and Airport Transfers.
name: Azores Private Tours
reviews/0/text: Rui was a great guide! He's very knowledgable about São Miguel and the Azores. He struck a good balance between providing a guided tour while still giving us space to explore on our own at each location.
reviews/1/text: We scheduled a private 1/2 day tour with Azores Private Tours as the major event of our cruise stop in Ponta Delgada.  Rui was prompt, professional,competent, delightful, informative--we could go on and on.  His tour was a highlight of our fourteen day cruise from Southampton to Fort Lauderdale.  As a native of the Azores, the pride he has in his country shines through in his conversation about life on Sao Miguel and its history.  Heavy cloud cover greeted us every where we went but that didn't detract from the tour.  We still were able to gain a sense of the northern portion of the island, its history and its people with Rui's excellent tour commentary.   If we ever return to the Azores, we will book with Rui (Azores Private Tours) again.
reviews/1/title: Excellent service and great value--well worth the time
reviews/2/text: I am so happy that we booked three days' worth of private tours with Rui.  He is friendly, funny, and so incredibly genuine.  No request is too much trouble for him.  He managed to fit in SO many great places and experiences into his itineraries, while never making us feel at all rushed.  Rui knows his island like the back of his hand and is genuinely so excited to share its magic with visitors.   He was on time and easy to reach via WhatsApp.  His car is very nice (he cleans it every day!) and he drives safely.  He was happy to modify our itineraries to better fit our preferences for the trip, such as adding some time to swim at an amazing local beach where the water is warm at low tide due to an underground geothermal source, or adding a stop at the local winery.  He knows the best local restaurants and bakeries.  He managed to always seem to get us to viewpoints when larger tour groups weren't there, which made them even more magical.  He has encyclopedic knowledge of San Miguel and the Azores, from the geothermal and volcanic science to the animals and plants to the changeable weather, history, and cuisine, Rui can answer any question you can come up with.  I'm sure we saw a ton more places (and experienced way less driving stress) with Rui than we ever would have managed on our own.  Perhaps best of all, he's very pleasant to spend time with.  We felt truly like we were being escorted by a new friend.  I would not hesitate to highly recommend Rui's services.  (He runs his own small business, so be patient with emails - if he's out on a tour, he may not reply until a bit later, but he will reply..)
reviews/2/title: 10 stars!  Made our trip AMAZING in every respect!  Highly recommended.
reviews/3/text: We utilized this company on our last day on the island. Rui was a great tour guide. The trip was clean, smooth and very informative. He took us to places on the island we hadn’t been to yet. Rui was a great driver and had plenty of information about the Azores and different towns on São Miguel. I highly recommend traveling with this service.
reviews/4/text: Rui provides a premium service where he is keen to ensure you have a wonderful tour. He is really knowledgeable and great to chat to. Rui really looks after you and you travel in luxury to the destinations. We did the Lagoa do Fogo tour and Rui was happy to tailor the trip slightly to what we were interested in making sure we really enjoyed our afternoon.
reviews/5/text: While pre-tour communication was a little choppy, Rui delivered and once we were on the tour itself, it was incredible. Flavio was an incredible guide who was able to answer every one of our questions (and we had many!). He helped us make the best of our tour time. The van was very clean and comfortable, even on the islands winding and steep roads. I could not recommend him enough.
reviews/6/text:
We had two days with Rui, one to Lagoa/Furnas and the other to Nordeste and both were fantastic! Rui is very professional, easy to communicate with (speaks English very well) and provides great insight during his tours. Since he knows the island well he's also able to provide great recommendations for restaurants, etc. 

We're so glad we book with Rui and highly recommend him to anyone wanting to see the island in a more personalized way! He doesn't disappoint!
reviews/7/text:
We had the best time touring with Rui in Sao Miguel for two days. I had not been back in41 years.  He went above and beyond for us.   He took the time to explain things to us,  he  went out of his way to take me to my dads village to try and find his childhood home. 
My husband is not Portuguese and he appreciated that Rui spoke very well English, while Rui also taught him a few words in Portuguese.
Please if you are looking for someone who knows the island and is personable, pleasant, professional and super friendly contact him to guide on your vacation. 

Thank you again Rui
L&J
reviews/8/text: Very unprofessional behavior, he cancelled the trip in the last moment  without giving the reason why after already booking the  trip..
reviews/8/title: Cancelled the trip in the last moment
reviews/9/text: Rui could not have been nicer or more professional.  The tour was complete and catered to our inquiries, desires and plans.  Rui is personable, knowledgeable and intent on providing a memorable experience.
reviews/10/text: My husband and I just spent the day with Rui for the all-day Furnas tour. The entire day was incredible. He has an extremely comfortable car and provided water. Rui after a day feels like a friend, he is personable and very knowledgeable about San Miguel. He knows the ins and outs of each stop, we often beat the crowd to all the must see spots. We were never rushed, there was no timetable and we were able to add a stop to the tour as we wanted to see the ceramic factory. I cannot say enough good things about Rui - I hope he is available for your day!
reviews/11/text:
Wow…we just returned from a wonderful trip to Ponta Delgada and we had the BEST private driver. Rui is a true gentleman, detailed to the amazing island and such a professional person!!
You will not regret this time with him. The car was beyond comfortable. Trust me your trip will be complete after a day with Rui!!
reviews/11/title: Complete you dream trip with Rui!
reviews/12/text: I don't think it would be possible to find a nicer person nor a better, more knowledgeable guide anywhere on the planet. Quite simply SUPERB in every way. This is the only way to visit the island... forget about hiring a rental car, book Rui - you will not be disappointed, he really is one in a million. (His car is comfortable too!)
reviews/12/title: The best of the best of the best!
reviews/13/text: We were so lucky and happy to spend our first day in Azores travelling with Ruis. He is a very professional, inteligent, warm and kind guide who showed us most amazing places, told interesting stories about local life. Very clean car, very professional service, excellent English. I travelled around the world but to meet such guides like Rui is such a gem. We enjoyed our trip stress free and with best impressions and valuable information.
reviews/13/title: Very professional driver guide and valuable experience of the island
reviews/14/text:
We took three tours with Rui, back-to-back-to back - Half Day Lagoa do Fogo, Half Day Sete Cidades, Full Day Furnas.

Rui is a true professional and very knowledgable guide. From his relaxed demeanour to his well thought out itineraries, we felt like we were able to see all the key spots and lookouts on Sao Miguel Island! Rui was able to describe very interesting facts about both key and hidden landmarks and was very accommodating throughout - he even acted as our emergency ATM in a pinch (thanks again Rui!). Having a private tour also allows you to weave through lines and fit in more sights and experiences - worth every penny. 

Rui emphasized that you can also spend extra time in any favourite spots that you like and not be held to a strict agenda, with no pressure from Rui to keep moving - he would adjust the itinerary accordingly. You could modify your itinerary and add/remove stops that didn’t fit what you had in mind. The cherry on top is being chauffeured around in a nice, clean Mercedes.

We will be recommending Rui to friends and family who visit the island.

Thank you for showing my wife and I a wonderful time and making our trip truly special.
reviews/15/text: I've used TripAdvisor reviews as a general guide for many years understanding that it's far easier for people to complain than it is to compliment.  If my wife and I had not personally contracted with Rui I would not believe the tremendous number of very positive reviews with very few unsatisfied customers.  Bottom line, Rui and his services are legit.  You will not find a more professional, knowledgeable, service oriented and engaging guide than Rui.
reviews/16/text: Excellent and more 🙂- tailored the day to fit our aims and interests with fantastic levels of information , fluency and interest . You’d find it difficult to get not only a great guide to interact with to learn not just about the landmarks but also about life on the island, but also you’d find it difficult to find a better ambassador for the island. Fully recommend this to all - so much better than a sterile coach trip unable to interact or go places on a whim
reviews/16/title: “Excellent” does not do Rui credit enough
reviews/17/text: Rui:  did an excellent job he was funny knowledgeable and very helpful show has many good restaurants and he was a great driver highly recommend him we did a pineapple tour I have been the first day and the next day we did an all day tour to seta cidades and  Lagoa do fogo , which was lots of fun great lunch spot and we really enjoyed it, a great job.
reviews/18/text: Sam who is owner of Green Corner Tours and was our tour operator was very friendly and informative.  Not only did he know a lot about his area he also gave us little tidbits of information and took us to out of the way places that a tour bus would not be able to go to because of the narrow roads.  Was very impressed with Sam and if we ever go to the Azores again, wouldn't hesitate to call Sam again.
reviews/19/text: Four (4) of us booked a tour with Rui prior to embarking on our November transatlantic cruise from Barcelona, Spain to Miami, Florida.  Unfortunately the cruise line found it necessary to cancell the port of Ponta Delgada due to mechanical and weather issues heading directly to Miami from Funchal.  Before we were able to email Rui regarding the cancellation, he emailed us knowing of the cancellation and within 24 hours we received a full refund.  For anyone who may be wary of paying in advance for this tour, know that we were very pleased with the promptness and professionalism shown by Rui and Azores Private Tours and if we find ourselves again in the Azores, would not hesitate to contact Rui at Azores Private Tours again.
reviews/19/title: Port Cancelled by Cruise Line - Full Refund Immediately Received - Very Professional
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Azores Private Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Clube Naval da Praia da Vitoria, Avenida Beira - Mar, Praia da Vitoria, Terceira 9760-412 Portugal
address_obj/street1: Clube Naval da Praia da Vitoria, Avenida Beira - Mar
animal_welfare_tag/msg_body: Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.
description: We would like to present you the Azores Archipelago as an unique and newest diving destination in nord Atlantic Ocean. Terceira Island is a quiet and relaxed holiday´s destination, away from the noisy crowds of massive touristic destinations. At diving center, we organize daily diving trips during the summer and throughout the year whenever the weather permits, as well as weekend boat & shore dives. We also provide recreational diving courses all year long.
name: Octopus Diving Center
ranking: #12 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #12 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
reviews/0/text:
Loved everything about this experience. I did the Open water diver and everybody was very professional, friendly and flexible team. Special thanks to Alexandre Jacinto and Carlos Pinto for this amazing time. Everything about it was great, from the support, to the equipment to the patience.
The locations they picked out for the doces were great, with shop wrecks, a lot of life and with great conditions for diving.
Fully recommend this school and, now, i want to take a lot more courses with them.
reviews/1/text:
We did the Open Water Diver course at Octopus diving Center and we're really happy with the experience. Alex is a great diving instructor, very helpful, patient and positive, and made it a unique experience. We felt safe and in good hands at all times, with very good equipment (with a good range of size, fitting small as well as tall people).
We can really recommend visiting Terceira and doing a diving course here!
reviews/1/title: Great experience with Open Water Diver Course
reviews/2/text:
My experience with Alex and the Octopus diving center was amazing. My instructor helped me to get back to diving after 2 years. He was very kind, patient, and helpful.  I felt safe and guided for the whole dive. He was also very clear and flexible. 

The dive site was AMAZING!!! Saw many different species and plants. 

The equipment I rented was very good quality, warm enough for the 16 C water. 

In overall, I had a great time and I am very grateful for the experience.
reviews/2/title: Helpful and professional staff, great diving
reviews/3/text:
With no doubt on of the best diving centers in Azores.

I been traveling in many places and visited many diving centers. So, I can say that Professionalism, knowledge, safety, friendship, the quality of service and more than 15 years of experience make Octopus a Outstading divingcenter!!

A big Thank you to Alex, Rita, Joao and Ricardo
to make all the experiences so Unique!
reviews/4/text: From the first chat through WhatsApp, the experience with the team from octopus was simply amazing! Ricardo and Joao were very nice and professional! The mergulho was very relax!  Muito obrigados!! We definitely recommend it!!
reviews/5/text:
I had a really great time doing my Advanced SSI diving course with Alex and the team at Octopus diving centre. They were all really friendly and welcoming, and understanding of the fact I was both a bit rusty and nervous before the first diving having not been diving for years.

I learnt loads and felt way more confident by the end of the course. I got to go on 5 really interesting dives and saw so much cool wildlife. I highly recommend them and will definitely come again if I return to Terceira!
reviews/6/text:
I did the open water diver course at Octopus  diving center. And it was amazing! The instructors took the time needed to learn all the skills, both in the pool and the open water. They made sure I felt safe and seen all the time.
Well maintained equipement and they had tips for everything. Great company, amazing experience and looking forward to my next dive!
reviews/7/text:
Had the best time diving with Alex and Felipe. 
Small group of only 4, they were able to cater to different levels of diving experience. 
We went to two beautiful dive sites, the first a cave and the second, a ship wreck. 
Instructors explained the dive briefing clearly and even told some history about the site, very knowledgeable about types of marine life in the area. 
Their safety standards and quality of equipment was very good. 
My favourite part is that these guys are passionate and conscious about protecting and caring for our beautiful oceans! 

Apart from the dive it’s self, Alex was extremely helpful in recommending other things to do on the island and even assisted me in finding a car to rent. He does a great gob at making sure everyone is looked after and has a good time. 
I would definitely recommend this company to my friends and other travellers.
reviews/8/text: I took my kids for their first dive in Terceira; for myself a dive again after 6 years of last dive. Alex and his crew are wonderful instructors, great equipment and amazing experience. It was my birthday and after the dive I was surprised with a birthday cake and song😃😃
reviews/9/text: We enjoyed 3 dives and a refresher course with Alex and his team. They are friendly, competent, professional and good company.
reviews/10/text: Alex was and is the man! Super fun dives, Rita is the support squad of dreams, and Miguel is a blast. They were super fun and knowledgeable about the dive sites. They also went further to make sure my wife, who is a new diver, felt very comfortable and confident. Absolutely recommend if you’re on Terceira!
reviews/11/text: I got my open water diver certification with Alexandre and everything went great! I had an amazing time and he was very thorough, patient and knowledgeable. I loved diving!
reviews/12/text: It was my first time scuba diving and I learned a lot and had a blast! The staff were informative and super friendly, both scheduling and in the land lesson. I felt safe and comfortable, and trusted my guide. They also take pictures and send them to you after which is a great way to remember the experience! Thank you for such a great first scuba!
reviews/13/text: Octopus dive center offers good equipment and local knowledge regarding the best dive spots. On top, they are great people!
reviews/13/title: excellent people and cool dive spots
reviews/14/text: Excellent and professional diving center! Very well organized, with good gear and most important for me,  extraordinary happy crew! Love it! Thank you!
reviews/15/text:
I had an amazing experience a couple weeks ago at Octupus Diving Center!
I had two fantastic days of diving at Terceira and I made four dives. Honestly some of the best diving I have done. My dive guide was Alexandre, who is highly professional, safety conscious and I really felt like I was looked after both in the water and out.
I will never forget and I highly recommend it to everyone!
Enjoy! The azores sea is wonderful!
reviews/16/text:
Great experience with Octopus DC. Alexandre & Ricardo were top banana and always on time (early, even).
On my first day, after setting up and getting ready, Alexandre gave us a briefing which, in my opinion, was the best of the lot. Very concise and thorough, including fish chart and some respective signals, (handmade) site map, communication signals, procedures, etc. 
The diving was very good, considering the time of year, and there was a great effort in diversifying the sites, obviously taking into account the ever changing weather and sea conditions. We dove in both Praia and Angra and we spotted some of the usual stuff but also some cool stuff too, such as a Viper moray, some big stingrays, a few nudis, loads of hermit crabs and spider crabs (night dive).
Ricardo even allowed for an exploration dive as the last one to find the anchor cemetery in Angra's bay.
reviews/16/title: Great staff, very professional and super cool, nice diving too
reviews/17/text: The crew will do everything so that you have the best diving experience. Extremely helpful and will make an extra effort to make sure you have a wonderful dive. Perfectly calculated stop at the cheese factory after the dive to relax and enjoy the local culture while on the way to the next dive. :)
reviews/18/text:
This is the place to be! 
The crew will take good care of you and make sure you will enjoy your days with them. Very professional and have very nice equipment for you to use. It’s also fun going out with their own boat to the different dive sites.

If you are thinking about diving on Terceira. Then you have your solution here. Dive with Octopus Diving Center, you won’t regret it!
reviews/19/text:
we have spent 1 week in Terceira and we have enjoyed 5 days with those guys diving in the azorean blue. I definetevely reccomend this diving center. one of us started the open water diver course and finished it very happy and well prepared with the amazing aid of Alex. the others have done some amazing dive as Ilha das cabras, were we have seen Bull Rays, and Cinco Ribeiras, with a nice cave full of life and an incredible night dive. 
not less important they are very kindly, well prepared and equipped!
subcategory_ranking: #12 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
