address: Madalena, Pico 9950-226 Portugal
name: Caminhando
photo/caption: Na montanha mesmo com nuvens é lindo.
reviews/0/text: Cecilia was the perfect guide, completely immersed us in the history and story of the locale. We recommend her wholeheartedly for any adventure around Madalena!
reviews/0/title: We toured coastal trails and had a winetasting at a local farm, learning all the time
reviews/1/text: It was a great service summitting Mt. Pico with Joao Xavier. our guide. He paid attention to every detail, even to me when I was descending sort of slow. Aaaand, we only paid him after the climb due to our forgetfulness:-)
reviews/2/text: My wife and I had the pleasure of spending the day touring Pico with Cecilia. A warm, friendly,outgoing person, Cecilia immediately made you relaxed. Her knowledge of the island was impressive as was her patience with our questions. Unsurprisingly for an island the weather was variable so Cecilia left us with loads of ideas for following up in a hire car during the rest of our stay. Great introduction to Pico. Great day out.
reviews/3/text: João and Marco took a group of 6 of us (including two in their 60s) up and back down point Pico. They picked the best route for us; made sure we were all doing ok; Gave us information about the volcano; took pictures for us; and even recommended the best restaurants to visit. I highly recommend using Caminhando if you are planning on going up mount Pico as part of your trip to the Azores.
reviews/4/text: We completely enjoyed our day with Joao hiking to the top of of Pico Mountain. Knowledgeable about Pico Island and the mountain. Encouraging to two seventy year olds without being overbearing. Just a great guy. Communication was superb. Highly recommended.
reviews/5/text: Excelent tips on technique and selection of the easiest parts of the trail, both up and downhill. Great sharing of trivia about the mountain. Very friendly guide (Marco)
reviews/6/text: The entire experience was awesome!! Very hard, but epic. From the views, to our awesome guide, to the feeling when you get to the top. I 200% recommend this company - they are the one to get you to the top of Pico!!
reviews/7/text: My favourite experience of the Azores! I climbed the mountain with a guide, Marcus, who is a very knowledgeable lovely guy with excellent English. Conditions on the day were not great and I was given the option to cancel at no charge but we decided to see how we would get on. The ascent was quite wet in parts. Marcus was great at checking the pace was ok and that I was alright and safe. They provided climbing poles which were a godsend to make it easier on your legs. We reached the summit to amazing views of the island, which we enjoyed over lunch. The views are breathtaking. Collection to and from my accommodation was provided. Joao and his lovely wife then took me to their vineyard for homemade wine and brandy tasting, along with homegrown bananas and island cheese. They gave me lots of interesting history of the islands and it was lovely to spend time with them. All together an amazing day and experience - thanks so much! 😀
reviews/8/text: We booked a taxi with João to take us up to the Pico Mountain house. Very prompt and friendly and he even gave us a guided tour of his vineyard as we had a few hours to wait before our ferry home
reviews/9/text: Very interesting and informative tour of the island of Pico with João Xavier, great lunch and visit to his vineyard.
reviews/10/text: We used Caminhando to meet us at the airport and deliver us back a few days later. David the taxi driver arrived on time and was a lovely chap to meet and point out the sights on the way. A perfect start to a visit to Pico and a nice way to end.
reviews/11/text: My husband and I booked a private tour to go up Mount Pico. Organization was very smooth through message exchanges with Joao Xavier before the hike. On the D-day, Cecilia met us at our hotel at 7am, with a packed lunch and lent us rain jackets, a bag pack and walking sticks, so we didn't have to buy any of these. The hike is definitely not easy (especially on the way down) and Cecilia was very helpful, giving good advice and indicating a good path to follow. I would definitely recommend Caminhando for that kind of excursion.
reviews/11/title: Great hike to the top of Mount Pico with Cecilia
reviews/12/text: We went up Pico on 25th July, setting off with 3 guides ending up with one. The other guides had to talk folk down that couldn’t go on, or stay with those who were taking it slowly. Very well informed friend.y guide, even raced us down to get the ferry on time... thanks,
reviews/12/title: First class guides and an excellent climb up pico
reviews/13/text: We had Marco for a two person tour on 4 July 2019.   He provided what I hoped for, which is Safety, Encouragement and Pacing.  Mt. Pico is not a hike, it is a serious climb with only two switchbacks that I could count.   It was between steep stairs and a ladder in grade, with loose volcanic rock in places.   That's where Marco fit in with his great experience.   He kept us on pace and prevented us from burning out on the ascent (you will need even more energy to descend).  He kept us abreast of where we were and what was ahead on the trail and most importantly provided encouragement.  Marco also traveled with a large bag full of useful supplies and safety gear, if needed.   At our joint pace it was three hours up and three hours down.   Hire Marco or one of his companions from Caminhando, it is worth the peace of mind.
reviews/14/text: My friend and I booked a half day wine tasting tour but got so much more. We were collected by Cecelia and not only had the minibus to ourselves but received an extensive island tour from a local who's passion and love for her island was evident. We had 3 stops for both wine and liqueur tasting, including Joao's family run vineyard (with lovely cheese and bread too!) plus various other village and view stops around the island. We had a fun and informative day and I definitely recommend this tour company to anyone visiting Pico.
reviews/15/text: My husband and I are avid hikers and backpackers and of course had our sights set on climbing Pico. We were debating whether or not to attempt the climb solo or book a guide.  We wound up calling caminhando at the last minute and booked a tour for the next morning.  We are SO glad we did.  We didn't have to worry about getting lost in the fog or having to wait to start our climb, and the views from the mountain were incredible.(They only allow do many people on the mountain at a time, and only guides can reserve spots in advance).  But most importantly,  we met incredible people. João and his son led the trip, and thanks to them we learned SO MUCH about the geology and history and culture of Pico. João is also hilarious and had me laughing so hard I almost fell down the mountain. Could we have climbed Pico unguided? Maybe,  but we would have missed out on so much knowledge and human connection, and isn't that what traveling is all about anyway? So book a tour with these wonderful humans already! :)
reviews/15/title: My favorite day in the Azores.
reviews/16/text:
My wife and I enjoyed a full day with cecilia. Wine is the main industry now, and we visited the different regions, and tried some wines and liqueurs. There are no great caldera lakes on pico,  but we stopped at one where you may catch a reflection of the mountain. The history of  whaling was explored in the  whaling museum with a good video. Lunch was a well prepared buffet of salads and meat/fish including wine and water. We took a gentle stroll through the forest,  and stopped at all the viewpoints. Cecilia is very knowledgeable and  explains all the history  of the land and people.
Highly recommended.
reviews/16/title: Great way to explore the island's sights and understand its history
reviews/17/text: Joao took us to Gruta das Torres which was a memorable experience and then showed us more lava formations notably where the barrels of wine were rolled to the ships taking Pico wine to Faial island.  Joao explained how wine is uniquely cultivated on Pico and shared delicious Pico wine and cheese at a beautiful vineyard in the sunshine as there was too much low cloud to explore Pico mountain!! We thoroughly recommend this tour - it was a lot of fun.
reviews/18/text: Joao is one of the best tour guides we have met. His enthusiasm for Pico, his knowledge of all aspects of island life and culture made for an enjoyable day from start to finish. To be shown Joao’s own family vineyard was a bonus as was the tasting at the end of the visit. We cannot recommend Caminhando too highly and although today was not a walking day for us I would not hesitate to book with this business to climb he mountain on a future occasion.
reviews/19/text:
The day before I gave a call to João from the agency and soon I was all set! 
Marco took me with the rest of our small group up to Mount Pico with great professionalism! I appreciated the fact that he kept adapting our tempo to our needs during the walk, allowing for a smooth going down and a successful closing of the hike! 
Wid did a lot of short breaks to drink, pause for breath, have a look at the stones or enjoy the panorama. We shared a picnic at the foot of the vulkan's peak and that was great to chat about geology, vulcans, hiking and about personal experiences as well.

Try it!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from Caminhando tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Avenida Tenente Coronel Jose Agostinho, Angra do Heroismo, Terceira 9700-108 Portugal
name: Azores Retreat
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: BUGGY TOUR - West / Center of the island (off-road)
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: BUGGY TOUR - Serra do Cume (off road)
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Fishing - 4 hours activity
ranking: #14 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
ranking_subcategory: #14 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores
reviews/0/text:
My family and I wanted to do something fun on one of our final days in Terceira back in August 2019. 

After searching online I came across Azores Retreat.

Booking was simple and we decided on a full package of UTV's and Jet Skis. 

We ended up doing the West Side of the Island for the UTV's. We stopped at the cheese factory along the way for a bite and a drink. 

Shawn and Diana are first-class. Their knowledge of the island and the off-road routes are next to none. They ensured your safety, while allowing you to enjoy the tour. They can provide the tour in English or Portuguese without missing a beat.

Highly recommend this tour!

A++
reviews/1/text: Shawn was a perfect host & guide. The variety of terrain gave the tour an in-depth look into the many different perspectives of Terceira.
reviews/1/title: West Side Tour - Epic views over many terrains!
reviews/2/text: Had a great time. Sean the owner was a fantastic guide. He showed us all parts of the island that we would never see via car. Lots of great views and lots of fun. Highly recommend this tour. Should be the first tour you do along with the food and wine tour. Will suggest to all friends visiting the island.
reviews/3/text: We did the West side UTV tour. We were picked up right from our hotel and were on our way. We drove all over and had a great time. My husband and I were able to stop whenever and switch off so we each drove multiple times. We saw some amazing scenery and got stuck once due to all the rain but they were plenty prepared to pull us right out in a matter of minutes.
reviews/4/text: Shawn and partner brought UTV right to hotel (Caracol), and were right on time. The scenery was great the entire time. Got to see the coast, the forest, and plenty of cows! The vehicles are very easy to drive, and we had a ton of fun. They were very accommodating to anytime that we wanted to stop and take photos. They were great guides overall and would recommend them and the UTV to anyone looking for a different way to tour the island!
reviews/5/text: Sean is knoweldable of the terrain and made the UTV experience safe and fun for my wife and I as well as our friends. Wr received professional service and well performing vehicles. Highly recommended for a great time on the Azores.
reviews/6/text:
I was looking for an experience to explore the island when I found out about the UTV TOURS on Facebook. I immediately contact  these guys and they were really nice.
Me and my friend choose the West UTV Tour that took us for an amazing 4 hour experience around the island! I loved driving these cars and the sights. The relation quality/price is fair.
reviews/7/text: An awesome experience!  Would definitely recommend, the guide was very kind and helpful.  Even stopped at some great places to take in the views.
reviews/8/text:
First time on Terceira and it was the best experience ever !! 
We had the opportunity to get to know the most beautiful places on the island, always surrounded by the incredible landscapes and nature of Terceira and nothing better than jetski tours and UTV tours To do it !! Shawn and his girlfriend were very friendly! 
It was simply amazing and I hope to return!
reviews/9/text:
First time in the Azores, me and my friends love everything on Terceira Island, it's a fantastic place to visit and nothing better than jet-ski tours and UTV tours to get to know the island by land and sea, all the beauty is fascinating.
It was a simply incredible adventure and we are sure to return to visit this incredible island and do all these adventures again!!!
reviews/9/title: An incredible adventure, an unforgettable experience!!!
reviews/10/text: Best experience ever. Shawn was really helpful. We got to know the most beautiful places of the island, always surrounded by the amazing nature of Terceira. The UTV vehicles are new and well-maintained. I hope i can repeat it.
reviews/11/text: Me and my friends went to terceira and we tried the jetsky and the UTV tours. They are so amazing! The tour guides were nice and funny, and took us to the best spots of the island. The equipment is at perfect condition, and the price is absolutely worth it. I recommend to everyone to try at least one experience that this company provides. If you are thinking of going on an UTV tour, the longest one is the one I recommend, because you will see all the Terceira spots that you couldn’t find in internet and you will dive completely in the middle of the nature. The smaller tour is nice too but you will definitely want more! The jetsky tour took us to Ilhéus das Cabras, where you can swim on the clearest water on earth. I want to thank this company for making my holidays the best ones I ever had!
reviews/12/text:
The ilheu das Cabras tour is amazing. On top of seeing the island from a totally different view, the feeling of being the rocks and seeing the birds all flying around us was breathtaking.
Definitely returning! 
Take the camera, or phone with you to record the moments.
reviews/12/title: Jet-skis will never be the same
reviews/13/text:
Being in Azores ( Terceira) for the first time I wanted to have some fun. These guys were exactly what I needed. We started the day traveling the island in an UTV and after lunch we went for a jet ski ride. They are very versatile on this last subject. They sure have a jet ski for your taste. There’s this super powerful one and even one for tricks and jumps. Really cool day! Totally worth it!! 

BTW, if you can choose the instructor go for Filipe or Shawn. Filipe is the best in the water
reviews/13/title: Awesome!!! Tried almost everything they had to offer!!!
reviews/14/text:
Les tours proposés par Azores Retreat sont des expériences intenses qui permettent de découvrir l'île de Terceira autrement.

Nous avons fait le buggy avec Diana (West Side off road UTV 3h30), ce fût énorme. Le tour est complet et permet de découvrir l'ouest de l'île en alternant la côte et la montagne (Serra de Santa Barbara), sur des sentiers et chemins peu fréquentés et loin de la foule. On en prend plein la vue. Celà reste sportif parfois, mais les buggy sont bien entretenus et passent partout. Nous avons passé une excellent matinée en compagnie de Diana, qui est très professionnelle et connaît les lieux. Nous avons adoré cette sortie.

Nous avons fait le tour de Jet Ski découverte de l'îlot des chèvres en compagnie de Shawn. Ce fût la aussi grandiose. On se sent en sécurité malgré des bonnes vagues. On adapte la vitesse de nos engins à notre niveau. Sur place, nous profitons d'une baignade agréable au pied des ilets, immortalisée par des photos prises et envoyées par Shawn. Un moment magique la aussi.

L'équipe de Azores Retreat est formidable. Les 2 passionnés Shawn et Diana font tout pour que leur tours soient parfait. Les jours initialement prévus pour faire ces activités se sont révelées capricieux en terme de météo (pluvieux et brumeux pour le buggy et avec une forte houle pour le jet ski). Shawn n'a pas hésité à nous proposé de nouvelles dates avec une météo plus clémente et une mer moins agitée.

Je recommande vivement Azores Retreat qui propose des tours originaux, uniques, inoubliables.
reviews/14/title: Des tours inoubliables (UTV Tour / Jet Ski sur l'ile des chèvres)
reviews/15/text: Cogimos las motos en el puerto, nuestro monitor nos explicó muy bien como conducirla, pronto pusimos rumbo a las Islas. Una experiencia impresionante, grandes acantilados, fauna, flora,te puedes bañar por lo qué recomiendo llevar gafas de bucear para ver los  peces, yo tuve la suerte de ver una manta raya. A la vuelta vimos un maravilloso atardecer. Muy recomendable!!
reviews/15/title: Motos de agua a Isla de Cabras
reviews/16/text: Vale super a pena ! Guia super simpático , atencioso ! Vê-se a ilha numa perspectiva diferente ! Experiência única ! Aconselho muito !
reviews/17/text:
Uma tarde fantástica. Excelente forma de conhecer a ilha. Adrenalina e emoção durante todo o trajeto. Se vem à terceira tem de andar nos buggy’s em terra e nas motas de água no mar.
Obrigado ao Shawn e Diana.
subcategory_ranking: #14 of 135 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Azores

address: Horta, Faial Island 9900-405 Portugal
description: Trilhos R | Azores Tours is a tour operator that offers several activities in Faial. Our services aim to make our natural, cultural and historical heritage known with the accompaniment of local guides. Activities are planned so that our customers get the best out of their visit to Faial island.
name: Trilhos R | Azores Tours
offer_group/offer_list/0/title: Full Day Tour - Faial Island
offer_group/offer_list/1/title: Half Day Tour - Faial Island
offer_group/offer_list/2/title: Descent to Caldeira do Faial - The Perfect Adventure
photo/caption: Conheça o Faial com o conforto que merece.
reviews/0/text:
DISCLAIMER: If you are thinking of an easy and peasant walk around volcano or its crater on the top -- this adventure is, probablty, you would like to miss. Also would not recommend this trip for families with children.

If you were thinking of visiting the centre of volcano, walking in its crater -- then your dreams would be fulfilled. Ramiro is the excellent guide, who will not allow you to be bored along this adventure -- he is an intelligent person (native), who has alot to tell you about idemic plants and animals not only of the Faial, but of Azores islands in general. It was a pleasure to talk to somebody so close to the island.

Be ready for a medium to high weakness in the legs for the next day after this trip, as well as washing all the closes you were in. :)

I would also advice to visit guide's website (as did we), because it allows you to find out more about this and other trips, as well as you can book a trip there.

Liels paldies to Ramiro,
Konstantin and Arthur
reviews/1/text: Ramiro was a fantastic, enthusiastic,  knowledgeable guide around the island of Faial. We did a 4 hour tour with him which was closer to 5 hours.  He is intimate with every detail and beautiful sites.  Tour of volcano site with the interpretation center was breathtaking. It was a perfect way to view the entire island and next time we will hire him for one of his many interesting hikes on the island. His English is perfect and super polite.  We also used him for airport transport.
reviews/1/title: Trilhos R tour of Faial- fabulous day with Ramiro
reviews/2/text:
Just came back from an awesome 5 hour tour with Ramiro! This has been a great experience. Ramiro was born on the island Faial and knows a lot about it. He truly loves to show it to his guests and he will bring you  to hidden spots and parts of the island that big busses cannot reach. As we were arriving by cruise, he picked us up at the cruise port. Will definitely recommend this tour and book again. His passion for faial is contagious!

Thank a lot for showing us this beautiful island Ramiro!
reviews/3/text:
Ramiro waited for us in the hotel lobby (well on time) and we set off for a great day together. 

His English was excellent and he obviously knew his home island inside-out. He had an intended tour around most of the famous spots on the island in mind, but he also added small favourites of his own that he thought we specifically, would enjoy (hidden eco bee hives and the likes). This was fun and made us feel like special guests to the island.

He seemed a safe driver, also on some of the more steep and windy roads. We felt completely safe in his hands/van. 

He selected a great place for lunch – with a good view and delicious home cooked food where we could try many different platters (including sumptuous desserts)

Ramiro was completely flexible on all aspects of the tour. If we wanted to stop to take a picture – no problem. He even took photos himself that he later shared with us.

We were running quite late of time (as we were having such a good time) but he never stressed us in any way to get back on time. Even though he must have seen all the places a million times, he was still keen on seeing them with us too. 

Our lasting memory of Ramiro and our day together is his polite, un-stressed, flexible and friendly manners – and the way he shared all the treasures of his home island with us. An unforgettable day !!

And the next day we ran into him as he was waiting for some new clients. It was like seeing a good old friend. We hope a lot more people will benefit from his excellent guided tours on the island of Faial. 

Thanks Ramiro !!
reviews/4/text:
We had a fantastic day on the Faial island. We chose to do a full day tour.
Ramiro was our guide and took us to all places of interest, many of them quite out of reach of most.
We really appreciate his kindness and friendliness. Always attentive to the details that nature sometimes provides, he showed us buzzards (milhafre) flying with rodents in the claws and we also saw a small calf suckling.
We stopped for lunch in a very typical restaurant with excellent food, where we tasted everything.
We still had time to take a dip in the waters near the Capelinhos volcano.
It was a wonderful experience that I recommend to all who want to know Faial in detail and in good company.
Many successes and keep up the good work. 
Grazie, amico mio.
reviews/5/text:
Tuve el privilegio de tener un tour privado en un lugar maravilloso con el mejor de los guías. 
Desde el primer contacto con Ramiro a través de WhatsApp, y la planificación del tour, todo fue perfecto.
 Contestó inmediatamente a mis mensajes y me dio varias opciones para hacer.  
Hizo todo lo posible por acomodar sus horarios a los días que yo iba a estar en Faial para hacer el tour y a pesar de no tener disponibilidad, buscó un horario ya tarde para que no me fuera de Faial sin conocer Caldeira y Levadas, por lo cual le estaré siempre agradecida porque hizo de mi viaje una experiencia única. 
El día del tour, estuvo en el hotel muy puntual. 
Comenzamos a las 3 de la tarde, estaba programado que terminaramos a las 8 y se extendió hasta las 10:30 de la noche!.  Recorrimos Levadas de noche y con linternas! Una.experiencia  inolvidable 
Durante el tour a Caldeiras, nunca me hizo sentir que teníamos que correr para terminar el tour en un tiempo determinado.
 Bajamos y subimos Caldeira con todo el esfuerzo que requiere, pero fue un placer, lo disfruté muchísimo, y se lo debo a la experiencia y la paciencia de Ramiro. 
Es un guía execelente con una gran calidez humana. Ojalá no cambies nunca tu manera de trabajar! 
Gracias de nuevo por hacer que mi viaje fuera tan especial!
reviews/5/title: Un paraíso con un excelente guía.
reviews/6/text:
Mesmo clima adverso o Ramiro proporsionou-nos um passeio lindíssimo cheio de preciosidades e encantou-nós com o seu profissionalismo, simpatia e disponibilidade. Um dia que não esqueceremos.
Recomendamos vivamente.
reviews/7/text:
Uma excelente visita, muita simpatia e conhecimento da região. Tudo como combinado e o trilho das levadas é um dos mais lindos e envolventes da ilha do Faial. Recomendo bastante para quem quer conhecer de forma mais aprofundada e divertida o melhor da ilha do Faial. 
Obrigado!
reviews/8/text:
O que posso dizer? Fizemos o trilho da levada e foi simplesmente TOP!!!
O Ramiro foi um guia disponível,  atento, simpático e conhecedor da ilha. E o tour da levada permitiu-nos sentir a beleza dos Açores e, em concreto,  do Faial. Ao longo dos cerca de 8 km , a vista é  fantástica.  Natureza no seu estado puro.
reviews/8/title: Opção imperdível para quem visitar o Faial.
reviews/9/text: Uma experiência que vale super a pena! Guia, atencioso e simpático. Obrigada pela experiência, Trilhos R!  Recomendo!! 🍀😊
reviews/9/title: A beleza da caldeira - ilha do Faial
reviews/10/text:
Comenzamos el paseo en el puerto de Horta
Nos recibió Ramiro.
Un excelente guía, correcto, agradable, experto en el lugar
Recorrimos la isla que es hermosa y pasamos una tarde espectacular.
Recibimos muy buena explicación de cada punto visitado
Vehículo muy confortable
reviews/11/text:
Já tinha vindo ao Faial com a minha mãe em anos anteriores mas nunca tínhamos conhecido a ilha em maior detalhe, daí termos procurado um guia para nos levar aos melhores locais desta magnífica ilha. Enquanto procurávamos informações vimos um flyer dos Trilhos R, fomos ao seu site e gostámos muito da informação. Fizemos a nossa reserva e fomos presenteadas com o Ramiro :) Além de muito bonito é extremamente simpático, atencioso e conhecedor da fauna e flora que compõe a sua ilha.
Fizemos um tour de meio dia, onde ficámos a conhecer magníficos locais que só com um guia apaixonado pelo que faz poderíamos conhecer.
Estivemos no Faial por 4 dias e posso dizer que o momento alto da nossa estadia foi a tour que fizemos. 
Para quem quer conhecer a ilha do Faial, com tempo, bom ambiente e dedicação recomendo fortemente o Ramiro.
Para o ano cá estaremos novamente.
Obrigada e muito sucesso.

address: Lagoa, Sao Miguel 9560-360 Portugal
description: Azores Dream Tours is showing to be one of the best tourist animation companies of the island of Sao Miguel. We propose more inovator services with quality, respecting always the principles that reacts to our action, honesty , initiative , security , knowledge , responsibility and courtesy for all of our clientes and partners. Objective Azores Dream Tours is located on the green island , Sao Miguel in Azores, where we can clearly see volcanic activity. The characteristic background of the volcanic craters is served with beds of the magnific lakes where you can observe and enjoy the unique landscapes that increase in the surreal size . Through our themed tours our clients are presented with scenarios where the main landscape is littered with flowers, springs and fumaroles that are able to take your breath away. Azores Dream Tour wants to honor our Cliente/partner making these memorable moments. Our readiness and effectiveness are at your service because we make our excellence one of our main objectives. During each of our tours our team is always available to make suggestions so that we can display the best of our service. Azoream Dream Tours main goal is achieving and developing our work with excellence, that marks us and distinguishes us in our service in the animation tourism market in San Miguel. Safety and Liability The policy of Azores Dream Tours is protect and ensure the safty of our customers and employees at all times. As promoters and responsible for our environment, we carry out our mission of tourist animation based on high standards of safety and responsability. The staff of Azores Dream Tours, in a unique and present form, intend that your presence on board is made in total sefety, with the maximum comfort and in pure leisure, always defending the most stringent criteria of safety on board as well as places visited in order to avoid any accidentes , damage in properties and misuse of the environment. Taking into account our mission to preserve the most of our nature and natural beauty of the tours conducted in Azores. Dream Tours does not allow removing any plants or flowers as well as any deposit of waste in to the environment. For the safty of our customers they must always remain with the seat belt when the vehicle is in motion. All of our tours , activities and car are covered by an existing insurance agreement of the Portuguese law for tourist activity animation. Our services 365 days per year Azores Dream Tours offeres themed tours throughout the island of Sao Miguel. Find out the charms and wonders of our land at attractive prices to all age groups. The Azores Dream Tours have a fleet of vehicles that seats upto nine. "Success will be achieved securely in a safe and efficient manner in all operations of the Azores Dream Tours."

reviews/0/text: Oh what a tour!!!! The two day tour of the island is one of the best we’ve had in all of our travels! Fred, our guide was just the best! He backtracked when fog limited our views to make sure we saw everything at it’s best! He was fun and entertaining and so informative! We would highly recommend this two day tour and be sure to ask for Fred! He made our trip to Sao Miguel a vacation we’ll never forget!
reviews/0/title: Terrific Two Day Tour of Sao Miguel
reviews/1/text: We took 2 day tours. One visiting Furnas and Nordeste and the other visiting Sete Cidades and Lagoa do Fogo. For both tours we had driver and tour guide Fred. Fred picked us up from our residence (Ribeira Grande) and was super friendly and funny. We basically toured in the whole island was amazing. He took us to eat for lunch and food was very good. Would suggest the tour to everyone who was unlucky enough like us not finding a car to rent. He explains in English, stopped and waited for us to take photos of the amazing views. If we had to point out 1 fault would be probably the van. The van had poor ac was practically hot and sweaty all day.
reviews/2/text: We booked a three day private tour and our guide Luis was wonderful! He was always on time and very knowledgeable about the island. We visited the main attractions all over the island and were able to appreciate the unmatched nature that this beautiful island has to offer. Our stay in São Miguel was wonderful and we highly recommend Azores Dream Tours. From the planning phase with Miguel to the actual touring phase with Luis, our experience was wonderful. Our trip was memorable and we look forward to visiting again!
reviews/2/title: Fabulous Experience with Azores Dream Tours
reviews/3/text: We picked the all-in-one tour which included Twin Lakes, fire Lakes and furnas. We were greeted at the cruise ship terminal with our name on a board. After everyone arrived we took off in a van and proceeded to sightsee this Island. Besides the beauty of the island one thing that stood out to us was how clean it was, we did not see any litter on the highway,roads or anywhere. We spent the day zipping here and there giving us enough time to get out and look around at each stop. Now that we have seen the island if we ever go back we would like to just strictly go to the hot springs/bath and enjoy a meal that has been cooked in the ground. Their van was comfortable and tour guides were pleasant and happily answered any questions asked.
reviews/3/title: Wonderful way to see Ponta Delgado Portugal
reviews/4/text: Had a great excursion to see the hot springs & thermal grounds in the Azores. We learned that restaurants cook some of their meals there and the country's electrical grid is exclusively powered by thermal energy. Fasinating sights there.
reviews/5/text: My husband and I had a day in Sao Miguel (arriving on a cruise ship) and booked a private half-day tour to Sete Cidades.  We specifically asked for a private tour, and "private tour" was in the heading of the confirmatory email we received from Miguel quoting a price, and again later to confirm the time.  However, when we met our guide at the appointed time, it turned out that we were to be accompanied by six other people from the ship, total strangers to us, (some quite large) and we were all to be stuffed uncomfortably into a 8-passenger mini-van with limited visibility.  Needless to say, we were not at all happy, and declined to go on the tour.  We could only assume that the company thought we would go on the tour anyway with the other people rather than make alternative arrangements at the last  (they were wrong).  I cannot comment on the quality of the tour, but the management's "bait and switch" tactics are a poor reflection on the island's hospitality. I have to date received no reply from the company to my letter of complaint.
reviews/6/text: Rui, our guide, was professional and courteous. Our group of 5 ranged in age from 15 to 75, and he was thoughtful and accommodating to all the members. He managed to keep it interesting for the teen without wearing out the senior party members. We did the full itinerary for the day,although at a slower pace. He not only did not complain but continuously encouraged us to take our time. We stopped at several scenic overlooks, and he had a wealth of information about the island to share. Perfect day.
reviews/7/text:
My experience with Azores Dream Tours was nothing less than perfect, and couldn't have been any better. I took up 3 tours with this company (0.5 day Seven Cities lake, 1 full day Fire Lake and Furnas hot springs tour, and 1 full day Nordeste tour), and was able to enjoy pretty much everything I've wanted without any hiccup or trouble.

I was accompanied by Rui for all the tours and he was very central to why it made the these days very enjoyable for me. He's a careful driver who's extremely familiar with the roads in São Miguel, and that made me feel very safe. He also made sure to bring me to all the popular viewpoints AND some lesser known ones along the way only locals like himself knows and it was very appreciated! I managed to snap many, many beautiful photos throughout the tours. And whenever we stopped at viewpoints and attractions, I was never rushed so I had all the time to take pictures until I'm satisfied. Really appreciated this!

All in all, if you're considering a tour of São Miguel, look no further! Azores dreams is the company to go for! I found this company on TripAdvisor here as well, decided to go with them due to their positive reviews from prior customers and had no regrets! I will happily do another tour with them again when I get another chance to visit the beautiful São Miguel Island again in the near future!
reviews/8/text: We had a short stop in the Azores for 2 days en route to Spain and wanted an efficient overview of Sao Miguel, the main island. Our guide Hélia was very professional, prompt and friendly. We researched areas we wanted to see and she was able to accommodate all that we wanted. We even had time for a stop to enjoy thermal baths as well as a beautiful seaside lunch. I highly recommend Azore Dream Tours
reviews/9/text:
My husband and I booked two tours with Dream Tours; half day Sete Cidades and full day Furnas/Nordeste.
Upon phoning there company, João promptly phoned me back and was able to arrange our half day tour for the following day, plus full day tour the following day.
We cannot say enough about João. He is a laid back, knowledgeable, patient, engaging, professional guide with an excellent sense of humour. The vehicles used; van day one and car day two were accessible, clean and comfortable. João was able to show us the incredible highlights of the island on our two tours and his passion and love for his home was revealed through his descriptions of history and landscape.
He helped us to fall in love with this wonderful island and showed us ways to experience it more fully upon out next journey. We highly recommend booking a Dream Tour experience.
Thank you João for sharing your time with us!
reviews/10/text:
My wife and I unreservedly award Joao of Azores Dream Tours five stars.
For those wishing to learn why, you may want to read a detailed review below.

We are just back aboard our cruise ship after our third and best ever tour with Joao of Azores Dream Tours. On arriving at Punta Delgada our family group of five was disappointed to find heavy low-lying clouds covering the island with landing planes disappearing into the mist.
Already committed to a tour we were happy to meet Joao again but did not expect much in the way of sightseeing.  We asked Joao to use his judgement and make the best of it.

Going back a few years we chose him from a random group of drivers for his friendly manner and good command of idiomatic English.  Turns out he is also comfortable with German, French, Spanish, and of course Portuguese.  We also liked his clean 8-passenger Mercedes van.  That day we saw the beautiful blue and green twin lakes west of Punta Delgada both from the rim of the volcanic crater they lie in and close up from the picnic areas along the shore.  Joao explained why one of the lakes appears green and the other blue. There were no canned spiels, just informal answers to whatever interested us -  weather, botany (he loves the prolific hydrangeas), the economy - whatever.  His took us places we would never have reached in a large tour bus. It was a great tour and we told Joao we hoped to see him again someday.

It turns out that many Transatlantics cruises stop in the Azores so the next time we emailed Joao but explained that we had a larger group this time (over a dozen).  "Not a problem", he writes, because his brother Miquel owns the tour company and has many vehicles available. There would be a second van and driver, so we had another great tour which customized to our interests, included a visit to a tea factory and the village of Furnas and its hot springs.
As to this latest tour Joao suggested we head to the north side of the island and head east.  The main roads and infrastructure are remarkably well maintained and we quickly climbed out of the clouds into bright warm sunshine with greenery everywhere and the ocean in the distance.  Our first stop was an overlook on the coast with stunning views in both directions. Continuing past fields with lazy cows, tea plantations and factories, we headed for the hills and finally arrived high on the rim of a huge crater with a stunning view of the Village of Furnas, far below.
Descending to the town, a short drive brought us to the boiling hot springs - bringing to mind a miniature Yellowstone.  Joao then walked us to a factory outlet for flavored liqueurs.  These were so good we had to buy a bottle of the coffee  liqueur which to my taste was superior to the top selling coffee liqueur - also a bargain.
We all got in the van and climbed back over the rim and down to the ship still embedded in the same gloom and a occasional light rain.
So here is a toast to Joao, our favorite driver and friend - with Azores Coffee Liqueur.  We love the beautiful Azores and shall return.
While this might appear to be a "planted" endorsement I assure you that we are not related to Joao or Azores Dream Tours in any way and have personally written this review without compensation.
reviews/11/text: Third time with this company and the product just gets better. Great day of views and experiences together with a guide for whom nothing was too much trouble. A new amazing way to discover the best of an amazing island paradise. From stunning views to bubbling water to lunch cooked in a volcano - what more could you ask for. Thank you.
reviews/12/text: I loved this amazing tour with Joao who has loads of knowledge of the Azores. We were with the 4 of us in his nice car and visited a teaplantation first which was very interesting and after this to Furnas which is an unbelievable place full of geysers. After the nice local lunch which was cooked underground in the geysers of Furnas we drive to Nordeste which is  spectacular!! Beautiful waterfalls and greenery. I would really recommend this tour to anyone visiting the Azores.
reviews/12/title: Amazing and wonderful tour with Joao
reviews/13/text: This was a four hour tour.  We were picked up outside our hotel and dropped off there at the end of the tour.  Our guide was an excellent driver and could not have been more helpful or informative.  We saw more in an afternoon than we managed in two full days in a hire car.  We were never rushed, he took his time and waited until we were ready to move on to the next attraction.  You couldn’t ask for better service.  Five stars!
reviews/13/title: Half day Furnas tour which includes a visit to a tea plantation
reviews/14/text:
We just returned from Sao Miguel and went on a 3 full day tours with Joao from Azores Dream Tours.  Let me just say what an amazing tour it was.  We were filled with such beauty of the island along with so much knowledge provided by Joao.  We toured from one end of the island to the other.  We also stopped at 3 local eateries for a delicious lunch each day.  I just can't say enough how happy we were with Azores Dream Tours.  

Cheryl H
reviews/15/text: My parents and I visited São Miguel in the beginning of September and I booked two full day group tours with Azores Dream Tours. One day was to The Seven Cities and the Fire Lake and the other day was to Furnas and Nordeste. For both days our tour guide was João. Both tours were fantastic and João was great. He was every patient, knowledgeable, had a great sense of humour and can speak very well English (as some of the people on our tour didn't speak Portuguese).  My parents and I had a fantastic time in São Miguel and a lot of laughs with João during our tour.  A beautiful island to visit. I would definitely recommend Azores Dream Tours to anyone who is going to São Miguel and wants a guided tour through the island.
reviews/16/text:
We recently booked this trip prior to leaving for our cruise.  Two years ago we had used the same company and had enjoyed our tour. I contacted Miguel a couple of days before the trip as we had made some friends on the ship who wanted to join us, this was no problem and we were met and welcomed as we got in the cruise terminal. 
The Mercedes mini bus was very clean and comfortable,  John was an excellent guide and very knowledgeable.  We took a half day tour this time as we wanted to wander in Ponte Delgada afterwards. We had a wonderful 3 hours seeing amazing views of the sea,countryside,and volcanoes. If you dont do a tour you are really missing out and this company is great. Many thanks Miguel and John.
reviews/17/text: My husband and I met John from Azores Dream Tours during our 16 hour layover in Azores. Originally we planned on renting a car and touring the island ourselves. We are sooooo glad we didn't. John's tour was soooo much better than anything we could have done ourselves and so much more economical. He took us to all the sites we wanted to see and patiently waited as we took a gazillion photographs, videos and drone footage. He was very knowledgeable about the sites and the history of the island. He answered all of our questions and made us fall in love with Azores. My husband and I are thinking of going back to Portugal just for Azores. If we do, we will surely give Azores Dream Tours a call again. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
reviews/18/text: Miguel arranged for 3 full day private tours of the island as well as a dolphin and whale watching cruise.     Nelson picked up 8 of us at our villa and gave us the grand tour of the island over 3 days.    He recommended great lunch and dinner locations, he adjusted our day which allowed us to stop and visit at our timing and leisure.    There is so much to see on this island of Sao Miguel and Nelson made it so pleasant.    I can't recommend them enough.    Thank you Miguel and Nelson for making our visit so perfect - we will return and will of course be in touch with you.
reviews/18/title: Enjoy a private tour with the best tour company on the Island
reviews/19/text: My family and I visited the island of Sao Miguel this past week. We rented two vans from Azores Dream Tours for two full days. They picked us up and dropped us off at the house where we were staying. We were able to see all the sites of the beautiful island. We had Nelson and Bruno both days and they were great! They were very knowledgeable, friendly, and accommodating. Our group was 16 people in total, with 3 young children (10, 9, and 3) and the tours were very appropriate for all ages. The restaurants they suggested for lunch were great and the food was delicious. Would highly recommend Bruno, Nelson and Azores Dream Tours. Both days were fun and it was a great way to see the whole island.

reviews/0/text: Paulo is FUNtastic! He is prompt and flexible, knowledgeable, engaging, attentive and kind,and he's a great photographer! We went on two full-day van tours with him, to Sete Cidades and to Nordeste. Paulo is from this island and has insider knowledge that can't be gleaned from a book or website. After two days with him, we feel like we left with a new friend, we had a great time! See you next time, Paulo!
reviews/1/text:
We would highly recommend Paulo’s excellent tour. 
We had an excellent day with him touring the Sete Cidades lakes and the western part of São Miguel. 

We started in a pineapple farm, then climbed to the crater edge. A delicious lunch was in Sete Cidades before working our down to the coast. 

Throughout Paulo was informative with the right amount of information that did not overwhelm us. We were a small party of six people so there was plenty of time to ask questions. Each of the stops had something different and new to learn. There was plenty of time to take photos and to admire the landscape that was stunning. 

Paulo’s driving was careful and as a result I did not feel nauseated on the numerous turns. 

I cannot recommend his tour highly enough and wish him well.
reviews/1/title: Sete cidades and Western Coast Tour. Fabulous !!!
reviews/2/text: We did several days of private walking and island excursion tours with Paulo and can’t recommend him highly enough. Courteous, enjoyable, fun and very flexible with great knowledge not only of where to go on the island, but also its history, customs, different foods and people. If you are looking for something memorable and different from the cookie cutter group tours don’t hesitate to contact Paulo.
reviews/2/title: Excellent private tours of São Miguel island
reviews/3/text:
I just came back from spending 4 days on the island of São Miguel and I did a tour with Paulo each of the days I was there.

This was my 3rd time in the Azores and while each time was amazing, this trip was the best experience due to having Paulo as a guide and seeing places I would not have seen on my own or even another tour company or guide.

One of the reasons I chose Paulo was because of his unique tours, which include hiking and other options like a night time hot springs experience besides of course also being able to see all the other breathtaking sites, like Sete Cidades and Furnas.

As a travel advisor, I always look for unique and off the beaten path experiences for my clients and the days with Paulo were amazing.
We explored Nordeste, probably one of my favorite areas on the island and we did 2 hikes as well as the night time hot springs experience in Furnas.

All tours were customized by Paulo for me and it was such a pleasure to hear stories about the history of the Azores. Paulo really brought it all to life, it was inspiring and fascinating.

One of my favorite experiences was the hike to Lagoa do Fogo, it was absolutely breathtaking and I would love to do it all over again. 

Paulo is caring, respectful and he loves his home, the Azores. 
It was a real pleasure to be with him and experience the island with. I can't imagine having a more wonderful experience than I've had over those few days exploring this beautiful island with him.

I am already planning to come back and do a couple of the van tours and definitely more hikes with him.

I will use Paulo and FUNtastic Azores Tours for all my clients visiting São Miguel and if you are looking for a wonderful tour guide, Paulo is the one. 

Thank you Paulo for the great experience, until we meet again.
reviews/3/title: Unforgettable experience with an amazing guide in São Miguel
reviews/4/text:
We only had 2 days to discover Sao Miguel but thanks to Paolo we managed to discover many highlights of this beautiful island. He knows every stone and every corner. He has many great stories and an overall knowledge of basically everything regarding the Azores.
If you are looking for a professional guide, look no longer, Paolo is your guy!
We hope to return sometime and do some tours with him again.
Thank you for the amazing experience, it really was FUNtastic!
Dóra and János
reviews/5/text: Paulo is very knowledgable about the island and you can tell he is passionate and proud of his roots. We went on a private tour around Sete Cidades, including a trail (Serra Devassa) and a delicious lunch at a local restaurant. We loved it so much that we ended up booking another tour for my birthday (an evening thermal bath with dinner). I highly recommend it!
reviews/6/text: Words cannot express, how much we loved touring around Sao Miguel with Funtastic Azores. Both Paulo and Marco were amazing guides and did more than expected. Sao Miguel was truly fantastic and even better because of them. Thank you Paulo for organizing everything and I cannot recommend your company enough! Their tours are by far the best way to get to know Sao Miguel!
reviews/6/title: Wonderful three day trip with Funtastic Azores on Sao Miguel
reviews/7/text:
I spent a few days in São Miguel for my birthday, with my parents. We wanted to tour the island, so we booked two tours with Vera. If you really want to see São Miguel the best way to do so is with a tour! I cannot recommend Vera enough, she is truly a phenomenal tour guide. We'd already done a group tour with Vera in May 2017 that when we returned to the island, we wanted her to be our tour guide again. Vera really tailored our tours to our time and interests. She's professional and knowledgeable, about the history and culture of the island, as well as about the fauna and flora. She's an excellent driver and knows her way about São Miguel like the back of her hand, which makes all the difference. She loves her job and it shows :) Those two days we got to see so much, it was amazing!  One day we toured the western part of the island: Lagoa do Fogo, Lagoa das Sete Cidades, Caldeira Velha and Lagoa de Santiago. The next day we toured the eastern part of the island: Caloura, Vila Franca do Campo, Furnas (caldeiras and lagoa), Cascata da Ribeira dos Caldeirões and the Gorreana tea plantation and factory. She really made the most of the two days we had and I'd love to do a tour with her again in the future :)

PS. It's also worth noting that during these COVID times that Vera has the clean and safe certifications. We practiced social distance and wore mask when in closed spaces. The van was equipped with hand sanitizer and we felt perfectly safe at all times!
reviews/7/title: Book a tour with Vera to make the most of your time in São Miguel!
reviews/8/text:
Black and white towns, volcanic landscapes, blue and green lagoons, rolling green fields bordered with flowers, and happy cows everywhere. 

I didnt have enough time so I am glad I met Paulo from Funstatic. He tailored a private tour to take me around the places I wanted to see. Thank you Paulo! 🙂 I will be back
reviews/9/text:
This was hands down the most amazing travel experience ever.  We did all of the Activities listed above. Paolo Was beyond professional and went above and beyond to ensure that we had an exceptional experience! 
Thank you so much Paolo, for exposing us to All the food, places and people your beautiful island had to offer ! 
I would highly recommend FUNtastic tours and look forward to the opportunity to utilize them again !
reviews/10/text: A group of 6 of us spent last week in Ponta Delgado last week.  We were recommended to contact Paulo at Funtastic Adventures for sightseeing.  What Paulo provided was far more!  He met us as soon as we arrived at our accomodations and once we got settled, took is downtown for an amazing dinner where he also made recommendations for wines and food to us.  Daily he would pick us up and help us plan the day.  We told him what we were interested in and he customized it daily according to what part of the island had the best weather and also made suggestions for other activities, all of which were awesome.  We did everything from 8km hikes to vineyard tours, seeing volcano craters, amazing cliffs, black sand/rock beaches, natural hot springs and so much more.  When we were running low on drinks and food at our villa he would take us to the grocery store and help us translate ingredients for dietary requirements for 2 of us. I have travelled for many years and have never had a guide like Paulo.  He was friendly, personable, always on time and never in a hurry.  He was dedicated to a truly exception experience.  I would recommend him to anyone who goes to the Azores and if you have not considered going there, I would say you need to do it!  Not only did we have an exceptional week, I feel we made a new friend there!
reviews/11/text: Great host, very friendly and attentive.meal was wonderful, very special, and the hot baths were amazing. We recommend this tour unreservedly. Great value!
reviews/12/text:
Most gratifying experience. Paulo is a wonderful guide, friendly and knowledgeable, small group, lots of interesting information. Most satisfying experience in the thermal springs, great food.
Highly recommended!
reviews/13/text: Best time we had in Azores. Great night with dinner. Our tour guide was the best we had in our trip. Thank you.
reviews/14/text: We are french, we had a pleasant time of culinary discovery, and thermal waters.  The guide was great and showed us discover the island during the ride even with the language barrier.  strongly recommend
reviews/15/text:
A Perfect evening with a perfect leader. Thank you so much.
Wish you and your Wife all the best for the upcoming adventure
reviews/16/text: This past summer my wife and I had the opportunity of being part of a tour with Paulo visiting the Hot Springs, Furnas and enjoying a very nice meal.   It was a great experience where we were picked up at our hotel and returned after a great evening including meeting other couples.   Paulo was very knowledgeable and added to the overall great experience.
reviews/16/title: Great Tour with Paulo - Tour of Furnas, Hot Springs and Dinner
reviews/17/text: This tour was for the hot springs at night which is the best time to go on a cool night. Paulo was very informative and gave us a lot of historical background of the town in Furnas. He took us to a restaurant and we ate an assortment of meats made from the heat of the hot springs, which was delicious! When dropping us off, he pointed out a popular local bakery and was nice enough to wait for us to purchase some items since we were there. I'd highly recommend him as a tour guide! He was very flexible and accommodating of our time.
reviews/18/text:
There are not enough superlatives to describe our experience with Paulo Melo of Funtastic Azores Tours. He was the best tour guide that we've ever had in over 20 years of arranging private tours during land vacations or cruises.

I arranged 4 customized tours for our group of 6 adults with Paulo in advance of our week-long stay on the beautiful island of Sao Miguel in September, 2019. Paulo answered my emails and questions very promptly, which helped in planning the tours to meet our needs and interests. He offers a variety of tours for all ages and interests, which are reasonably priced. Paulo was very dependable and was always on time when picking us up at our hotel. His van was clean and comfortable and he was a very safe driver.

Paulo is a great ambassador for his homeland. He is friendly, flexible, and has a nice sense of humor, which made our time with him very relaxing and enjoyable. Paulo is highly fluent in English and has a master's degree from the local university. He shared a wealth of information about the history, culture, geology, botany, etc. of the Azores, and answered many questions that we asked him about schools, food, customs, restaurant suggestions, etc. I highly recommend FUNtastic Azores Tours and would definitely contact Paulo again if I ever return to Sao Miguel in the future.
reviews/18/title: Four FUNtastic tours with a fantastic tour guide
reviews/19/text:
We booked the night thermal and dinner activity and had a great time.

Guide Paola picked us up at our Ponta Delgada hotel exactly the on time and we proceeded to pick up two other couples.  As we drove to Furnas he did a great job pointing out some of the interesting sights along the route and answering our questions.  First stop was dinner in a local restaurant with the local volunteers (can’t remember the Portuguese name) which included wine and dessert.  Around 9 we reached the thermal bath and he helped us get oriented before giving us free time to explore the 5 different baths.

While in theory this is something you might be able to do on your own, we were really relaxed and tired after 90 minutes soaking in the steaming water so it was especially great to have a designated driver.

Thanks Paolo for a great evening!
tags/urgency_tag/tag_text: Tours from FUNtastic Azores Tours tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

address: Rua Escultor Ernesto Canto da Maia n 3 São Roque, Ponta Delgada, Sao Miguel 9500-716 Portugal

description: Tours in Sao Miguel Island with Belazorica to visit the beautiful sightseeing in safe and comfortable vehicle with a experienced driver that speaks English.
name: Pedro Ferreira Azores Tours
reviews/0/text: We accompanied Pedro on his half day, Sete Cidades tour and had an absolutely wonderful time. The tour was just what we were looking for  with spectacular views, fun and insightful commentary from Pedro, and a trip to the pineapple plantation. Pedro is an enjoyable story teller and clearly loves his work. We highly recommend his tour and hope to return to do another.
reviews/0/title: Throughly enjoyed the half day Sete Cidades tour!
reviews/1/text: I booked a full day and had a great experience! Tiago my tour guide was well known with the island, a safe driver and gives great service. Thank you for a lovely day!
reviews/2/text: Pedro packed in a full day's tour to optimize our experiences! He did an incredible job showing us local sights, food, wine, coffee, liquors, and all with an AMAZING sense of humor! Very professional and catered to my friend and I throughout! I highly, highly recommend!!
reviews/3/text: We booked two tours through our hotel Hotel Do Colegio in Ponta Delgada to visit Sete Cidades & Lagoa do Fogo and Furnas. Pedro gave us the tours of these beautiful places with breathtaking views over two days. He was an expert with all the information about these places. He was funny and entertaining throughout the two trips. We highly recommend him for trips in Sao Miguel.
reviews/3/title: Excellent trips in Sao Miguel with Pedro
reviews/4/text: Incredible private tour with Pedro! He was super attentive to the limited mobility needs, was flexible about what we wanted to see/do, and extremely knowledgeable about the beautiful island! He was very responsive on email/WhatsApp to arrange and also took nice pictures of our family - small things, but both make a big difference in the end. We had a lovely day (despite the weather) and enjoyed seeing all the sights with Pedro’s entertaining commentary. Strongly recommend for a personalized experience - but be sure to book in advance!
reviews/4/title: One of the most attentive and informative guides we’ve ever had!
reviews/5/text: I had a one day private tour we did the west (sete cidades) and east (lagoa do fogo), Pedro was very professional he handled everything smoothly the itinerary, the pickup, couldn’t have done it without pedro as public transportation on the island isn’t frequent, also a big thank u for Tiago who was so helpful and informative, honestly it was a day to remember in such a stunning place!! Muito obrigado por todo! Até logo
reviews/6/text: I highly recommend doing at least one tour with Pedro during your stay on São Miguel. I did two tours with his firm - one with Pedro to Sete Cidades, and one with his nephew, Tiago to Logoa Fogo. Both tours were absolutely beautiful and interesting, and both Pedro and Tiago were friendly, enthusiastic and knowledgeable.
reviews/7/text: Fantastic guide and a great tour. Can highly recommend Pedro! He knows everything about the island and speaks very good english. We`ll be back.
reviews/8/text: I went on a tour with Pedro in 2017 when I visited the first time, so he was the first place I looked when we planned this trip to Ponta Delgada. We did the full-day Furnas tour and the half-day Fire Lake tour with Pedro this time, and he always delivers. He's full of information about the island, very personable and funny, and makes sure everyone on the tour is engaged and having fun. He's also very flexible and accommodating. We had a great time and saw a lot of this beautiful island in a short amount of time. Highly recommend!
reviews/9/text:
Was travelling solo on Sao Miguel for only 3 days, and knew I wanted to maximize seeing the sites in such a short period of time. Rental car prices were crazy, and my hotel recommended Pedro's company and I was not disappointed. They picked everyone up at their hotels and dropped us off at the end of the day, so couldn't be more convenient. 

Took the full day Furnas tour (€70) with Tiago and the half day Sete Cidades tour (€35) with Diago - both were great guides who kept us on schedule was also allowing us to take our time/ whatever photos we wanted. Both guides were locals, knowledgeable, and people I was happy to spend the day with.

The van on the full day Furnas tour was new, very clean and the AC worked great. Tiago juggled the tour in both English and Portugese for a diverse group. The van on our second day was older but still clean, but didn't have AC though the open windows gave more than enough circulation.

I was happy Tiago and Diego were navigating all the curvy roads and I wasn't, drove efficiently but safely. While none of the spots visited were "hidden gems" per say, getting dropped off at the viewpoints vs. walking up all the hills from the parking lots was a perk.

Would recommend Pedro's tours for solo travelers or groups, and looking forward to my next visit.
reviews/9/title: Great option for solo traveler with minimal time
reviews/10/text: Great experience, Tiago was our guide and he was amazing. He was friendly and very funny. If you want a fun tour experience of sao Miguel ask for Tiago, you won’t regret it. He knew all the best picture spots, he never ran out of jokes and he is also a great photographer.
reviews/11/text: We had a great time touring furnas with Pedro! He was very personable and an overall very knowledgeable guide. Would definitely recommend his tours!
reviews/12/text: Pedro was fantastic, so friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating.  His tours covered the whole island. I highly recommend him.
reviews/13/text: Where do I start to describe what a wonderful Tour we had with Pedro.. Not only was he a great Professional..but became a wonderful friend. He made our time in the Azores more memorable than we could have imagined. Pedro..Thank you for all you did for us.  Craig,Jeanne, Mark and Silvia
reviews/13/title: A must Tour with a Great Guide
reviews/14/text: We arrived in the Azores by cruise ship, our driver Tiago was on time and the van was clean and spacious.  We visited several areas that looked over the island.  The furnas were so interesting, we were able to see them bring up several pots of stew, lunch was excellent.  We also stopped at the tea factory.
reviews/15/text: Pedro was a friendly and humorous Guide! We enjoyed our day on the island and Pedro fullfilled all of our wishes. He also took all the pictures we wanted and showed us some secret spots on the island. His Car was very comfortable and clean. He also gave us a lot of information about the island and knew the whole process of the tea production! Thank you so much Pedro for this amazing day :)
reviews/16/text:
Tour das Furnas 5*
Guia muito profissional e acolhedor.

Furnas Tour 5*
Very profesional and friendly guide.
reviews/17/text: This was the first time my wife and I were in the Azores and Pedro Ferreira created a personalized tour of the island just for the two of us.  He was absolutely fantastic and we highly recommend him for any and all tours to Sao Miguel.  His customer service and knowledge of the island made the tour even more special.  He took us to all the key places to visit and gave us excellent tips on where to go and what to see in our free time.  Pedro was one of the best tour guides we have ever had!  A visit to the Azores should be a must for everyone and Pedro will make your trip a memorable one!
reviews/17/title: The Best Tour Guide on Sao Miguel!
reviews/18/text: Very nice and friendly guide! Was telling us lots about Azores, stopping at nice view points, guiding and showing us tea and pineapple plantations operations, and generally explaining many interesting things!
reviews/19/text:
Pedro Ferreira Tours is the best company to show you all the island. We went to Sete Citades, Furnas and alot more. My wife and I went for our Honeymoon, and our Tour Guide Tiago Costa gave us all the knowledge he knows about the island. He is amazing, kind and very friendly person. This is a picture with the best tour guide in Sao Miguel..

Keep it up Tiago 💪💪

**Highly Recommend**
reviews/19/title: The best Tour on the Island..
